Reviews.Title: Good point-and-shoot entry level camera
Reviews.Author: David "Zurasson"
Reviews.Content: Got this yesterday and like it, had Canon PowerShot A2300 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom (Black) before. Just to note, PowerShot A2500 is an entry-level pocket camera which is very similar to PowerShot A2300: 16-megapixel 1/2.3" sensor, DiGiC 4 processor, and 5x zoom 28mm wide angle lens, 2.7" LCD. Even 720p HD video capabilities are the same.Pros:1. What really distinguishes it from its predecessor is Smart Auto Mode recognizing 32 shooting environments and adjusts settings for better quality. It automatically selects the best shooting settings for optimal quality based on the environmental factors (lightning I guess) to provide point'n'shoot simplicity.2. 16.0 Megapixels, with loads of resolution pictures are still clear. High resolution is also good for producing biggest printouts.3. 5x Optical Zoom is sufficient in most cases.4. DIGIC 4 Image Processor. Not as fast as DIGIC 5 though fast and powerful enough to give you advanced system options, provide quick-shoot with reliable performance and low battery consumption. As far as I know DIGIC 4 is currently Canon's most efficient processor for budget cameras. BTW it has some Eco mode, that is said to be providing even faster warm-up times and saves the standard battery, but I haven't tested it yet.5. Very lightweight, just put it into your pocket, can take it everywhere.6. Price tag - $99. You can't get any better camera for the price.Cons:1. Like A2300 it lacks optical image stabilization, though it's got digital image stabilization.2. 1/2.3" sensor. Well, entry level CCD providing good pictures, not of a DSLR quality, that's all I can say.Summary:Sure this is not the best camera in the world. I definitely knew it when I bought the camera. BUT, I was pleasantly surprised with the quality of pictures I shot.If you're like me (not a pro) and looking for a budget point-and-shoot camera taking family photos and events, mostly shoot in daylight or good lighting, I'd definitely recommend it, taking into account its price tag of $99 - just about right.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Military Mommy
Reviews.Content: This is my 6th point and shoot (P&S;) camera in 9 years, ranging in price from $200-$300. I have had 1 Bell & Howell, 3 Nikons and this is my 2nd Canon P&S; camera. The last 2 P&S; cameras I had I literally wore out by taking so many pictures. I bought this as a second camera for my husband (who doesn't usually take pictures) to use when he goes hunting with my son. I chose a Canon because I have a Canon DSLR and love it. I also wanted an inexpensive camera, because I thought it would sit on the shelf for most of the year. Of course it did not come with a memory card, as I have yet to buy any camera that does.To test this camera, after shooting indoors for a bit, I took it to the park. Luckily, what started out as a sunny day turned cloudy, allowing me to test the camera in different lighting. This is a typical low priced P&S; camera.  Like all P&S; cameras, this one performs best in bright, outdoor lighting. However, the ease of use and quality of pictures for the small price tag makes this a good buy. This is one of the better P&S; cameras I have had.Although no instruction manual was in the box (other than the very basics), it was easy to figure out how to manually set this camera, which is a must for me. I liked the fact that it has a PROGRAM setting, which allows me to set a program manually. Even if I switch to another setting, it saves my manual settings, allowing me to switch back and forth between settings. That was great when I tested it, because the lighting went from sunny to cloudy and back again. I could easily switch from AUTO to LANDSCAPE to PROGRAM (my manually programmed settings) and back, depending on lighting and activity, all while holding my 6 month old. The pictures I took while holding my baby (who was trying to grab the camera) of my 4 other children who were riding a moving train turned out surprisingly good. I also manually adjusted the ISO to 1600 and took some shots while holding my squirming baby, and the pictures were not as noisy as I thought they would be.This is a great camera for the price. I would definitely recommend it for anyone, especially those who are ready to do some manual adjustments to get better pictures, but not ready to spend a lot of money. I am glad I bought this camera, and I am happy because I think I will actually use it more than I originally thought!

Reviews.Title: Works pretty well, can zoom up to x16!
Reviews.Author: TTKira
Reviews.Content: The camera takes excellent pictures and videos, the price... you can't go wrong. I just wish it came with a cable as well to transfer pictures to my PC, instead of having to remove the SD card. This does not come with a memory card, i bought a "Transcend 16GB Class 10 SDHC Flash Memory Card (TS16GSDHC10E)" together with this and it works well. The camera is very lightweight, and does not look nor feel as though it can withstand any small fall for shock impact, so be careful with it.Ok an edit to my review: I just tried taking pictures of the moon and venus phenomena (08-09-13) and i realized that this camera zoomed up to 16times! Not just up to x5! After x5 it kept going, x8...x10....x16! I got an awesome pic at x16 of the moon and the planet.

Reviews.Title: TERRIFIC  VALUE
Reviews.Author: Robert E. Weaver
Reviews.Content: IT IS EASY TO USE AND THE QUALITY OF THE PICTURES IS AMAZING.  I DON'T THINK THERE IS A BETTER CAMERA  IN THE PRICE RANGE OF THIS ONE.  JUST SPENT 12 DAYS IN ITALY AND TOOK OVER 1000 PHOTOS THAT ARE LIKE POST CARDS.

Reviews.Title: Powershot A2500
Reviews.Author: Stewart A.
Reviews.Content: Ok first off I just want to say that this is a great camera for the money and I really would like to give it five stars, but there are a couple things that keep me from doing that. I've had this camera for about three weeks and we have used it a lot since we got it. It looks nice and seems to be solid yet light and compact. Here are the pros and cons I found.pros:-light and compact-takes great pictures-good looking-lots of options for a camera of its sizecons:-display screen makes pictures look crappy till their put on computer-very sensitive to movement-focus is sensitive-can't take very distant photos in low lightingNow when I say it is sensitive to movement it directly relates to the focus. It is not very forgiving for those who don't have steady hands or something to prop against, but it can sure take a hell of a photo if you are still. Overall I think it is a good camera for the money.

Reviews.Title: my first digital
Reviews.Author: L. Proftay "L Proftay manic reader"
Reviews.Content: This is my first digital camera and it's so easy even I can take great pictures. I especially like that I can take stills and videos with the same camera.  I highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied customer
Reviews.Author: Jimmy L. Cawthon
Reviews.Content: Bought this little camera at Wal-Mart for 99.00.  Very pleased as a amateur photographer just wanting the occasional picture to put on my computer.  Thanks to Canon.  They make good products.

Reviews.Title: Camera falls short, but Amazon's customer service is outstanding
Reviews.Author: B. Storrs
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my son for his 12th birthday because of the price and the fact that I have an older model Canon Powershot that I love.  I was disappointed when I received the camera.  It is very lightweight, to the point of feeling very cheap.  My son really liked it though, very easy to use.  The wrist strap that comes with the camera is not adjustable so it does not tighten on your wrist.  We were in a cave in Colorado three days after he received it and he was taking a picture and the camera slipped out of his hand and since the wrist strap was not tightened on his wrist, it fell to the rock floor and broke.  I called Canon to see about getting it repaired.  It was a minimum $89 plus shipping to and from.  The camera cost me $85 including shipping thru Amazon.  Obviously this was no one's fault but my son's (although obviously he did not intend to drop it) but I don't know why a reputable company like Canon would cut such a cheap corner on their wrist strap and not make it adjustable.  I called Amazon to see if by any chance they would let me purchase a new one a a reduced cost, not expecting them to let me, and understandably so.  The Amazon rep sent me a brand new camera with free shipping and even sent a pre-paid UPS label to return the broken camera.  I have always been so impressed with Amazon's customer service.  The camera is alright, takes good pictures, but definitely buy a better wrist strap for it.  But so grateful to Amazon for replacing this for us!

Reviews.Title: Cannon Pocket Camera
Reviews.Author: Barney E. Smith
Reviews.Content: The best pocket camera on the market for the price! There are 3 different cameras by Cannon in this category, go with the A2500 for added overall quality for just a small increase in price! I had been looking at point & shoot cameras, reading all the specs. along with remarks by other customers for about 3 months. I got this for my wife for her birthday and she is very picky after going through 3 previous cameras unsuccessfully, she has been very happy with this one(finally)!

Reviews.Title: Great budget camera based on SD330.
Reviews.Author: E. Tucker
Reviews.Content: As a long time Canon compact camera user my favorite new features on the A2500 are...The Canon PowerShot A2500 does not just stop at taking images but is rather adept at handling videos as well. It is capable of producing 720p HD files at the touch of a button. One of the thoughtful things about this camera is the inclusion of the movie button. You do not have to fidget about with all sorts of controls in order to get the video going. Rather you go back to that simple button and the rest is history.Another nice feature is that this product is newly minted with an ECO mode which is designed to reduce the power consumption on your camera.The Canon brand has made cameras its specialty and the Canon PowerShot A2500 holds true to type. This model brings out all the features that you would expect of a camera of its class but has the added advantage of making it easier for the consumer to access those features. In other words you get the best of both worlds with a great camera and easy usage.Verdict:There are no major surprises with the Canon PowerShot A2500. It is a great camera that does what it says on the box.If you are looking for the next model up check out the Canon SD330 as it has another level of features and quality.http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00B5HE3UU/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&camp;=1789&creative;=390957&creativeASIN;=B00B5HE3UU&linkCode;=as2&tag;=stupisms-20

Reviews.Title: Powershot A2500
Reviews.Author: Michelle Garringer
Reviews.Content: i bought the powershot for a class reunion weekend and it excelled! it gave me several hundred of the nicest photos i've ever taken and i cant wait to take it out and take some more photos! a couple videos too that also was very easy to do. what i really like about the powershot is you can SEE the photos right as you take it,  so say one was blurry due to new user error. it shows you the photo and you can say right away " nope try again"  that was VERY handy along with showing people thier photos in case they wanted a try #2. same with erasing very easy.before i bought this i knew nothing about Digital cameras, the last one i had was a film camera ten years ago. so this was my first digital camera purchase, and what a brilliant purchase it was, the amazon reviews and basic instructions were enough to know what i need and how use it, you must have a photo memory card ( not sent with the camera so when it says do you want the package YES you do!)  and you must charge the battery beforehand and check it, if you are away from home make sure you take the battery charger and if you've used it alot check the battery i forgot to do that and the third night i couldnt take photos. it warned me.. i just thought.. nah.. it will be okay. ( nope but once it charged it was fine) but not only was it easy for me to take clear wonderful photos of my reunion weekend, it was easy for my friends taking photos with it too to just use it as well.  the automatic sensing flash was nice too. the digital uploads of the photos ( with separate purchase of the cable) also could not have been easier. i also liked the little bag that came with the package. it had a nice belt clip. also if i didnt have a belt loop it was very easy to tuck in my pocket and not have to schlump a large camera and case along. it was dropped by accident on a hardwood floor and kept on going with no problems.  everybody went oh no! and i was like nope! its good! say cheese!the price couldnt have been nicer also.. very pleased with my new Canon Powershot!

Reviews.Title: A Great All Rounder
Reviews.Author: KS DEED
Reviews.Content: I am a fan of Canon Camera's, and have an older version of the Canon Rebel. However although I really bought this camera for my wife, I do enjoy taking it with me when I am out myself. It is easy to slip into the pocket, and quick to get ready to take a photo. The quality of the photos is brilliant. The colors are so vivid, and real. The Auto-focus is perhaps the best that I have seen is a compact digital camera. The screen shows what points the camera is focusing on, so you know instantly your subject is in focus - of it you need to re-frame your image.Most importantly the actual photo taking is quick. Some digital cameras will blur when the subject moves at the point the photo is taking, because of the delay in processing the photo onto your memory card. I've not had any such problems with this camera.I would recommend this camera to serious photographers who, like me just like to carry a camera everywhere they go. Or as a 1st camera for someone new to digital photography.

Reviews.Title: GREAT LITTLE CAMERA
Reviews.Author: evelyn swanson
Reviews.Content: I have had other small digital cameras, but6 this one is much easier to use.  The buttons to turn it  ON/OFF are not tiny,.the Menu is clear. Everything is great about this tiny little camera.  The photos are very good.Evelyn

Reviews.Title: Great little camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Cat Taylor
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for a Christmas gift to myself for the price point. After going through a lot of other sellers websites Amazon had the best price at the time.The camera arrived in 2 days and was opened immediately. Love the color. Camera has more features than I need but should be nice camera for what I use it for; photos of grandchildren and outdoor shots.Only drawback was that there is no a manual other than a brief tutorial. There are hints and tips built into the camera and an online 107 page manual is available. I did have some initial trouble with the Canon website but was eventually able to print it.The "case" is a flimsy piece of something so a real case will have to be purchased separately unless you buy the bundle.I've used it for moving targets, outdoor holiday displays, and portraits and all are crisp, clean, and blur free.So far, so good with this item.

Reviews.Title: Cannon PowerShot A2500 is a very nice camera with choices
Reviews.Author: Chase
Reviews.Content: The Cannon POWER SHOT A2500 is advertised as a POINT AND SHOOT so I was researching the camera for my own needs.  I had a Panasonic HM-TA2 that was great for simple point and shoot shots but this winter it was destroyed in an accidental crushing ( don't ask ).  The Panasonic was basically Point and shoot with not much more to change, only a few options, it's only down fall was the battery is not replaceable.  I wanted to find an inexpensive POINT AND SHOOT and this camera caught my eye.  You really need to look at what they are saying or even look at the USER MANUAL to understand this camera.POINT AND SHOOT - Yes, in AUTO MODE, this is a very good point and shoot camera.  There is little you need to do but aim the camera.  Even movie mode has a button just for filming movies and yes, point and shoot movies.The camera has an actual 5 power OPTICAL zoom and then it can go up to 15 power DIGITALLY.  The quality is good with the optical zoom and the digital zoom can be from good to not the best but remember it all depends on light conditions, distance and if you zoom the picture up, you need to be absolutely STILL, no shaking or movements.BUT if you want a POINT AND SHOOT that you can address some of the picture processes, this one allows you to make changes as well, this is where the USER MANUAL will become very useful.  This camera allows different settings from setting the telephoto lens, self timer timing to different optic image results.  In all honesty, this is a lot of camera, for the price, for a point and shoot and with the option to be able to adjust your camera to your needs blows away any basic point and shoot camera.The camera itself is very small and when off, the lens will stow away into the body automatically and you can easily place it in your pocket.  The weight of the camera is light so you are not uncomfortable lugging around a heavy camera, a plus if you are on vacation.I like the fact that the battery is replaceable, allowing the use of extra batteries and the memory cards can be exchanged with extreme ease.Ok, what you get, you get the camera in a box, a battery charger and a battery.  You may think it is strange that the memory card is not included, but there are too many choices out there to select a good memory card and be clear on this, there is NO MEMORY built into the camera.  YOU MUST PURCHASE A MEMORY CARD TO TAKE A SINGLE SHOT.  There are several class of memory cards and unless you plan to use the rapid fire picture taking ( 10 shots rapid fire ), a class 4 would do.  Other wise and keeping budding movie directors in mind, class 10 would be a great choice for MOVIE recording.  You also do not get any cords.  This one I didn't really understand.  There  are two cords you might need.  One to connect the camera to the computer, and if you care to, one to connect the camera to the TV.  You also do not get an outside power adaptor but there is a place on the cam to plug one in.  The camera is interesting in low light shots and the cam has a small flash built in good for close shots.  There is an optional HIGH POWER FLASH available to buy if you feel you need that kind of distance from a flash unit.All in all before you run out and buy all the accessories that you may not need, use the camera and get used to it and then determine what you need.  You will need to download the user manual from the Cannon site and then spend time learning how to use the options.  Again, if all you want is a good point and shoot, you'll hardly ever look at the User Manual but if you want to play with the options, the USER MANUAL is your friend.Look for the best price but also consider the accessories you need to get just to make the camera functional and buy the best deal.  I found a site where the camera was dirt cheap but the accessories boost the price way too high.Whether you POINT AND SHOOT or want to adjust your camera to the shots, this camera can help you with your shots.  Also look at the illustrations on UTUBE for a better idea.  also, search the web for the Canon A2500 REVIEWs where individuals and review agencies have actually taken the camera out to see what it will do.  Where they show pictures that this came has taken, they all look GREAT!For those coming from a camera like I had, this one would seem a bit over board for Point and Shoot but after you take a few shots in AUTO mode, it is as easy as pushing the button.  It is a nice choice for a simple camera and a good choice for a starter camera for those who like to make adjustments or are new to the camera field.  There are other cameras out there, My review is only about the Canon PowerShot A2500.This review was made on 03 27 2014

Reviews.Title: really good entry level camera--5 stars!!
Reviews.Author: H. DeMoss "Old British Cars"
Reviews.Content: very good basic entry level camera--large screen---have to go online to download the software for the camera, so you can download your pictures--also the instruction manual has to be downloaded online--which is okay, not really inconvenient--all in all, for less than $100--a really good buy!!

Reviews.Title: sharp pictures
Reviews.Author: N. Hoover "book granny"
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to use and takes very good pictures. I was surprised that the battery pack will save me money from buying those AA batteries all of the time. Now I will be hoping it lasts through a vacation without having to plug it in.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: LA Doctor
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and review pics. Takes good pictures too for small, compact camera. My second Canon - a good buy!

Reviews.Title: SMALL, CUTE and CRISP!!!
Reviews.Author: Alison Alexander
Reviews.Content: Well I must say I made a great buy. This little baby came with a rechargeable battery charger and a wrist string, I can't believe that!  It is so small and cute, light weight and takes out such clean and crisp pictures and it is easy to use. It is not complicated like some other digital cameras. All the steps are one after the other at the touch of your thumb. This is not a professional camera but can be used for those who like to travel whether home or abroad or just to have fun pics. I love it and would recommend it to you.

Reviews.Title: Beware this is an economy camera
Reviews.Author: KernelHappy
Reviews.Content: This isn't a bad camera per se, but it's an economy camera so be prepared if you're used to even slightly more expensive Canon P&S;'.I broke my Elph 100 HS and needed a cheap every day camera for daily use at work.  Since it's a work camera and I have a tendency to break them every 18-24 months I figured I would go cheap.  The A2500 came with a rechargeable battery and undercut other Canon P&S;' by a good $30-40 so I figured why not.I knew I was giving up OIS and LCD size, those things show up on the specs, but here are some things to be aware of:1 - It's all plastic construction, not metal, and it feels like it.2 - The controls are "dumbed down" from previous Canon P&S;, the focus mode selector (Left on D-pad - Macro, normal, infinite) now selects eco mode (how often is that something you change?), and the exposure selector (up on d-pad) is now delete/mode selector.3 - The battery is small, not sure how long it'll last4 - Despite using  the same DIGIC 4 processor as the Elph 100 HS, the continuous shooting speed is much lower (using the same memory card from the Elph)1, 2 and 3 I can live with, but 4 may be a deal breaker for me because I use the continuous shooting all the time.The picture quality is excellent for an economy unit.  If you're not picky or expecting something that feels more like other Canon P&S; camera's this may be the value you're looking for.  If you can go for the extra $30-40 I'd recommend moving up a model.

Reviews.Title: I had to contact Amazon to get the free card and case advertised.
Reviews.Author: Jessica Stritesky
Reviews.Content: Camera just arrived. I bought it as a gift so I can't speak yet to the quality of the camera. It was supposed to come with a free memory card and case, but I didn't receive these. I just chatted with an Amazon representative who helped me place a free order for these. Looks like the memory card will ship out right away but the case does not have a delivery date yet. Hoping it will arrive before Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Yay!
Reviews.Author: J.L.
Reviews.Content: So far, so good!  Very pleased with this camera!  Love a rechargeable battery... also has not died yet like my previous Fuji did after six months.

Reviews.Title: A2500 a good camera
Reviews.Author: President Charley "Noneeno"
Reviews.Content: I like the 'one button' record on the back of the camera.  When the power is on, you don't have to switch between photo and record, just press the record button.  Takes great photos and video, but I wish it had a way to switch to 480p video when the 720 isn't necessary.  Otherwise a nice camera.

Reviews.Title: So easy to use!
Reviews.Author: tootlez Mom
Reviews.Content: So lightweight and easy to use I wish I had gotten one sooner. loaded with great features.only cons. haven't had time to learn how to use all the features yet.

Reviews.Title: Pictures Anytime, Anywhere
Reviews.Author: Brenda B Hollenbeck
Reviews.Content: My husband has a very expensive, very big camera that takes beautiful pictures, but is just too cumbersome to carry everywhere.  There have been numerous times that we've seen something that would be a wonderful picture but we didn't have the camera with us.  This camera fits right in my purse and I carry it everywhere and have already taken some pictures that we would have missed otherwise.  Just what I had been asking for.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera.
Reviews.Author: Suzi Girl
Reviews.Content: I have a really complicated Canon with a lot of bells and whistles that takes really great pictures but I ALWAYS get lost trying to figure out how to do something as simple as turning off the flash option. I literally spent 30 minutes trying to figure it out and finally just gave up.I have a huge need to sell a bunch of stuff and pictures are an absolute must for posting on the web. The flash on the big older Canon made that impossible, good pics but not so great with a reflection of flash in them.I've always had good luck with Canon and I think the quality is very good so, I started researching and trying to find a less complicated point and shoot optionI read the reviews on this camera and thought I'd give it a try. It is simple to use, takes good pictures and I think it will be great for it's intended use or for whatever I decide to use it for.It wasn't such a big deal that it doesn't come with a memory card, I just pulled the one out of my other Canon and use that.I like the point and shoot aspects and it's small so I can store it anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot A2500 16MP digital camera
Reviews.Author: Jeanette M Wells
Reviews.Content: This camera is wonderful. I am enjoying my camera very much. It takes really good pictures and videos. Great buy

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the size and price
Reviews.Author: Richard O'Bannion
Reviews.Content: It's a budget Canon for sure but doesn't mean it's low on features and quality. The A2500 came with a rechargeable battery and was better priced than most other basic Cannons.  It still has a slightly cheap feel though probably because of the plastic housing.It's also slightly on the slow side when processing the image, not a big deal but tends to throw of your timing.  The image quality itself is good.  So all in all it's a priced well for what you get.

Reviews.Title: Simple and Easy To Use
Reviews.Author: Michael V. Thacker
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for anyone who wants to give it as a gift to a person who may not be familiar with digital cameras and the basics of photography. The camera is extremely easy to use and simple menus and controls make it very easy for someone who maybe doesn't have the best familiarity with electronics or cameras in general. Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Poor color rendition for flash shots indoors.
Reviews.Author: Robert Hart
Reviews.Content: The AUTO feature does not correctly yield the correct color cast for flash shots.  Fortunately I am able to correct the color with my picture editing program on my computer.

Reviews.Title: Really like this camera
Reviews.Author: Mary Bay
Reviews.Content: My old Kodak digital bit the dust and I needed a point & shoot camera for my vacation. This is easy to use and although there are more features that I need to learn, this was great for what I needed on my vacation. The only negative thing for me is that I had to download and print the 'full' users manual so I didn't have to read it online.

Reviews.Title: Where is the download cable?
Reviews.Author: TLW
Reviews.Content: Why would a camera be sold without the cable to download pictures to a computer? This is the 4th digital camera have purchased and the only one that didn't include the cable. Also, it does not come with a manual. You have to download it from the cannon website. It would be nice to have a small hard copy, as all my other cameras came with. Not convinced that this package is worth the $100 price tag.

Reviews.Title: How should I know how well it works?
Reviews.Author: Cat Camp
Reviews.Content: Received camera, charged up the battery, inserted a memory card, read the instructions & pushed the "On" button. Lens doesn't open completely. Try gently turning camera off, waiting 15sec., turning on again. Same thing, lens won't open. This time the screen gives the error message "Lens error-Will shut off automatically-Restart camera". What? *sigh* Fine. Try it a few more times; sometimes getting the error message & sometimes not. Now, I have to hassle with return & refund, because I cannot get a replacement. Trip starts in 2 weeks. Oh boy...

Reviews.Title: A Fun and extremely capable digital camera
Reviews.Author: agent03
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research and came to the conclusion that this camera offered me the most for the least amount of money.  I purchased for my wife's birthday and I wanted to get her a camera that was easy to use and took great pictures.  This product does just that.  not only does it take great pictures but also takes excellent video, up to an hour using the 16 GB memory card.  I own other canon products and have always been happy with there performance.  I was not disappointed with this camera.  It came as a bundle from Amazon, camera, 16 GB memory and case.  Great deal!

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot A2500 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Bob Gallagher
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice compact camera that fits in my shirt pocket and that takes excellent pictures. It has many features that will make it very useful for my photo taking assignments!

Reviews.Title: Birthday present for 10 year old daughter
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Frank"
Reviews.Content: She was extremely happy with it and has been taking beautiful photos with it. I actually did a lot of research to find a camera that was easy to use but took quality photos and wasn't expensive, but wasn't too cheap either. This camera will last her for years. Here's what I was looking for and found in this camera:1. "anti-shake" - it does have image stabilization - important for kids and my wife2. Zoom - 5x3. Modes - easy to select shooting modes for various situations.4. Nice size LCD display - 2.7 inch5. More megapixels than necessary - a bonus at 16 MP6. HD video recording7. She likes the color8. Just the right size for her9. SDHC card bought separately - which I prefer since I wanted to chose one myself.Of course it has many other features and functions that she will discover as she learns more about photography.Not an outstanding camera but for the price and convenience it is a great value.

Reviews.Title: My PowerShot A2500
Reviews.Author: rudysjudy
Reviews.Content: I like this camera as it gives you many choices of what kind of picture you want.  With that being said, the camera is great but there needs to be an easier way to use the functions, as the manual has to be downloaded from the internet & there are too many pages to print.

Reviews.Title: SuperDuper Camera
Reviews.Author: Michael Driskill "Being changed"
Reviews.Content: My wife and I love this little camera. It takes super pictures and it so easy to use a 4th grader would know how to use it. I like that it fits in the palm of your hand, the battery lasts and lasts, the videos I took were crisp and sharp, and the price was the best deal in town. It is perfect for any occasion, and the accessory transfer cable not only acts as a charger, but allows me to transfer my pictures to my photo program without having to open the camera and remove the SD card. Not fancy, but practical for the price.

Reviews.Title: PowerShot Button Placement is Lousy
Reviews.Author: Dirk Gates
Reviews.Content: Do the folks at Canon not have thumbs? Why do all of the PowerShots have a record button RIGHT where the thumb would rest? Smarter designs have a no-button area there, and maybe even a nice patch of rubber for your thumb to rest comfortably.Canon, don't you do any R&D; with actual people holding the dang camera?

Reviews.Title: Lots of functions to learn on this camera
Reviews.Author: citizen fact checker
Reviews.Content: Like many other owners of this camera, I downloaded the manual onto my iPad2 home screen rather than print the 100-plus pages. There are many functions to discover and implement--including a self-timer, and the iPad makes it convenient to learn the functions, even when I am waiting at the doctor's office. That being said, I still have not learned all the functions because the numerous icons therein are like learning a foreign language. But I AM learning them little by little.Because I am a beginner with digital cameras, I am using the most-basic functions first, such as using auto-focus pretty nearly exclusively to help me become familiar with the camera. So far so good, and I truly enjoy using the camera and printing the photos, which have all come out to my satisfaction. Getting back to the manual:  This 100-plus page manual is packed with information making this camera surprisingly high-tech for such a compact camera. Without the manual to describe and explain all the functions, I doubt that I would enjoy this camera as much as I do. And the camera price is extremely reasonable, as is that of the case that protects it well.As for having to buy a memory card, as one reviewer pointed out, when we used to buy NEW film cameras we did not expect to receive a free roll of film with it.USB cable not included! either! but check the online manual and you may find it listed under "Optional Accessories."

Reviews.Title: Not the best photos :(
Reviews.Author: Melanie T.
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to take on vacation after researching cameras online. I thought perfect for what I wanted.  I was unhappy with the quality of the photos; they are grainy, the color was not vibrant (I was on the Mayan Riviera, south of Cancun where EVERYTHING is vibrant and colorful!) and quite a few of the photos had shadows and a smoky appearance.  No amount of re-setting and trying no flash, auto flash, etc worked.  I read the instruction booklet over several times and even had my husband review to make sure I hadn't missed anything.

Reviews.Title: Good Intro Level Camera
Reviews.Author: Barron Domenici
Reviews.Content: Camera is definitely useful. Takes good pictures (Even in some lower light situations) and take good video (Only 720p). Really good for the price point of $100.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: PhilAZ
Reviews.Content: For $99 this is a good camera.  I needed something lightweight for hiking/fishing etc when I do not want to take my SLR.  The quality is fine and the capabilities are good for the money.  Battery lasted 10 days with light use including some video, so I feel that is OK.  This camera allows you to always have a capabilty in your pocket, certainly better than the typical phone camera, and with longer battery life.

Reviews.Title: Bad Camera!
Reviews.Author: ELLEN SUSSMAN
Reviews.Content: I returned it!  All the pictures were blurry; and when checking it out on YouTube, I found that others had the same experience...out of focus pictures.  I am now looking for a camera to replace this but am leary since the reviews were good.  Apparently people were paid to say it was good, or Canon put out a big batch of bad cameras!  Since I had another Canon that I wasn't happy with years ago, I won't buy another Canon.

Reviews.Title: Not satisfied
Reviews.Author: Miranda
Reviews.Content: Took this camera to Disneyland and it kept freezing and had lines going through it so the pictures didnt turn out very well. Really want to return.

Reviews.Title: its good
Reviews.Author: mzamoo3
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves it. My husband got it for her as a Xmas gift and she loves it. The picture quality is very good and easy to use. Would recommend!�

Reviews.Title: cheap
Reviews.Author: Dorthie
Reviews.Content: wow. for the money spent on this piece of plastic....Spend $20 more and get a real camera. The reviews I read were great. NOT TRUE!

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Sharli Hocker
Reviews.Content: I love this camera first of all the color red, takes good pictures and videos and it is easy to use.  I would recommend this for amature photographers

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Pam Billings
Reviews.Content: I got this camera as my old Powershot broke and I needed to replace it. This one is better. I love the fact it is lightweight and slimmer than my old one. I think it takes better pictures than the old camera. I also love the improved feature of just hitting a button to go into movie mode. So for the money it is a great deal and I am really enjoying taking pictures with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot
Reviews.Author: Bonnie J Reeves
Reviews.Content: Love it.  Waiting for the manual to arrive so I can better understand it. I called Canon & they were happy to send out a manual.

Reviews.Title: User Guide is MISLEADING & CONFUSING
Reviews.Author: Janet
Reviews.Content: Upon receiving my camera, I was reading the User Guide. I read that it was supposed to come with a Power Cord. The Power Cord was NOT in with the camera and other accessories. I contacted Amazon about this, they sent me another one. Same thing happened. NOT HAPPY!! I thought about contacting Canon about this issue, but I have already wasted enough of my time on this. I just will NOT purchase any Canon products!!! VERY MISLEADING AND CONFUSING

Reviews.Title: OK but not great
Reviews.Author: Patrick A. Olivolo
Reviews.Content: No problems with the camera. It works fine.When I compared it to my Eos Rebel with the same pixels it's almost but not quite as sharp as the rebel. The only real complaint I have is there is no timer to allow you to get into the picture. Still a good buy for the money.

Reviews.Title: Highly Recommended
Reviews.Author: SMS
Reviews.Content: My answer to this is somewhat paradoxical in that once you have figured out all of the complexities of the menu functions and how to set it up...it becomes one of the best quality and easily operated digital cameras of its kind. Simply as advice to the prospective buyer I would hardily advise you to purchase its case and a good high quality (#10) Flash Memory Card with this camera. Even though it functions extremely well and is quite competitive with higher priced cameras it is small and delicate in nature. sms

Reviews.Title: Experiment with the Settings and You Get Excellent Pictures
Reviews.Author: Tim H.
Reviews.Content: A lot of my friends can't believe how crisp the pictures are even in low light conditions.  I have taken crisp pictures of small birds utilizing the zoom function.  For a low end camera, it takes very good pictures.  It pays to read the manual AND experiment with the function settings.  For example, there is a setting for low light conditions (which may trigger the flash) but I have found that changing the ISP speed to 1600 can give nice clear pictures in low light without a flash.  It pays to experiment with this camera since the correct settings result in brilliant pictures.  One really needs to take a lot of pictures of one subject in the same setting to get a good idea how these settings work.  Once you grasp the proper settings, the pictures are excellent!

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: Abbie
Reviews.Content: I got this camera to replace a Sony cybershot that gotten broken. I saw a lot of good reviews, and I even researched it in comparisons to other similar cameras. I found through everything that I read that it was a nice family camera with some good capabilites to help with auto focusing and such. I was pretty excited to test it out after I had read all the good stuff said, but when I got down to testing all of its capabilties I found it to fall short of all of the expectations.Pros: the color the video button.Cons:Most photos are grainyIt takes terrible inside photosauto focus doesn't seem to workphotos always seem to blur whether the target is moving or stillall of the camera settings are mediocrehave to take the battery out to charge itdoes not come with a computer cordI could go on and on about all the things this camera disappointed me with, but I think it may just be because my sony was just awesome. I just expected more from a camera that just debuted in February of this year. I mean I guess this camera will work for me since it was only $85, but I just had really expected more from what everyone said. Also the outdoor pictures seem to only look good if your taking pictures of scenary.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Sahaphume Srisuma
Reviews.Content: This is matched with my expectation. Really good quality.User friendly, both auto mode and others.My favorite mode is supervivid, it is great for fall foliage.

Reviews.Title: Just the perfect camera
Reviews.Author: Betty J. Walker
Reviews.Content: Camera takes perfect pictures and is perfect size.  Take it everywhere.  All pictures are very clear and the camera is so easy to use

Reviews.Title: Canon powershot A2500
Reviews.Author: Angela
Reviews.Content: Purchased for our daughter's 9th birthday. It's simple to use, takes quality pictures, and the rechargeable battery has me wanting one for myself over buying batteries for my current canon camera! She loves it!

Reviews.Title: Compact and a light weight.
Reviews.Author: Sista grl!!
Reviews.Content: I love my camera.  I recommend getting a bigger memory card with this camera.  It's relatively easy to learn the creative tools in shooting up close and video from this camera.  Besides I am a big supporter of Canon products. I am truly happy with my pictures, my camera strap and the easy to push buttons.

Reviews.Title: canon camera
Reviews.Author: nancy
Reviews.Content: I like this little camera, especially that it has a video.  easy to use.  I have a dslr canon, but this is nice and light for simple shots.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Mandy
Reviews.Content: A little smaller than I have expected. It's quite light, also easy to operate. It doesnt contain the memory card or USB wire.

Reviews.Title: great little camera and movie taker
Reviews.Author: sheri
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera for the bucks.  We have had it for a couple of months after our worthless Sony Cybeshot,,  realy shot,, and this is so much better.  The movies are clear and better than what we had expected.  Just be sure to order a for it,  get a big one for the movies.

Reviews.Title: my review
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Beier
Reviews.Content: shutter speed is a little slower than i anticipated, however; it is a good working camera, very small.  would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Not up to par for expected performance
Reviews.Author: Ann Owens
Reviews.Content: Do not like camera...photos are not up to par from less expensive older one.  Will not use it again.  Will keep it strictly as emergency backup but not happy about it.

Reviews.Title: It's OK
Reviews.Author: Frederick T Abbott
Reviews.Content: Nice little inexpensive point & shoot, it is what it is, but it is disappointing that it does not come with a USB cable, only a wall charger, so you have to spend another $10 or so and get a cable so you can connect it to you computer/device and download or charge. I ordered a second battery and charger just in case, and that charger is also able to plug into a car, so it is portable! This seems to be a good little camera tho, I ordered an Olympus vr340 first, and loved it , until I went to see how it worked and the shutter button wouldn't operate...so sent it back and got this one, Canons are good and this is a simple stupid point & shoot that my wife can use to replace the old Casio Exslim that got dropped!

Reviews.Title: No warranty because I bought it from Amazon!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Cappuchino
Reviews.Content: I had the camera for about 6 months and it quit working.  I sent it back to Canon and they said my warranty is null and void because I bought it from Amazon.  I couldn't believe it!  They don't warranty the largest retailer in the world!  Also,  I left the Wausabi battery in the camera, so they could see it was charged.  My warranty was again null and void because I used a Wausabi battery recommended by Amazon.  They must really  hate Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Takes nice pictures but.....
Reviews.Author: Zach
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is great but the lag between shutter and saving the photo gives enough time to miss another good shot. Maybe a setting needs to be altered to make this better but I am tech savvy and it seems this is just what you get for a $60 camera. I would have returned it but it was out of the window for return. Canon's all the way when it comes to point and shoots, just not this one.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera Still Learning
Reviews.Author: marma2
Reviews.Content: A2500 replaced a more expensive Canon I got through Amex rewards. While traveling on the train or on the street in Manhattan I lost it.. It was very sleek and slippery LOL  Time went by, I found the need to have a camera beyong iphone, ipad. I ordered this camera and I am learning how to use it.What I have found is that I need to learn about: no blur, MACRO (close up) --for novices like me. I need  wide lens features and the ability to fade out unwanted subject in the background.. I have not learned how to use all the features. I have taken very nice shots and not so nice shots experimenting. I find that sharpness is something to be explored in the manual. I am sure Canon tries to keep cost down by not providing a printed out manual but I wanted one and I did the unthinkable:-- printed it out! put it in a three ring  binder! old school I guess! I can point and shoot as described in the product section of this listing. This camera is a nicely priced one and If I should get careless again only this time drive over it!, well it won't cost me an arm and a leg to replace!.. The manual consists of 109  pages! That means there is a lot to learn! I went to manual websites to see how much a manual would cost to buy. The manual service charges between $12.95 plus the shipping cost! and up.I had the typing paper and the ink so I printed it out!Hope this helps you! I am already researching another Canon digital 16 mega because I need close ups of moving animals! i.e. parrots! I would add I bought a .99cent cable UBS cord (reviewed) and two extra batteries from Clearmax and an extra battery recharger. The clearmax battery charges in one hour. The Canon battery that came with this camera charges in 21/2 hours. I bought a SD HC device/card 16GB.  Remember: the SDHC card DOES NOT come with the camera. I am going to get a case and more accessories for my camera. Hope this helps!  from a newbie

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2500 16MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Image is an ok Camera as it takes great pictures
Reviews.Author: Lindsworth Deer
Reviews.Content: Canon PowerShot A2500 16MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Image is an ok Camera as it takes great pictures. It just has one queer flaw. If not fully charged, pictures taken with the device come out unreadable by any image software I have on my computer.I've tried everything to solve this problem. The fault seems to lie with the Battery Charge; if it falls below a certain level and you take a photograph, it renders it unreadable. Great Camera for photojournalism and stock photography but I'm finding it hard to rely on it in a pinch to take photos and have access to them when I return home

Reviews.Title: Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: luckymary
Reviews.Content: A few months ago I purchased this Camera,I love it .Recently I lost the camera ,and could not wait to order a replacement for it.The camera is compact and takes beautiful clear pictures.Thanks Amazon  Lucky Mary

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot A2500 great pictures affordable price
Reviews.Author: KDOG66 "TROUT66"
Reviews.Content: The camera takes great pictures and is a nice size a must have its great for kids and adults who just want to have fun.

Reviews.Title: Good little camera for general use
Reviews.Author: Deborah Silva Alvarado
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, fast to set up, compact, couldn't be happier.  BTW, you can load the pics using just the flash memory card (I bought the SanDisk Ultra 16 GB)  I was worried I wouldn't be able to load the pics to the computer without the (not included) UCB cord.  The software tells you it "needs" the cord to select the right and appropriate yada yada...but that is not true because if you put the memory card into the computer the pictures load.

Reviews.Title: Nice Little camera
Reviews.Author: E. Clark "Eaclark"
Reviews.Content: Pictures are very good, but the menu is different that Niken Coolpix so I'm adjusting. There's no USB cable for recharging battery- you remove the battery and charge it in its own charger. This might not be a bad thing. Of course there is USB port to transport images. Camera didn't come with a USB cable, but I had one that fits so that's what I use. For about $100, a very good deal.

Reviews.Title: Not as good as my old Canon PowerShot S500 digital elph
Reviews.Author: Judith B
Reviews.Content: This camera has some nice features but despite adjusting settings or using the Auto mode, the colors are not true.  It seems to take a lot more work to take "good" pictures as compared to my old Canon, and even with that, they're still not as clear and true to color.

Reviews.Title: I like my Power Shot
Reviews.Author: Barbara J. Tobin
Reviews.Content: this is a very user friendly camera love that I just take the card out and plug it into my computer to download pics no cables to keep track of

Reviews.Title: Didn't like it at all - returned it!
Reviews.Author: K.K.
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera thinking it's from Canon so it must be good.  I took it on an international vacation and most of the pictures came out blurry.  It takes a long time for the camera to take a picture and you basically "lose the moment" because the camera is so slow.  Its a good camera if you'll only take closeups indoor.  I'm so disappointed that I took such a bad quality camera on my trip and now don't have good pictures.  Returned it!

Reviews.Title: It's OK.
Reviews.Author: Judy
Reviews.Content: It's better than a Nikon, but is slow to respond to pushing the button to take the picture.  I have 4 grandkids and want to take instant pictures (they move fast) and it won't respond fast enough for that.

Reviews.Title: not user-friendly
Reviews.Author: Robyn Alana Engel
Reviews.Content: This camera is cute and takes decent photos, but it's not user-friendly. In fact, it's rather confusing. There are too many different settings and functions, and it too easily switches from one to another. I got it for its simplicity, so I'm disappointed. My tech-savvy friends got flustered with it when I asked them to take simple photos with it on my birthday. If you work for Canon, Yarii, I don't advise continuing to endorse this product. Canon makes lots of good camera, but this isn't one of them.

Reviews.Title: Make sure you click on your free accessories!!!!
Reviews.Author: car34jojo "Car34jojo"
Reviews.Content: Very upset that a camera case and 16GB card to come with it and it did not.  To find out you had to do an extra step and click on the free items.  This was a gift for my mom while she was here in town paid $30 to have it overnight and now it is not complete.  Not amazon's fault it was my own for not realizing there is another step.

Reviews.Title: Superior camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: rene trudel
Reviews.Content: I purchesed this camera for my vacation to Burmuda. I wanted a point and click that was easy to carry and took quality pictures. After reading reviews of 12 cameras I choose Canon A2500. The first time I used it was on my cruise to Bermuda. I took 258 pictures on that vacation and was totally satified.The camera was easy to focus and the pictures were clear.

Reviews.Title: Average Camera at best
Reviews.Author: J. Hacker
Reviews.Content: My biggest issues with this camera are:1) extremely short battery life2) blurry picturesThis is a decent camera for outside during the day with optimal lighting, but if you try to take pictures in less then optimal lighting this camera really shows it's weakness.  I only get about 30-40 pictures before the battery dies, you need to take multiple pictures due to how often pictures come out blurry.  If you want a really good camera your going to have to spend in the $200+ price range, these $100 and under cameras are not worth the money IMO.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy!
Reviews.Author: timetraveler02138
Reviews.Content: I have a smart phone with an excellent camera but it is large and not as easy to carry or operate as this Canon which takes equally good or better pictures. I got it for $59 recently and I do see price fluctuations on this website. I was a little thrown by what appears to be fewer buttons than my last Canon. For camera operation go to Canon.com and look at the manual; they also have the software to download to your computer so you can transfer images. This is the smallest, lightest weight, fit in your shirt pocket camera I've seen. For $59 it was a super bargain. And it has a great deal of versatility of operation for the interested photographer, explained in the manual. Overall I think It is better for photography than the top of the line smart phone.

Reviews.Title: Problems with delay in between taking pictures
Reviews.Author: mayo222 "Matt"
Reviews.Content: I ended up returning the camera due to problems with the camera, but here are the comments I had after my short time with it:Pro:+Decent features considering the price+Compact size, very similar to the Canon ELPH series+Good picture quality.  Better than my smartphone which was one of my ultimate desires+Rechargeable and removable batteryCons:-Extremely minor and probably not worth mentioning, but my previous Canon came with a small plastic piece to tighten/loosen the loop on the string that attaches to the camera.  Depending on the shot, I like to tighten the loop around my wrist in case I drop the camera-Lag between photos.  This is the reason I returned the camera.  I found I was missing lots of shots because of the delay in between taking photos.  No other reviews on Amazon mentioned lag between taking photos and there is a noticeable difference even between this canon and my 5 year old canon I intended to replace. I picked this camera over a Nikon with a couple more features I would have rather had because the Nikon had lots of reviews mentioning horrible lag between photos.I realize this is a very short review, bu given my short time with the camera its all I could think of and based on the camera I received.

Reviews.Title: Okay camera for okay price
Reviews.Author: D. Vaughan
Reviews.Content: Needed an inexpensive point and shoot, this camera fit the bill.  Photo quality is okay, nothing great but not terrible.  Better than a camera phone (mostly) but far from a dslr.  Battery holds up well, is easy to carry, and preforms as advertised.  If you're looking for an affordable point and shoot that is easy to use, this on definitely fits the bill.

Reviews.Title: PowerShot is a PowerHit !
Reviews.Author: Phillip
Reviews.Content: Love this camera very convenient, pictures are very crisp and colorful. A friend of mine is a professional photographer and loves this point and shoot model. Also love Canon electronic items whether it is their printers, cameras or whatever ! Go Canon !

Reviews.Title: Perhaps I need a more expensive camera
Reviews.Author: Teddy
Reviews.Content: This camera is pretty good for the price, but I find that it is not exceptional.  I'm not sure if the image quality is much better than my phone, although I haven't yet uploaded the images to my computer (I'm still waiting for the cable to ship).  The settings menus is particularly lacking, I can't even take a shot that delays a few seconds to take the picture.  It takes a second for the image to focus, so the images can be slightly blurry if you're not careful.  It is a good point and shoot camera for the price, but I would go to the next price level if you want to take high quality pictures.

Reviews.Title: Okay Camera
Reviews.Author: L. Myslicki
Reviews.Content: The quality of the pictures are exactly what you would expect from a camera at this price range. My main complaint is you can not charge the battery without taking it out of the camera and putting it in the charger. I much prefer being able to charge it in the camera this is the reason for my low rating and not recommending anyone buy this camera.

Reviews.Title: Nearly Foolproof
Reviews.Author: J. Moore
Reviews.Content: My wife's film camera finally expired, which was good because I believe we might otherwise have had to send film to Bangladesh to be developed.  She is a technophobe and this new camera was an adventuresome step.  I did a Google search on "simple digital cameras" and several showed up.  The Canon was a tradeoff between features and price.  It is indeed simple.  Set on automatic, it seems to handle most situations.  My only complaint is that it has a rechargeable battery, so the charger has to be carried along.

Reviews.Title: helluva deal!
Reviews.Author: stephen wolford
Reviews.Content: i wanted a quality camera without a high price point to take on camping trips and vacations without worrying if anything where to happen to it. takes incredibly nice pictures and is a great value for the price!

Reviews.Title: It was what I ordered and came when it was supposed to.
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Kearns
Reviews.Content: Love this camera.  Do not own an I phone and do not want one.  I have a camera that takes pictures and phone that works fine.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Use
Reviews.Author: Dan F.
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera for the price.  Everything a novice needs!  Small and lightweight.Only issue is no USB Cable provided.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Lucky Jane
Reviews.Content: The camera is easy to begin using.  Then when you connect it to the computer with a cord purchased separately a screenmessage appears to guide you.  I recommend this camera.  The picture are good.

Reviews.Title: Great product, love it
Reviews.Author: assafmalki
Reviews.Content: Needs some required adds on due. I would love it even more if they would give a PC cable for it, a case (it looks very fragile) and maybe a cheap memory card (just maybe) :)

Reviews.Title: good niffy little camera
Reviews.Author: Paul Kim "macho paul"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my church and it's quite good knowing that this thing is less tan $ 100.  good picture with all the functions you need.  it's made out of cheaper feeling plastic material but still good.

Reviews.Title: A great buy, I am happy I bought it.
Reviews.Author: gerald d coraine
Reviews.Content: I like My new camera very much. Easy to use (I am not a pro), I just like a camera to capture 'Kodak Moments', if You will. It takes great pictures, very sharp and clear without any hard work. The camera does all the thinking for Me.I recommend it for anyone who just wants to capture happy events for posterity. I especially like the re-chargeable battery. Plus, I think I paid $59.99 for it on Amazon. A one time deal, wait for it again.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: DEANGELIA B.
Reviews.Content: I BOUGHT THIS FOR MY MOTHER WHO IS VIRGIN OF CAMERAS. THIS IS VERY EASY TO USE FOR A BEGINNER. THE CAMERA IS VERY LITE WEIGHT AND SMALL

Reviews.Title: Small but takes great pictures.
Reviews.Author: SuSu "SuSu"
Reviews.Content: This is my go everywhere camera and honestly am getting better pix than from my large pro style camera. Go figure.

Reviews.Title: A handy camera to have around
Reviews.Author: Mark A. Thompson
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a vacation I was taking. I took it on my trip and got great pictures. It was compact, easy to use, the battery life was excellent and it looks great too. I am glad I purchased this camera and keep it with me in case I want to snap a photo while out and about. This was a good buy.

Reviews.Title: GREAT little camera
Reviews.Author: Grizzles
Reviews.Content: I wanted a simple point and shoot and does this ever fit the bill. The picture quality is excellent and it is so easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Camera
Reviews.Author: Bruce Abele
Reviews.Content: A bit tricky to learn how to use all the features. The big benefit is that it is easy to carry and it takes superb photos and video. I had an earlier version that was either stolen or lost and replaced it with this one which has more features and is easier to use.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: zeva
Reviews.Content: I love it! It is easy to use and the very slim design is great to carry it in my purse at all times!  The delivery of this item was very quick which always makes me happy!  I really like the rechargeable battery and the wall charger that comes with it.  I had an older version of this camera and really liked it but it was a bit too bulky, and real bummed out when I broke it.  This one is so much better!  The battery last on a charge for a long time as opposed to my older camera which seemed to need new batteries every time I used it.  Really happy with this purchase!

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Rebecca
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this camera and its features. Clear outdoor, indoor, close up and love the zoom feature. Have some great pics of the moon and wildlife closeups due to this feature. I highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Works well, canon repair is fast, allergic to moisture
Reviews.Author: James Tomkinson
Reviews.Content: This is probably the 4th of this Canon series we've owned, as we seem to need an upgrade every other year (pick-pockets in Buenos Aires, etc).The camera is affordable, easy to use, yet versatile (a good blend for two people with different skills).I will say that our visits to ocean-side have shown the camera to be a bit sensitive to water (ocean spray and it lost power) and sand (one tiny grain froze the lens motor).  However, Canon has been generous, leaning towards 2 free camera repairs that was partly my fault because of this (here is the word of mouth they are hoping for!).  The repair is a breeze with self-printing labels and email status.Oh and those sunset pictures from Costa Rica are priceless !

Reviews.Title: Great pictures from a small camera
Reviews.Author: Angelo Americo
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera last week looking for a new camera. My old Kodak camera was good; but it was very heavy to carry around. My iPod touch has a camera, but no flash so pictures were always crummy.The Canon PowerShot A2500 is much lighter than my Kodak AND takes better pictures anywhere. I read other reviews that said it doesn't do well in low light situations. I took a number of pictures inside a darkened night club Saturday night and the pictures were so clear you'd think the night club was brightly lit.I feel this is an incredible compact camera that is budgeted just right. I bought mine for $59 and free shipping. If you're looking for a small camera with lots of potential. Get the Canon PowerShot A2500. You won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: canon A2500 a very good camera
Reviews.Author: Dimitry Kirillov
Reviews.Content: the camera was delivered very fast. It has everything which is necessary for my simple work. It has very good optics and easy to operate. The price is also very good.

Reviews.Title: No more, no less.  Enough is enough.
Reviews.Author: VinD
Reviews.Content: I'm a novice and  it for close-ups of food, family movies and portraits Then I upload them to my laptop. Fits my needs perfectly, budget, use, durability. Clear picture, decent batter life (order a back-up), and a SD card.

Reviews.Title: Camera works like a charm
Reviews.Author: Nancy V. Burns "Grammy Nan"
Reviews.Content: This is the second camera I've received and love it. The first camera came without the charger in the box and no memory card which I was promised in my initial purchase.I have no problems with this camera and just downloaded the user's manual to learn all the different settings I need to know about. I've got the time and date set, and I'm ready to take birthday pictures this weekend as well as some things I'm going to be selling on Craigslist.I would recommend this model of camera for anyone who just wants to "click and shoot".

Reviews.Title: Cheap feeling
Reviews.Author: jeni
Reviews.Content: I purchased this because I had a newborn and wanted to take a lot of good quality photos. I couldn't get past how cheap it felt though. Returned it shortly after.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: stormin norman
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and takes excellent shots Just a awesome little camera....love it.......easy to carry like a pack of smokes.i do not smoke anymore.

Reviews.Title: Perfectly decent photos
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: For such a small, lightweight camera the A2500 does a great job, at least on indoor snaps.  Haven't tried it outdoors yet.

Reviews.Title: Great little Camera!
Reviews.Author: Techy Gal
Reviews.Content: The battery in My Nikon Coolpix Camera will not hold a charge so I decided it was time to get another camera.  This camera was given a decent rating by Consumer Reports so I bought it.  I also purchased the case from the Canon website as they don't offer it on Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, especially for the price!
Reviews.Author: A.S.
Reviews.Content: Got this for my daughter since it was relatively well priced but still a name-brand with all the features she needs (automatic still pics & video clips).  It's very easy to use.  Love the dedicated video record button.  The pictures come out great.It's a wonderful compact size and very light.  The only thing I'd want changed on it is to have AA batteries.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: rayallenmoore
Reviews.Content: I just got the camera today and I love it. It takes sharp pics and the auto mode is excellent. The one thing I noticed right away is how light it is. It doesn't feel as sturdy I I would like but that's just because of its light weight design.

Reviews.Title: A very good camera
Reviews.Author: Gary T.
Reviews.Content: The camera is exactly what I wanted.  The only problem I had and it was my fault, It didn't come with memory. I had to purchase that extra, but still a great camera thanks

Reviews.Title: Good little camera
Reviews.Author: cheapmommy
Reviews.Content: Pros- great quality pics; small; easy to use; looks pretty; portable.Cons- it doesn't come with a memory card or internal memory; there is a delay between photos even with the review feature is turned off; the flash is delayed- I think this is standard with most cameras.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Renee
Reviews.Content: Good camera for a person who just wantsa good, basic picture.  My older camera brokeright before Christmas.  I quickly ordered this andit was shipped quickly, as well.  Very nice camera.Easy to use. Great service and good price.

Reviews.Title: not what I hope for
Reviews.Author: Kat D. Tachera "Kat 0=)"
Reviews.Content: This little point and shoot is okay but doesn't do anything more than my phone can do. I bought it as a gift for someone who received a much better camera from her husband, so I'm stuck with it.  It's now sitting in the box on my dresser unused.

Reviews.Title: On time delivery!
Reviews.Author: Alex Lara
Reviews.Content: Very good point and shoot camera.  Canon doesn't disappoint me ever.  Although should've provided a SD card for the price.

Reviews.Title: digital camera
Reviews.Author: J. KELLY "OLD STICHER"
Reviews.Content: I am having a lot of trouble with this camera. I don't find it user friendly and the book ins't either. I will stay with my sanyo that is 10MP it is much easier to use and take video's on. This was a disappointment.

Reviews.Title: The perfect digital camera
Reviews.Author: Fiona Blake
Reviews.Content: My daughter did some extensive research on digital cameras and decided to buy the Cannon PowerShot  A2500.  This was a Christmas gift for her dad.  Happy to say, he loved and he uses it everyday.  Great camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: not the best
Reviews.Author: David R.
Reviews.Content: for the price its okay, the pics dont come out very clear, and its not so easy to figure out the settings

Reviews.Title: It's a nice little camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Emelia
Reviews.Content: I was hoping the picture quality would be better and you have to buy your own memory card;it doesn't come with one. It can't even hold a single picture without one like my other camera could. I suppose for the price though, it's a decent little camera. Really no other complaints.

Reviews.Title: My new camera
Reviews.Author: james mccann
Reviews.Content: Its easy to use and connect to the computer, pictures are good and it so small i can carry it in my shirt pocket.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2500 16MP Digital Camera with 5x zoom
Reviews.Author: amaz pennam
Reviews.Content: -its good - nice and simple, (bottom line is i like it)- seems to be very well made-yes i would reccomend ot others

Reviews.Title: I always trust a Canon Camera
Reviews.Author: bigal
Reviews.Content: This is my third Canon camera I have had in the last fifteen years and I love them all.  They are simple to use and the pictures are beautiful.

Reviews.Title: exactly what it says it's for
Reviews.Author: Spangy
Reviews.Content: its exactly what it says its for point and shoot Iove it its not professional level but.that's not what I wanted this for I was almost turned away by the negative comments but I'm glad I made this purchase :) super thumbs up!

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Richard C. Parvin "RCParvin"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  It is so easy to use that I didn't read the instructions.  It takes great pictures.  The zoom feature works very well.  Seems to keep a charge forever.  Connects to my laptop seamlessly making it easy to upload pictures to Facebook, print and send to family via snail mail or email.

Reviews.Title: My new Canon PowerShot
Reviews.Author: Mariam Smith
Reviews.Content: It was just the camera for my needs...easy to learn and use.  I have needed and up graded camera for a long time and this one just fits my needs.  Glad I ordered it.

Reviews.Title: It's small size packs a powerful punch.
Reviews.Author: Natalie
Reviews.Content: My Canon camera is perfect for me. It's small size packs a powerful punch. I've recorded videos and taken photos with ease. The pretty red color is stand out. I love it.

Reviews.Title: great for money
Reviews.Author: Kaml
Reviews.Content: It is worth of money. Grabbed in thanksgiving deal and worth it. A good handy camera to capture quick photos.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Dorothy M. Houle
Reviews.Content: I love it because it fits in my pocket for purse.  I took it with me to Mexico and was happy with the pictures.

Reviews.Title: Nothing shoots like a Cannon
Reviews.Author: Calvin N Broadway
Reviews.Content: I have had nothing but fun with this little camera it's capabilities are top notch for it's price range! I've shot both stills and video to great effect I would suggest getting a large SD card because your going to want to take this with you everywhere!

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Sandra F. Neese
Reviews.Content: My husband requested this for Christmas. Not only did I not have to pay full price, it was exactly what he wanted, model-wise.  Now that he's used it, he's delighted with the quality of photos & ease of use. Wish buying all of his gifts was this easy!

Reviews.Title: I recomend it excelent camera an accesories
Reviews.Author: fran
Reviews.Content: I recomend it excelent camera an accesories the charge of battery is long life, I recomend it excelent camera an accesories the charge of battery is long life

Reviews.Title: Great for teen new to photography!
Reviews.Author: Momtchr
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 14 year old, so he would stop borrowing mine.  It's a great camera, easy to learn to use, takes good pictures and  wasn't too expensive.

Reviews.Title: Nice and compact, even
Reviews.Author: JSA3D "Avatares"
Reviews.Content: My wife still can't get over the old camera with this one. So in the meantime, I use it just to entice my wife. I love the fact that I can record at 720p as opposed to my old bulky D8 camcorder in DVD quality. Although I need to upgrade the SSD to a much bigger storage capacity.

Reviews.Title: Great camera.
Reviews.Author: Joyce Joyner
Reviews.Content: This camera is very easy to use, has vivid color and the price is right. Also a rechargable battery comes with it.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2500
Reviews.Author: William H. Jackson
Reviews.Content: The camera met my needs completely. The quality of the pictures was great. I am using the camera for pictures in a book I am now publishing. The clarity is what I needed for publication artifacts.

Reviews.Title: tween favorite
Reviews.Author: 1963mom
Reviews.Content: We wanted a camera that our 12 year old could use easily and express her creativity. She enjoys it daily for both photos and video clips!

Reviews.Title: A2500 16MP digital camera
Reviews.Author: Rebecca S Miller
Reviews.Content: I bought this (Dec2013) to replace a similar one that I dropped on it's open lens.  I purchased it based on it looked similar and had 4 stars.  (I had researched the old one much more deeply.)  It accepted the same battery and photo card and the features seem to work the same.  (I'm a point-and-shoot person.)  I'm so glad I can rely on Amazon's ratings to make purchases.

Reviews.Title: This was purchased as a gift
Reviews.Author: B. Horne
Reviews.Content: This was purchased .as a gift for my youngest grandson. I tested it first charged the battery inserted the SDHC card and took several pictures. I liked the unit, small light weight great pictures. And the grandson was very surprised and excited about it. I rate it a Good buy at a good price.

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: mark
Reviews.Content: long battery life and it's a small solid camerabest of all setting it up with 16 gig memory card the wife just clicks away

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Narayanan Anantharaman
Reviews.Content: Very  much portable, over all a good product. Features are good and easy to operate. I liked the product. Worth Buying

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Lynda Cardozo
Reviews.Content: Some time ago I was looking for a product with the features it gives me this camera, compact size, good number of megapixels, and photos and videos are incredible! ... 100% recommended

Reviews.Title: Canon
Reviews.Author: Maria P. Sierra
Reviews.Content: Very familiar with this camera. Excellent for npn expert camera users. Takes great videos as well. instructions are well wriitten.

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: Dave M. "Mount Buyer"
Reviews.Content: Excellent images, not on par with my Nikon D50, but took great pix.  I would prefer a viewfinder.  The screen is a little hard to see in bright light, and the delay for a flash picture can be annoying, but overall, what more could I ask for under $100.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product
Reviews.Author: Eugene Georgie
Reviews.Content: I like it a lot. Low price and great value. I had the previous model and I wanted to upgrade, so this product is a great choice.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Cardinal Fan
Reviews.Content: This camera is simple to operate.  Follow the directions and for quick picture taking it can be beat.  I have not tried some of the more elaborate features but it does take excellent pictures.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2500 16MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Midge McChristy
Reviews.Content: The receiver of this camera is very pleased with it, and loves theway the pictures come out when transferred to the computer!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the Price
Reviews.Author: Sci-fi &amp;amp; Fantasy Lover "think...
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my wife for Christmas. She loves it. She is a point and shoot persons and this camera takes great pics out of the box with no need to adjust the settings. It is also even lighter than the previous model Canon Powershot that she had. Definitely recommend it if you just want a point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: Robbie
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because of the 1) price and 2) ratings.  Top notch.  Small, light, full-function and easy to use.  Oh, and it takes great pictures, too.  This thing will fit right in your pocket and weighs a little less than my iPhone.  Good buy.

Reviews.Title: nice product
Reviews.Author: bane
Reviews.Content: The camera is easy to use and so far has met my expections.I have had no serious problems and have been able to take some great pictures.

Reviews.Title: for its price-great
Reviews.Author: Chana Leiba Froimowitz
Reviews.Content: easy to use, great pics. light. i love that it comes with its own rechargeable battery-save money on batteries. works with regular SD card-which is good for those of us who have cheaper cameras and are upgrading.

Reviews.Title: The camera was a good purchase.
Reviews.Author: Galen Eddy
Reviews.Content: It was a hit with granddaughter that received it, so far works well and was a good price.  She loves it!

Reviews.Title: Excellence value for money
Reviews.Author: Gillian F. Brunner
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with the camera - I believe it is an excellence value for the cost. I bought both the SanDisk Ultra 16 GB and the SanDisk Extreme 32 GB Memory Cards with the camera along with the USB 2.0 Cable Cord and am very happy with the entire setup.

Reviews.Title: nice and easy
Reviews.Author: John Burbano
Reviews.Content: Nice camera for the price, takes decent pictures and a I like the rechargeable batterie and not having to put in AA's or AAA's so worked for me

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera.  Shipped quickly!
Reviews.Author: Judith K Fox
Reviews.Content: I really liked the camera.  Easy to use buttons, nice pictures.  I used it as a gift and it was enthusiastically received.

Reviews.Title: user friendly
Reviews.Author: Russell Vucci
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my GF for Christmas. (I also grabbed a case, extra battery, and memory card-you'll need that last one). She LOVES it. It is easy for her to use and with a 16mp resolution the pics are great. No mechanical issues so far.

Reviews.Title: Bought as a gift for my grandmother
Reviews.Author: justin beach
Reviews.Content: Easy to usegreat picturescharge time takes about 4-6 hourscomes in my grandmothers favorite color.....lolsd card is standard card, you don't need a "brand only" card to use it, like sony.

Reviews.Title: A good pick
Reviews.Author: Major tech
