Reviews.Content: Good value for a Canon. Size features etc, just as expected. I bought it for the wife and she likes it, and that says much. Even thinking of getting one for myself if the price continues to be good. Buy this camera it's worth it.

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: Margaret Kalush
Reviews.Content: This camera takes very good pictures we loved getting it so quickly. We are very happy we the camera. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: Sandy
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my daughter for Christmas and she loves it. Its small enough that she can carry it in her purse, yet takes pictures like a bigger cameras. It has pretty good zoom capabilities and takes crystal clear photos. She uses it more than she uses her phone camera :)

Reviews.Title: easy camera
Reviews.Author: daryl sutton
Reviews.Content: Easy to handle focus and zoom good picture adjustment and review small and compact easy to carry and access which works good for me

Reviews.Title: Easy to use.
Reviews.Author: amelia
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my mother who was having a hard time with her older camera. The interface was easy to use. Picture quality is good for a consumer camera. She was able to quickly figure out how to use it and easily upload photos to her computer using the SD card. There is no need for a cable with this camera, and no software to upload. There is a large screen on the back which is really convenient.

Reviews.Title: So happy
Reviews.Author: T. Doty
Reviews.Content: Fantastic Service and Delivery.Thank you very much, I loved using it and it was easy, already have tons of pictures of my grandson

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Pettelle
Reviews.Content: I bought the camera as a gift. I didn't have a lot of money to spend on it so I had to find a good camera that didn't break my budget. This camera is small, takes great pictures, and really is just as good as some cameras at a higher price. I think it's a great camera, so in my opinion it is worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: W. Resh
Reviews.Content: Our granddaughter really likes this camera and she will enjoy it for years to come. We are happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: not worth the money
Reviews.Author: bill phillips
Reviews.Content: samsung is by far the best, the instructions are hard to understand , no cable included to charge battery ,you have to take it out of camera each time ,,,,,everthing is extra......looked at bying extra battery ,,,,,,its the same price as the camera ,,,,,,,give me a break

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2500 a Great Buy
Reviews.Author: G. Davis
Reviews.Content: For the price, this camera has proven to be well worth the money.  It performs as well as I expected, and provides all the features I need at this time in a camera. I would definitely recommend this camera to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: suebee
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gift for my husband. He doesn't like change so I wasn't sure he would give up his old bulky camera, but he did and loves this new one. It is small enough to take anywhere, the screen is a good size and the buttons are easy to operate. He likes to take videos and I love that there is a video button on the back of this camera. Great little camera and a good price too!

Reviews.Title: Great starter camera
Reviews.Author: Lisa Kearns "Lisa Kearns"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for our son, for Christmas.  I've had several Canon cameras over the years, and know that they are good quality.  We recently took a weekend trip to sight-see, and our son brought his new camera along.The photos he took were clear and focused, and the flash worked well too.  This isn't a fancy camera, but it fits in a coat pocket, works reliably, and takes good pictures.It comes with a battery charger and wrist strap, but it does NOT include a camera case, cable for transferring photos, or a memory card.  I recommend buying SanDisk Ultra 16 GB SDHC Class 10 Flash Memory Card 30MB/s SDSDU-016G-U46 for $12.68.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Joe Dopudja
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. It is very easy to use and takes some great pics. I would recommend this for any novice starting out.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Walter Pambabay
Reviews.Content: Good product, fast shipping and packaging pretty sure it works correctly for transport, similar to the one shown in the ad, highly recommended,

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Yitzhak B.
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with this camera. It's very easy to use, the battery lasts a long time, and the pictures come out great!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Pamela M Centilli
Reviews.Content: I love my new Canon camera - very easy to use and takes beautiful photos!  I highly reccomend it to everyone!

Reviews.Title: PowerShot A2500
Reviews.Author: Abraham K.
Reviews.Content: Great Camera. Good flash, good optics and very nice color. I strongly recommend this camera. You will get great photos are they are very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: You reviewers need to review the camera, not amazon...
Reviews.Author: Bernard McGilvray
Reviews.Content: Seeing so many reviews with low ratings because people aren't reviewing properly. Review the actual product, when you complain about amazon or if it didn't come with a case or sd  card, that doesn't educate a buyer on the camera's performance. I see an overall star rating, and I'm sometimes pushed away from a product because people are upset about things included in a sale. I want to know if the camera takes good pictures or how long the battery will last and people are rating it a 1,2,3 star because they are upset over accessory details and never even rate the actual camera. If you not happy with a purchase, send it  back, don't rate the camera a 1 star without even mentioning it, such as this review now has little merit on the camera.

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot
Reviews.Author: Joan
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a small easy to use camera. I saw this one and it met all my needs. I've only had it a short time but it takes beautiful clear pictures. Very easy  to use and handle. I love it and would tell people to buy

Reviews.Title: Mixed
Reviews.Author: Kathryn Winkler "Peggy"
Reviews.Content: After using a more expensive Canon for years, I decided to try this one. The pictures are not as clear, nor is the focus as automatic as it claims. If I had it to do over, I'd put the $ spent here toward another of the higher quality I had

Reviews.Title: Such a great buy!
Reviews.Author: Margie Pimentel
Reviews.Content: Great camera and really great price. This was a gift for my mother and it is very easy to use and compact. She really loved it. It doesnt come with an SD card so be sure to purchase one with your order.. all in all i love it!

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2500 16MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Red)
Reviews.Author: BALLS803
Reviews.Content: It's a solid camera and does what we needed. Wanted a small camera to take to parties that didn't cost to much so if it got lost or broken no biggy.

Reviews.Title: GREAT POINT AND SHOOT CAMERA!
Reviews.Author: MZ MARY
Reviews.Content: I got this for my Granddaughter because she loved to use mine every time she came here.  It is a great point and shoot.  Takes super pictures and is very easy to use!!

Reviews.Title: Can't beat the price, don't use a camera that much.
Reviews.Author: Sto190
Reviews.Content: Good camera for the price.  Only problem, it takes a few seconds to focus when you move the camera to a different position.  Battery holds a charge for a long time

Reviews.Title: Enjoying a REAL camera
Reviews.Author: megsr
Reviews.Content: So far so good.  I am appreciating the quality of the pictures i am getting so far.  I have not received the usb cable yet so I have not had a chance to upload or print any yet.  I do better with this lind of camera then I was doing with my phone.

Reviews.Title: Build quality is cheap but so is the price
Reviews.Author: I. East
Reviews.Content: Cheap plastic and cheap feel on a Chinese made camera.  It takes much better pictures than my phone despite the grainy low quality LCD screen.  If you're expecting Canon quality don't buy this camera, but if you're expecting something that takes better pictures than your phone with image stabilization for cheap, not a bad buy.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: Chas "KC Friend"
Reviews.Content: This camera is a little slower than my 8MP Canon -- but, the pictures are so well defined that you can crop a picture (taken from 100 yards away) and it isn't blurry when enlarged.  I like this camera -- easier to adjust the distance than my other Canon.

Reviews.Title: Way more than a point and shoot. Works great
Reviews.Author: William C. Milo "Bill Milo"
Reviews.Content: I got a lot more features than I had hoped for.  I just wanted a pocked point and shoot camera so I did not have to lug my big one around all the time.  It works great.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot A2500
Reviews.Author: Jerry Dulaney
Reviews.Content: Really good pictures...easy to use..this is the best camera I have ever owned and will do everything I need it to do

Reviews.Title: Just an OK camera.
Reviews.Author: mavrick70
Reviews.Content: Postives---Good battery life, easy to use, and good daytime shots with no more than 8x zoom, video is ok.Negatives--Dark and blurry at night,zoom is grainy after 8x,forget motion shots and night shots at more than 10ft pics are to dark to see,have to download software and PDF manual as none come with it.If you shake at all this camera is not for you.It blurs the pictures pretty badly.I was very unhappy with the night shots and the motion blur during video recording.If it was not for the price I would be very, very unhappy!

Reviews.Title: Great for the Price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Pictures are very clear. The price point was very good. The color is slightly pink moreso than red, which was good as it was a present for my girlfied (who likes pink), but might not be suitable for someone looking for a truly red camera. I do not have much photo experience so I don't know if the ISO and white balance are top notch, but every picture was much better than a cell-phone and looked good even blown up on the TV.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2500
Reviews.Author: Lois Wood
Reviews.Content: I love Canon.  I had an A2300, and needed to replace it, so I went with a model as similar as possible.  This model has built-in  instructions, so you don't HAVE to have a manual.  The photos are great for my applications.  I didn't realize it came WITHOUT a memory card (gee, I thought I was getting a GREAT price) so I was delayed in getting started with it.  Overall, though, I would highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera
Reviews.Author: Wisconsin Shopper
Reviews.Content: I'm a fan of Canon cameras, been using the larger SLR's for years. Taking a trip and wanted something smaller to fit into a pocket, so the price and size of this one were very attractive. I am very impressed wth the image quality, image stabilization, and HQ video functionality. The thing I don't care for is the USB 1.0 port, it would have been nice to have a micro USB so the cord would be interchangeable with other electronics. That's the reason I give 4 stars versus 5.

Reviews.Title: it met my needs
Reviews.Author: Margie J. Myers
Reviews.Content: Very light weight, so it isn't a heavy burden if I have to stick it in my purse.  Very thin.  Takes great pictures.  The chord that the manual says is in the box is NOT in the box.  It must be purchased separately.  If the enclosed start-up manual says that it is there, Canon should have to send one for free.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: LinMacD
Reviews.Content: Great camera for a good price.It takes nice shots and it is easy to use.Only thing missing is the cable to connect the camera to the PC.But you can insert the card in the PC to take off the pictures.

Reviews.Title: Very good pictures, easy to use.
Reviews.Author: Mark M
Reviews.Content: I needed an small, inexpensive yet dependable point and shoot camera for a three week cycling vacation.  After checking camera reviews on Amozon as well as other sites, I chose the Power Shot A2500.  After over 250 photos I have not been disappointed.  I assumed the camera would be easy to use and reliable but I admit that the quality of the pictures exceeded my expectations.  Many of my pictures were taken after a quick stop on my bicycle with little time spent prior to pressing the button.  Still I was very pleased with the results.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use!
Reviews.Author: Monica Vaughn
Reviews.Content: I was a little hesitant at first about getting the camera because some reviews said it wasn't user friendly, and I am not a "tech-savy" person.  However, I found the camera very easy to use, and I LOVE IT!My main reason for purchasing this camera over others is for the rechargeable battery.  I was so tired of always putting in new batteries in my old camera, not using it for a month, and then discovering that I'd soon need new batteries again.  Love the ability to recharge!Great product and at the right price too!

Reviews.Title: A good digi cam
Reviews.Author: Jebin
Reviews.Content: I bought this digi camera recently. It is really compact and slim so i can take it anywhere when travelling ..love the camera :)

Reviews.Title: My new Canon camera
Reviews.Author: Mary A Charles
Reviews.Content: I just love my new Canon camera.  It takes nice pictures and is very light and slim.  Fits anywhere.  Takes nice video too.

Reviews.Title: Great Little pic taker
Reviews.Author: Patricia L. Meyer
Reviews.Content: For the price you can't beat this little guy! It is all I need to keep in my handbag for those unexpected moments

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Gary M.
Reviews.Content: Handy lightweight camera. I use it for work documentation and leisure. A great secondary camera to always keep with you. Remember it doesn't come with a memory card or USB cable.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: T
Reviews.Content: I bought this item for my aunt, who comes from the non-tech savvy generation. She was looking for a small and stylish, yet affordable and practical camera for a vacation trip. This camera fits all of those qualities and is VERY easy to use. Note: it does not come with a SD memory card. Highly recommend this product!

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: Matthew Irion
Reviews.Content: Does what it said it would, good value for the money.Fairly sturdy- already been dropped a couple of times.Good battery life. Good quality of the pictures, but I'm not an expert, there.Took me a while to find the " Delete all pictures" in the menu options. Wish the choice was made easier wirth the trash can icon on the front.

Reviews.Title: New Camera for me
Reviews.Author: Margaret Porter
Reviews.Content: I needed a new camera because I got sand in my old Olympus one. I decided to give the Canon powershot a try. Im glad i did. Easy to set up and operate and easy to use

Reviews.Title: Failed after 3 weeks
Reviews.Author: Jack Bissey
Reviews.Content: The camera failed after 3 weeks, so it is now in Canon's repair facility in Newport News, VA.  I like it, but we'll see how long it lasts when I get it back from Canon.

Reviews.Title: Manual available
Reviews.Author: heidi
Reviews.Content: Recently purchased the A2500 for some upcoming travel to Italy.  I did find the manual online and was able to download it onto my iPad.

Reviews.Title: I like it because it not to small and not to big just right!
Reviews.Author: kevin sears
Reviews.Content: I give this camera a 4 out of 5 because its not to small and not to big. It is light and small enought to fit in you shirt pocket. It comes with a rechargeable battery which last pretty long and cuts out having to purchase disposable batteries that doesn't last very long after a few flashes. This camera is more than suitable for any Vacations or Special Occasions and I would recommend this to anyone who want to have a Vacation or Occasion they dont want to forget. The PowerShot A2500 16.0 MP DIGITAL CAMERA WITH 5x OPTICAL ZOOM AND 720p HD VIDEO RECORDING will freeze that moment, that beautiful memory in time for you in excellent picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Blurry Photos!!!
Reviews.Author: kardmorris
Reviews.Content: Not sure why it is so hard to buy a point and shoot that takes photos that are in focus. I returned this.  Amazon was great about the return and even paid for the shipping. I bought the Nikon Coolpix S3500. Just a little bit more money and does a much better job.

Reviews.Title: Awesome find!
Reviews.Author: Busiacam
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera on the recommendation of a friend who has an earlier model and is a professional photographer. It is exactly what I wanted and needed. I absolutely love it for its great, clear pictures and ease of use. I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a light-weight, simple camera. I purchased a Canon because of the great results from previous Canons that I have owned. My last Canon wasn't working properly and I was unable to get replacement parts to due to its age, so this was a great replacement product.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Gregory E. Greene
Reviews.Content: I should have done a bit of research before buying the camera.  I use a more expensive canon Point and shot at work and love it.  However, this one has done nothing but disappoint in regards to pic quality.  Much of my shots are taken while cycling so I'm starting to think not having image stabilization is part of the problem.  The 10 year old Casio that I was using before does much better.I wish I had not been so cheap on this purchase!

Reviews.Title: Disappointing
Reviews.Author: Nonanon
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a point and shoot camera that would deliver clear crisp pictures, including closeups.  However, this camera had fuzzy pictures and did not allow me to get very close to my subject.  I enjoy taking portraits of flowers and landscapes.  The video and sound were actually better than the photographs I tried to take.

Reviews.Title: Good Pictures
Reviews.Author: C Jacobs "Colorado Rose"
Reviews.Content: We use this camera to take pictures of damages.  Good detail.  Very useful tool for sending pictures to persons that need to evaluate the damage.

Reviews.Title: Very Poor picture quality
Reviews.Author: JoeP
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Canon based upon reviews found on the web.  I compared the picture quality by using 2 cameras taking the exact same picture at the exact same time then comparing the results.  The other camera was my Canon SX110 purchased in 2008.  I was looking for a "better" camera, more pixels, better resolution...  Not nearly as good and I wanted better.  I wouldn't recommend this for kids to use as a toy.

Reviews.Title: Too complicated
Reviews.Author: Wayne T. Malchow
Reviews.Content: I guess the worst thing is it didn't come with a users manual, it has to be downloaded, and their site doesn't work. So I'm stuck with a camera that doesn't focus where I want it to focus, I get these green squares that bracket everything but the item I want to focus on. It takes OK pictures, but file is huge - 3MB plus. Want to anger your friends?try emailing several photos. I keep getting this "LIVE" icon in the corner. What's that supposed to mean? It has a cell phone type lithium battery. I can't tell from the icon how much life is left in the battery. there is no simple menu item to show battery life. The external charger has no cord, just two prongs that flip out to plug into a socket. you have to remove the battery to charge it. The flash is in the left corner at the top, so if you use two hands to hold the camera, make sure you don't cover the flash, especially if you have gloves on. If you try to use one hand, you have to be especially careful where you put your thumb, or you will hit the function/scroll button. Which has multiple functions, It is labeled Eco, delete/auto, flash, Disp. Other times it is a scroll button, but its not marked with arrows, so you have to guess what is going to happen when you press it. I used to have a canon A560, which was a great camera -7.1 mega pixels, until I dropped it and cracked the battery door. but I used and abused it a lot, and couldn't put it into my shirt pocket,so when the lens stopped coming out I upgraded.

Reviews.Title: cell phone takes better pictures
Reviews.Author: Mike B
Reviews.Content: the photos turn out a bit blurry.I didn't expect DSLR quality, but a 2012-era iPhone or Android takes better pictures than this camera, so what's the point?.but it's cheap

Reviews.Title: Not sure what to say quite yet...
Reviews.Author: Bob Olson
Reviews.Content: The camera arrived quickly, and without problems.  I am new to "digital" photography, and haven't used the camera much yet, but the instructions seem pretty straight forward...initial setup was easy enough. The camera didn't come with a memory card, nor a transfer cable to download to my computer...would have been nice as a "complete package."  Still, it was a good bargain.  It's not my old Canon AE-1 "film camera," but I am sure Canon doesn't produce junk. I'm sure it will take a good deal of time to learn all of the functions of this new fangled contraption, so perhaps I'll add to my review in a couple of months.

Reviews.Title: Excellent little camera!!
Reviews.Author: MamacitaSheena
Reviews.Content: Really loving how easy this camera makes it to take a great picture. I have small children and to not get a blurry picture when they are jumping around is awesome. I am finally going to get some great photos! This camera is amazing for the price. It's like having a more expensive camera that fits in the palm of your hand! GREAT BUY!!! AAA+++++

Reviews.Title: Easy to use with good results
Reviews.Author: Mark Hunter
Reviews.Content: It is easy to use. Point and shoot. The pictures are good, even though we are unskilled. Recommend buying backup batteries. The 600mAh battery doesn't last a full day of hard use.I was surprised that the case was as efficient as it was. I expected a 3/4 opening to be a challenge but it was the perfect size to hold the camera in place when unzipped. Attach the carabiner to your belt loop. Slip the camera in the case with the wrist strap outside the case. Zip the case closed. Now the wrist strap can be used when removing the camera. It's reassuring to have the strap first.

Reviews.Title: Buy the POWERSHOT A4000 IS for a few dollars more
Reviews.Author: C. J. Clavadetscher "quickshot carl"
Reviews.Content: I do a lot of photography, own a lot of cameras including pricey ones by NIKON (7100) and CANON (G10)  and LUMIX (LX7) and SAMSUNG (GALAXY). I also own and use a lot two CANON POWERSHOT A4000 IS, for which I paid just over $100 each. Has the "DIGIC 4" chip used in many of their best DSLR cameras, a 3" display, 8X optical and 8X digital zoom. The review is about the A2500, the little brother to the 4000. It also has the DIGIC 4 chip (that's something important, one smart brain in this box). It has a 28mm wide angle as does the A4000. It has only a 5X optical, 5X digital zoom. The "IS" stands for Intelligent systems, and while BOTH cameras take awesome pictures and represent for normal folks super deals that will keep up with the far more expensive cameras (like those listed above) for normal use, the A4000 IS deals with tricky lighting and the outer margins of early morning, late evening, backlit scenes, and so on, better than the A2500. BOTH are super deals. My tired eyes appreciate that larger display on the somewhat more expensive A4000 IS. I also like to "crop tight" meaning I really zoom in. That again is a slight advantage to the A4000 IS. If photography isn't a passion, either will do a great job. If you spend a few $$$ more the A4000 will give you that difference back over the years in quality shots under tougher situations.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: GWalker
Reviews.Content: I have to say I'm a Canon lover, however for the stated 16MP the pictures aren't nearly as clear as I expected.  I also thought it had a self timer for some reason and I haven't found it if it's got one.  It is small and compact enough for me to carry in my purse or take on a hike, so it comes in handy since I don't have much of a camera on my cell phone and it's not as bulky as my Canon Rebel.  The thing I like the best is the wide angle ability, so for taking pictures of rooms in a house it works good.

Reviews.Title: Beware of battery and/or charger
Reviews.Author: Naroutam Singh
Reviews.Content: I have not yet gotten a chance to fully use this camera since either the battery or the charger shuts down (after 1 week) and the battery is not charging. I don't know whether I have to get a new battery or a new charger. Very frustrating.

Reviews.Title: Great Cam!!
Reviews.Author: Ben van Groeningen
Reviews.Content: This is really a great camera, easy to use and with its 16 megapix it makes really nice photos. add the 5 times optical zoom and you know this is a fine piece of work.

Reviews.Title: Met all my expectations
Reviews.Author: Glenn Roth
Reviews.Content: I already had a Cannon digital camera, much like the one purchased but perhaps one up the product line.  I wanted one for every day pictures, keeping the first for family pictures and trips. With testing this camera, this has performed as well as I could desire. The only "negative", for search of another word, is that the magnification is only to about 5x, but I knew that going in. As I have some shaking due to a medical condition, the pictures came out great!!This is a great everyday, first use camera, or if you would like this camera for pictures where you won't need better  zoom lens.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Alicia
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera - it takes great pictures, for an amateur like me. I just wish that it didn't wait quite as long between photos. The biggest drawback, for me, is that it has NO internal memory. So if you forget your memory card, you're out of luck.

Reviews.Title: Nice!
Reviews.Author: Harold  HP
Reviews.Content: the camera I actually bought it  for my dad, who needed a camera to take it on his trip to Cuba. The camera seems really cool, and that it has 16 megapixel , it just add to my overall satisfaction with the product, Thank you amazon for selling such a cool object. I will recommended for the everyday photographer who just have a passion for taking pictures and who doesn't care about the setting in which he happens to be.

Reviews.Title: Good value, and it's red!
Reviews.Author: Allison Schultz
Reviews.Content: My mom needed a new camera that provided a good zoom function and the ability to take decent family photos within my brother's and my Christmas spending budget. This camera was the answer. Bonus: mom's favorite color is red. She loves to use it and brings it with her to every family gathering. Even though she still forgets how to use the zoom function sometimes, she loves scrolling through the photos and sharing them with whoever's around to look, usually immediately after they were taken. Great for anybody who doesn't have a smart phone, but wants to share in the fun of constant digital documentation. Not recommended for selfie-taking.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot
Reviews.Author: Karen M. Will
Reviews.Content: This is just as it was described in the description.  It works well and takes beautiful pictures.  The memories will last a lifetime!

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot
Reviews.Author: Carol
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful camera. Small enough to fit in my pocket and take anywhere. No more missing out on family memories. I love it.

Reviews.Title: No warranty, registration or contact information
Reviews.Author: Bland Cleesattle
Reviews.Content: Just had the camera a few days, but it is very functional for the most part.  What I find unusual is that there are no warranty or registration papers with the camera and no telephone number to ask questions about this camera.  In the book you only have basic information such as how to charge & install the battery.  On the DVD you actually learn more about the functions on the camera, which shows settings for portrait, low light light, snow & fireworks for example.  However I cannot locate these icons anywhere on the camera to use should I be taking any pictures in similar settings. I wanted to call for further instruction but find no contact phone number, email or address to which to write.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Skb
Reviews.Content: Nice camera for this price range. I bought this camera for vacation. It is small enough to carry without being bothersome. The battery lasted longer than I expected.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Candace A. Giard
Reviews.Content: perfect camera, case and memory card for our vacation - great pictures, easy to share, and highly recommend to anyone

Reviews.Title: Gift for a friend
Reviews.Author: Keith Allen Kohler
Reviews.Content: My friend can't stop telling all his friends what a great camera it is.  Best gift he received that year. Thanks

Reviews.Title: good for daily use
Reviews.Author: Daya
Reviews.Content: Bought this for a family member abroad. They love it . its compact, has all the required auto stuff for anyone who goes out there and just takes pictures. it came cheap too.

Reviews.Title: Very handy
Reviews.Author: Tobias Susan
Reviews.Content: What I like about this camera is that it is quite handy. Everywhere I go I could bring it. It is also easy to use. Even for the first time user.

Reviews.Title: Gift for 11yo Granddaughter
Reviews.Author: Douglas Harpster "~DUG"
Reviews.Content: We spoke about the camera just last night for the first time. Her words, not mine: "Thank you for my new camera..I LUV IT ! I luv it ! I LUV IT!"  She's learning to use it and I showed her some options that she knew nothing about. I showed her the directions in the user guide and she has promised to read and try all that the camera can do. Seems to be a good first camera for a youngster and I'm happy that I was able to give it to her for her birthday.

Reviews.Title: A picture is worth a 1000 words
Reviews.Author: Deanna Proctor
Reviews.Content: Great gift for my 11 year old. Small enough to fit in her pocket and easy enough for my 8 year old to use for her clouds project! Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: didihorizon
Reviews.Content: This product deserves more ratings, it is wonderful. The quality and design are the best. I would recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: You get what you paid
Reviews.Author: PMR
Reviews.Content: Cheap appearance, but I'd be OK with that if the quality of the pictures were anything close to good. But it's not. They are grainy, unless you have noon sunlight over your head on a cloud-less day. In the shade?! Good luck. And, for a point-and-shoot, the camera is very susceptible to the minimum movements of your hands, bearing no anti-shaking features. Sporting 16MP does you no good if the quality of the photos aren't good, you will just end up with very large poor-quality pictures that will "occupy" (a.k.a. waste space on) your Hard Drive. I gave this to my 9 y.o. son for him to play with, and he's happy recording movies and taking his very own pictures... at the end of the day, this is what your money got you, a toy camera from a famous manufacturer. I just loaded it with a large SD card and told him to take hundreds of pictures... the laws of statistics make about 10% of them usable, ultimately.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: PrincessP
Reviews.Content: we bought this for our 11 year old son for his birthday. It's super easy to use and take great pictures and video. He loves it!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Debora Norz
Reviews.Content: Bought one for vacation.  Easy to use, great photos.  Had to buy my uncle his own for our next trip

Reviews.Title: Good point and shoot.
Reviews.Author: misslenlen "misslenlen"
Reviews.Content: Nothing fancy about this camera. It works well for the price. Photos are a little blurry if you don't have a steady hand.

Reviews.Title: Perfect camera for trips
Reviews.Author: Peggy
Reviews.Content: I have three of these cameras for my three children all age 11 who took them on a school trip to Washington DC. The cameras are lightweight and small enough for easy carrying around, sturdy enough for kids to use without having problems and take great pictures and videos. The kids had a very easy time using them with no issues. Very easy and simple to download the photos as well. Excellent camera.

Reviews.Title: perfect choice for entry level
Reviews.Author: Derek Kuang
Reviews.Content: it is a perfect choice for entry level.easy learn,easy useI wish its screen could be little bigger.not bad

Reviews.Title: canon
Reviews.Author: Gino F.
Reviews.Content: i wanted to get the rebel IOS 3TI so far it is very ligth but has a lot of features the display screen is yelloish in color i hope it takes great pics will try it while on vacation.

Reviews.Title: mommy
Reviews.Author: Melanie rose Little
Reviews.Content: I used to have a Fujifilm s1800 and bought this for ease. now selling that Fujifilm :)  great price and takes amazing photos.

Reviews.Title: low price-expensive results
Reviews.Author: Robert Agriopoulos
Reviews.Content: excellent value ease of use outstanding images a camera that does the job for a change and costs less than the competition

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: J. Patterson
Reviews.Content: I really wanted a camera that I could take to the pool/park and not have to worry about.  I don't like leaving my $600 smartphone under a lounge chair or risk it getting wet, but with little kids it's nice to be able to capture some cool moments.  This was a great compromise, at well under $100 depending on when you buy it, I consider it to be almost a disposable.  It is very compact, so easy to put in a pocket, yet it takes very nice shots and videos, better than my Galaxy S3 anyway which is what I would normally use for those spontaneous moments.  I've combined it with a second $10 battery, a 64GB card, and a $10 slim case.  Well worth the price for what you get.

Reviews.Title: almost kid friendly
Reviews.Author: lovepb
Reviews.Content: Was great until lens jammed and needed to be returned. Other than that my daughter really enjoyed the ease of operation.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: Jean
Reviews.Content: I am really enjoying this little  Camera. I am 87 years old, and this one is perfect for me.I carry it in my purse every where  I go. I have taken a lot of pictures, especially  the ones of my Great Grandchildren. They are very clear.  I love it.  Jean

Reviews.Title: Finally....
Reviews.Author: Stevie851 "Stevie98119"
Reviews.Content: I've found a camera I can use without a PhD in film.  It's simple - point - click - shoot.  It's compact.  It comes with two rechargeable batteries and a charger.  I use it almost daily.  Great camera.

Reviews.Title: Can't import images
Reviews.Author: Robert P. Irons
Reviews.Content: I used to be able to import from my Olympus camera through a cord between camera and PC, using installed software. Not with this camera. Whenever I try to use a recommended card reader, I get "Software not installed." There is no software. Whenever I try to download something from Canon, I get the "Indian Scammers" instead. When I call Canon they say, "Oh yes of course." But they don't help.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Deborah S Shaw
Reviews.Content: Everything I wanted in a small camera and more.  Easy to operate, and easy to carry.  Down loads well and recharges easily. A lot of camera for the money.

Reviews.Title: Decent quality, easy to use camera
Reviews.Author: Alpha MacKenna
Reviews.Content: When this camera is perfectly still, it produces great pictures. Any slight movement will make said pictures blurry however, so if you have shakey hands like me, you'll want to invest in a tripod. Video quality is also super. Great for making digital home movies, or whatever you need a filming capability for. The camera is easy to use with a bit of practice.

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera..
Reviews.Author: CookieToddo
Reviews.Content: I like it so far.. been using it a few days now.  It seems the package doesn't include the USB cable.. so be aware.. you will need to add it to your order as it comes separately.. only 99 cents.. Now I gotta wait till the next time I order something and then add this USB.. hope it doesn't go up in the price.

Reviews.Title: Easy&responsive; until it died
Reviews.Author: Tyler
Reviews.Content: Overall, this is a great camera for what it tries to be. 16 MP, so you can get high-quality pictures, and it turns on and off quickly. Cheap but effective. That is, until it dies. I had this camera for less than three months before it decided to stop turning on out of nowhere. No physical damage to the camera, no contact with water, nothing. I used it the day before, no problems, but it just gave up. I contacted Canon and they quickly told me it would need service in one of their facilities, which suggests this is a common issue. I would still recommend the camera, but don't be surprised if it doesn't hold up like a more expensive camera would.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Yellow Roses
Reviews.Content: The color is great, works great, has lots of functions, great menus, nothing to complain about. Even the little ding noises it makes when you select menu options are really nice :)

Reviews.Title: Still happy
Reviews.Author: Sherman Dorn
Reviews.Content: Simple, high value for the cost in terms of consumer, point-and-shoot cameras. I wish it had a panorama function, but I'm very happy nonetheless.

Reviews.Title: Something missing?
Reviews.Author: Deborah W. Babcox
Reviews.Content: It seems very good, but there was no usb cord to connect the camera with the computer.  Should'nt there have been one with it?

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: A. Mackey
Reviews.Content: It seems like a pretty good camera.  I'm still trying to get used to it.  The screen goes dark too quickly.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Sonia Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: Great pictures with little fuss. Easy point and shoot with great results. It's small and compact, weighs next to nothing.

Reviews.Title: loved it
Reviews.Author: Leota Kucera
Reviews.Content: Got it for my granddaughter's birthday.  Takes pretty good pictures and is easy for anyone to use.  She is having alot of fun taking pictures of everything

Reviews.Title: Sleek, savvy, and strong
Reviews.Author: Eleanor Moriarty
Reviews.Content: This camera is very intuitive to use and has great specs. The pictures are clear and beautiful, with very little work required on the part of the photographer.

Reviews.Title: Hi
Reviews.Author: ody
Reviews.Content: Thanks, I really love it... it was a pleasure to bought this item to you I hope you understand me

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: LMc
Reviews.Content: I love the size of this camera. It takes great pictures and has good focus. I like the rechargeable battery and the compact charger. No long cord to get tangled up and twisted. The only negative was slow shipping. It arrived a week after the estimated delivery date. The tracking information was not updated until 2 days after the  estimated delivery date. Very frustrating at the time, but I do like the camera.

Reviews.Title: Trip to Italy
Reviews.Author: Gina Wheeler
Reviews.Content: As I was getting ready for my trip to Italy everyone was saying I better take a camera so at the last minute I bought this camera. I wanted a simple point and click that was easy to use. Well, I would say this camera got the job done! I took 950 pictures in 10 days!. It was light weight easy to use and the pictures came out great! I would recommend..

Reviews.Title: Great!!
Reviews.Author: Swampy
Reviews.Content: I like it.  More capabilities than I'll probably ever use, unless I study the online manual or take a digital photo class. it's light and strong.  I do want to add one of those collapsing sun screens for taking photos in bright sunshine. Lighter and smaller than the ~$400 Nokon i purchased two years ago, and has all the capabilities.

Reviews.Title: simple, easy, great for simple tasks
Reviews.Author: verybluejenny
Reviews.Content: if you're looking for a very simple digital camera with no frills or fuss, this is the camera to get. we are currently using this at my work to document car conditions and to take a picture of the VIN number on the dash as well.  for the people who i work with who many not be versed in using anything with more than an on, off, auto, and zoom feature, this is exactly what is needed. also, very easy to connect to the computer, but you will need to buy a compatible usb cable, memory card and case. still very reasonable.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Kimmai D.
Reviews.Content: uncle bought these for our family out of the USA. works and looks great so everyone is a happy camper

Reviews.Title: Easy to use, great photos, yet still inexpensive
Reviews.Author: Len Lindsay "Len Lindsay"
Reviews.Content: We lost our very nice CASIO EXILIM camera. We were going to just get another one, but then we noticed this camera getting great reviews and "best of" picks. The KEY FEATURE that sold us on it was that it has TWO buttons to click to take photos/movies.  One button always takes a photo ...the other button always starts/stops taking a movie! This sounds MINOR but it is a MAJOR feature to have ... in the past decade there have been many times where we had the camera set at "best movie" from a few days ago - then we grab the camera and quick take a couple of photos only to later realize that we lost them all ... and ended up with several short movies instead! This camera is foolproof in this regard! Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for my daughter
Reviews.Author: Guitarpro
Reviews.Content: Light, decent battery life....Very good for the money! The photo quality is good as is the video. She really digs it.

Reviews.Title: nice compact camera
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: i bought this camera for my 16 yr old neice to take on a class trip to germany.  she loved it and said it took great quailty pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Robert A. Chambers
Reviews.Content: My wife's camera broke on vacation and she was supposed to tell me what replacement camera she wanted. But after over six months of no direction I decided to buy this camera as an interim so she could be taking pictures. This camera is so small that it's easy for her to put in her purse. We're not into using our cell phone to take pictures so this is a great alternative. And who knows, maybe I won't need to get her a more expensive camera. Also, I took the memory card from her old broken camera and put it in this one. All her old pictures showed up in the Canon PowerShot without having to do anything special. Her memory chip was 128 MB so it was good that it worked in the new camera without any problems. Also, my wife loves the color red and the red PowerShot camera was actually $5 cheaper than the silver one. Good value and I saved money.

Reviews.Title: Was a very good experience,
Reviews.Author: Mario Roberto Trujillo
Reviews.Content: Was a very good experience, and the price is better according with de funtions, If you like a good product and cheap, you can bought this product

Reviews.Title: wonderful camera
Reviews.Author: Nixon jawahir
Reviews.Content: this is light weight, the pictures are so real. video is perfect.  really exceeded my expectationsthis really is value for money.

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: Barbara Murphy
Reviews.Content: There's nothing like a Cannon. This little beauty is perfect for travel. Small enough that it fits in the smallest pocket.

Reviews.Title: Does everything I want it to
Reviews.Author: A.B.
Reviews.Content: I wanted a camera that is was easy to operate and takes great pictures.  I don't need lots of bells and whistles.  I just need a good camera.  This camera is the one!  The zoom feature takes good pictures from a distance.  The video is easy to operate.The shutter speed is slow, but I knew that when I bought the camera.  I owned a camera like that before (it suffered death by dropping) and it was a camera that took great pictures.  So, I knew is one would too.  If you need a camera for sports, I do not recommend this camera because of the slow speed.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2500 16MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Image Stabilized
Reviews.Author: YVONNE MACKEY
Reviews.Content: My sister really likes her cameral, she's been asking for one for sometime, her favorite color is red and the handling of the camera is easy for her.

Reviews.Title: Needs more
Reviews.Author: Nancy Archer
Reviews.Content: Camera is fine but it didn't come with the cord for the computer. I have to order that extra to put the pictures on the computer. Also, it had no CD for me to adjust pictures. A hassle I didn't need.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Marie Gutierrez
Reviews.Content: The camera so far is working, but it is difficult to understand the instructions, I'm sure I'll get the hang of it

Reviews.Title: slowwwww
Reviews.Author: kn
Reviews.Content: bought 16 of these on behalf of my school program and it's sooo slow. Kids move fast and every photo is blurred because of the huge delay from when you press the button and when it actually takes the photo. Unless you ask the person to pose (which are kids have become really good at!) it's not good for action shots at all :((

Reviews.Title: Cannon
Reviews.Author: Ellen R Lifgren
Reviews.Content: Havent used camera yet had to buy SD card and need to buy cable and case, should have bought the bundle, but like the size and look of camara, good price

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Kokouvi Agle
Reviews.Content: I love it I came in a very nice box. It working very well and has a long life bactery. All my pictures came very good. I so glad I got one.Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great for those of us with shaky hands
Reviews.Author: B
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera in hopes that it would be able to take good pictures even though my hands shake just enough to blur and ruin photos. I couldn't be happier, the photos come out great on the first try, clear and crisp.

Reviews.Title: just for me
Reviews.Author: Steven Gibbs
Reviews.Content: I finally broke down and got ME a new camera. So far - I love it. Great pics and easy to use and transfer to my laptop.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for a good price
Reviews.Author: Jamie L. Ham "JamLee"
Reviews.Content: I have always loved Canon cameras. This one is no different. Easy to use and figure out. Many settings to take a variety of pictures. Easy to carry, small and durable camera.

Reviews.Title: Horrible product
Reviews.Author: Brandi
Reviews.Content: Camera lasted three months. While still under warranty, I took it on an outing with my kids. There is lots of wind where we live and sand got in the lens. Sent it in for repair and Canon said that sand was not covered under the warranty. I understand if someone was mistreating the camera, but just using it. So, they gave me a quote on repair since they refused to honor their warranty. The repair was more than a brand new camera! Save your money and get another brand. Canon makes a cheap product and has horrible customer service.

Reviews.Title: Meh
Reviews.Author: G
Reviews.Content: I just posted a review of another Canon digital camera I bought.  Simply put these Canon cameras have been consistently mediocre.  This one is more forgivable due to the price point.  The screen is grainy, the optical zoom is barely a feature, the menus are a bit unintuitive and features are limited.  That said it takes slightly better pictures than a smartphone (for now).

Reviews.Title: Recommend everyone to purchase
Reviews.Author: Wang Tse San
Reviews.Content: Good product good price.  Easy to use.  Quality pictures.  Connect to computer very easily.  Company and convenient to carry. Good buy

Reviews.Title: PowerShot
Reviews.Author: Muniac
Reviews.Content: My wife was in need of a new camera.  I bought this as a gift and she loves it.  Easy to carry in her purse, easy to use, and takes great photos.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Donna M
Reviews.Content: Was looking for a small camera to take with me instead of dragging my Nikon SLR everywhere and this fits the bill. Small enough to keep in my purse to get those once in a lifetime pics of kids and animals.

Reviews.Title: Worked well, for a while.
Reviews.Author: Eric Parton
Reviews.Content: The camera stopped after four months due to the lens being bumped while open. The flash was mediocre, sometimes it worked, sometimes it didn't. Half of the time, it wouldn't take a picture; it would just act like it was focusing.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my needs- just wish I had known it needed a battery.
Reviews.Author: Genia "janstreehouse11"
Reviews.Content: Great camera- small, compact and so easy to use. I am using it to document the emergence of spring after a long long winter in Michigan. It has all the features that I need as an amateur photographer.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Jeannifer Brady "Jeanna"
Reviews.Content: Great little camera, just as promised. Didnt come with cord but will find a way around that. Beautiful red color

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Nirav Balani "Nirav"
Reviews.Content: This is good to buy compact camera. For low budget this is really good choice. Snaps are also good. Will updater more soon.

Reviews.Title: so far, so good
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: The camera is easy to use and works as advertised.  Good camera for the money. I would buy again if looking for a decent camera on a budget.

Reviews.Title: Power Shot is the best
Reviews.Author: BARBARA Jennings "reader for life"
Reviews.Content: The camera is light and small.  Great pictures and easy to use. If you do not have the phone to take picture get this.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good.
Reviews.Author: Tam Nguyen
Reviews.Content: The quality and graphic of the picture is really sharp, defined and beautiful. But the down sides are; the usb cord that allows you to transfer photos is not included. The pictures sometimes get blurry and fuzzy while you are taking the picture. I don't know if this is due to the motion you are creating as you move the camera. But once you let the camera stabilize to take a picture, the image becomes clear. It comes clear and defined after you have taken the picture. Well, so far, so good, and I am satisfied at the moment. Hopefully, it keeps up for months and years of future use.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: willi
Reviews.Content: The best pocket camera on the market for the price! There are 3 different cameras by Cannon in this category, go with the A2500 for added overall quality for just a small increase in price! I had been looking at point & shoot cameras, reading all the specs. along with remarks by other customers for about 3 months. I got this for my wife for her birthday and she is very picky after going through 3 previous cameras unsuccessfully, she has been very happy with this one(finally)!

Reviews.Title: Excellent and convienient
Reviews.Author: Donald Eiler
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to use, gives great picture, compact size allows it to be with you and ready for use.

Reviews.Title: impressive camera good price easy to use Great photos
Reviews.Author: Jinsey Colelette "Jinsey Colelette"
Reviews.Content: I was looking to replace an old camera wanted something easy  to use light weight that took Great photos of all kinds. After searching for over a year I came  across the Canon PowerShot A2500 with 5x optical image. I was on a budget so this was perfect priced. Something told me to give it a try. I have had it a little over a week and love it . Takes wonderful shots easy to use and fits in my hand bag or in my camera case. Very pleased with it. This is My first  canon.

Reviews.Title: Ok for the price, have to remove card to get pix
Reviews.Author: Gerald Steele
Reviews.Content: Works well and easy to use. Only complaint is that my computer will not recognize it as a storage device so I have to remove the card and use a card reader so it loses some convenience points. I will have to jsut work around it.

Reviews.Title: Canon A 2500
Reviews.Author: COLLEEN P MANZI
Reviews.Content: Perfect Camera for me. light to carry around , takes very good pictures, great price , very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great  camera
Reviews.Author: Richard Bernard
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the money  compact fits in pocket  takes good pictures  love the built in telephoto lens and ease of operation

Reviews.Title: awesome point and shoot!
Reviews.Author: Regine P.
Reviews.Content: I'm a Canon digi cam fan! This is my 4th one (older ones got lost or I broke). They're always inexpensive and very dependable. I've tried one other brand camera but always came back to Canon. I'm not a pro photog I'm a Kinder teacher that likes to take good photos. Definitely awesome camera for the price!

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2500 16MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Hal Aaron
Reviews.Content: Great camera! Bought this for my boss for business purposes. Simple and Easy for him to use. The only cons that I had were that It didn't come with a usb cord to connect to the computer and there is NO internal memory. We had to purchase a memory card before we could use the camera.

Reviews.Title: perfect little camera
Reviews.Author: sheryl/housewife
Reviews.Content: Just what I wanted. Not too big takes great pics, easy to download onto the computer and long life battery.

Reviews.Title: the product and the delivery terms were agreed
Reviews.Author: Douglas Martinez
Reviews.Content: The product was chosen for its low price compared to the rest of the deals the same or similar products

Reviews.Title: Great little point and shoot with no hassels
Reviews.Author: inspectorudy
Reviews.Content: I have a nice expensive SLR Nikon with all of the assorted lenses but sometimes I just want a quick grab and shoot camera that doesn't have all of the internet and app functions. This little camera has that feature and allows you to just take pictures with a nice zoom capability. The design is one that you can learn in about five minutes and can hand to a person who can then take pictures of you it right away. It's small and comes with a nice carrying string and it has a rechargeable battery. Amazon sells the silver model for a very competitive price that makes it hard to beat.

Reviews.Title: Big camera value
Reviews.Author: Katma54
Reviews.Content: Love it!  Takes wonderful pics.  Great value for the price. Very easy and fun to use .  Big camera value in a small camera price

Reviews.Title: Perfect -
Reviews.Author: Grace M. Cardinale
Reviews.Content: Just what he wanted for his b'day.  Easy to use for an eleven year old.  Maybe we have a future photographer.

Reviews.Title: Barely used and wont turn on
Reviews.Author: Sunshine
Reviews.Content: We purchased this for my husband to take quick pictures of the work he does at the coal mines. It has literally only taken 23 pictures. I charged the batteries to use it and it will not even turn on. Sadly this was kept in the case and not touched when not used. So now I pay $100 for something and can't even use it. I love Canon but it seems the products aren't as good as they used to be.

Reviews.Title: Got what I wanted
Reviews.Author: David A.
Reviews.Content: This is what I want-a pocket camera with better than phone quality,but not something that I have to sling over my shoulder.The kit came complete with charger&usb; cord& a fold-out instruction sheet.Delivery time was quick as usual.

Reviews.Title: Great small camera
Reviews.Author: Kenneth A. Heitt
Reviews.Content: I bought the powerShot to take on long trips and short hikes.  It fits in one of my old cell phone belt cases and I can hike with it and not even notice the camera.  The digital zoom was better than expected.  I wish it had a bigger optical zoom, but it is a small camera.  The only other negative was the LCD monitor is hard to see in the sun.  I wish it had a viewfinder.

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Amanda S. Ebright
Reviews.Content: This camera is the basic of basic. It has zoom, red-eye remove, and a flash option. It regularly and consistently gave me clear photos that were low on noise. I used it on vacation, as I didn't want to worry about ISO or shutter speed. I just wanted to capture the moments quickly so I could enjoy my self. This camera was perfect for just that. A great buy!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera for the price
Reviews.Author: FD Marshal
Reviews.Content: I purchased 3 of these for my kids for xmas (3 different colors).They take good pictures and are very easy to use.They get used on auto only, it might take great pictures if put on manual settings, I don't know. I have never tried to tinker with them.I think for the price the quality is hard to beat.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera for the price
Reviews.Author: nd account
Reviews.Content: Takes good pictures and video.  We use it for our office and everyone likes it.  Battery life is about a day if you use it a lot.  Took a while to figure out the settings, but you can adjust the photo size for easy emailing and posting.

Reviews.Title: bang for buck
Reviews.Author: Anna
Reviews.Content: In relation to the price, this camera is amazing! I really love it. If you're on a budget or have limited funds and need a camera, it is a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: That Guy 22
Reviews.Content: This is an easy to use camera. I didn't really read the manual, just using it as I go, and so far so good. Images come out good also.

Reviews.Title: Very Compact
Reviews.Author: Suzanne
Reviews.Content: We really love this little camera. Can fit in a shirt pocket and is ready to take a picture quickly. Nice on walks, camping, in the car anddoing anything you may want to take a picture. Easy to use for someone that does not like complicated cameras. Nice Zoom - 16 MP. take very nice pictures.

Reviews.Title: OK BUY
Reviews.Author: Phillip Allsopp "Phillsop"
Reviews.Content: I like this camera, ny take on this is that it did not come with a cable.  I had to purchase this separately.The other thing is that I an unable to charge this camera through the cable. I have to charge  I have an Olympus and it works fine.  I am able to upload and charge through the cable. I have to charge he battery from the charger.  This is a little awkward for me.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Stacey
Reviews.Content: Was purchased for my 9 year old son, perfectly priced and easy to use.  Easy to take nice pictures for anyone. We own a Canon EOS also. Great company, great makes.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Molinex "Couchman"
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these cameras and I am absolutely delighted with the performance and with the price. I gave away one camera as a gift. I kept the other. Some features could be a little more user-friendly, but after a few minutes anyone can figure it out. The pictures are sharp, especially outdoors. Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Sharon
Reviews.Content: I have a Canon S5IS that I absolutely love, but wanted a smaller camera to slip into my purse for an upcoming trip.  This little one does everything I need it to do and is just perfect for traveling.  The only drawback is the lack of an owners manual ( a necessity for technology challenged people like me), but I was able to download it and print out the pages I thought I needed.  Actually, it's very easy to use and takes wonderful pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: DSCOBLUE
Reviews.Content: Great camera!  Compact and takes some fantastic high quality digital pictures.  I thought about getting a more expensive camera but this did the trick.

Reviews.Title: Very compact
Reviews.Author: Brook Budisalovich "Sydneyb4"
Reviews.Content: Although you can find this camera locally for about the same price, you do save on sales tax. Takes great pictures, no battery to recharge like my old camera and weighs next to nothing.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Ron Kirk
Reviews.Content: This thing is awesome i would recommend it for everyone to enjoy if we ever need another one we will be back

Reviews.Title: looks good
Reviews.Author: Doris Sanders
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a gift and I haven't heard back yet how good the pix are or if all the functions are good.

Reviews.Title: Love the camera
Reviews.Author: D. Harris
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, takes great pictures, and the battery lasts a LONG time between recharges.  Wish the camera came with the A/V cable and charging cable instead of the stand alone charger.

Reviews.Title: BOUGHT THIS FOR OUR GRANDSON
Reviews.Author: LINDA
Reviews.Content: OUR GRANDSON REALLY LIKES HIS NEW CAMERA.  HE SEEMS TO THINK THAT IT ISCOMPACT AND EASY TO USE.WE DID PURCHASE THE 2-YEAR PROTECTION PLAN, AS HE IS 14 YEARS OLD ANDWE WANTED TO BE SURE THAT IT WAS COVERED UNTIL HE GOT A LITTLE OLDER.AS FAR AS WE KNOW, HE MET ALL OF THE EXPECTATIONS.THANK YOU

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2500 very happy owner
Reviews.Author: tammy gilliam
Reviews.Content: I have been looking for a simple, easy to use camera. Well, I found it the  Canon Powershot A2500 Digital Camera with 5x Optical Image Stabilized...I purchased this early this month and was very pleased with the simple, easy to operate and the great pictures and videos this small compact inexpensive camera makes.Very lightweight. I have some health issues that prevent me from carrying things with much weight.If you looking for simple easy to use, good looking, great pics and videos with lots of options, this is it. I read al the reviews and decided this one was for me. The price was very convincing too.

Reviews.Title: Say Cheese!
Reviews.Author: Sue OBier
Reviews.Content: I am so glad I bought this camera.  It takes beautiful pictures.  It is so easy to use too.  I also bought the Case Logic DCB-302 Compact Case for Camera - Black and it is perfect for this camera.  The charger fits in the front pocket of the case.  If you are looking for a camera that is not complicated and does what you want it to do ( take beautiful pictures than this is the camera for you.

Reviews.Title: A learning curve for me
Reviews.Author: jeannie
Reviews.Content: I never had a digital camera before so it took quite a bit of getting used to - I have finally been able to figure out how to get my pictures onto my e-mails - that is what I bought it for.

Reviews.Title: great camera!
Reviews.Author: robin peterse
Reviews.Content: I can see why this camera has such a top rating. It takes great pictures and is easy to operate. It is an excellent value!

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money
Reviews.Author: megan
Reviews.Content: This camera works great & the price is unbeatable.  Been using it for about a month now and haven't had any problems.  It doesn't come with a USB to transfer photos and videos to the computer, but I found that the USB I have for my MP3 player fits & works.  The only negative thing I can say is that the battery doesn't stay charged as long as I'd like it to.  Other than that, the pictures are clear and it is very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Good entry level camera
Reviews.Author: ELAINE
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my nine year old and it has held up well. She has used cameras before but nothing too technical. She was able to start using this without reading the directions and it takes decent pictures. We decided to have a "shoot out" between my daughter using this camera, my husband using his Nikon D90, and I using my Panasonic DMC-TZ5. As expected, my old camera just didn't hold up to this and the D90. Not only were the pictures slightly sharper, but the coloring and shading were much more natural looking. There were only a few blurry images, but she was laughing at the time so it is to be expected. Perhaps the reviews I read complaining of blurriness had defective ones.  We lucked out and found this for $50, which I think is a good deal. Just as a side note, the red one we have looks dark pink in natural lighting. Perfect for our girl, probably not so much for a boy.

Reviews.Title: Great Pictures!
Reviews.Author: Erin Lasyone
Reviews.Content: This camera takes awesome pictures! Great camera especially for the price and the fact that it has a rechargeable battery. Very slim and easy to carry. Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Kathryn F. O'Such
Reviews.Content: The fact that it fit in my son's pockets made it even more desirable to have. It took great pictures, and was very easy to operate.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Ani "Harmony"
Reviews.Content: My husband tired of lugging his 35mm around and purchased this for everyday shots.  Really likes that it fits in his shirt pocket and is available for instant use.  The only shortcoming is that it's the less-expensive version and you can't send photos by email--still have to download them to a computer to send. Otherwise, great little camera.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera to Start With
Reviews.Author: puneet sharma
Reviews.Content: It is very compact and easy to use.For normal point and shoot clicks it very good in All lighting conditions.Value for money 8/10.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Lizzette "NoMas"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 7 year old and it has survived several droppings and other abuse. It is really easy to use and he loves how easy it is for him to go from camera to video mode. It takes great pictures and video.

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: Christiane Chapo
Reviews.Content: This camera is very nice but it is small. The good thing about it  is that it take very nice picture. The picture are very clear.

Reviews.Title: As a new photographer, this was a great choice!
Reviews.Author: kate924
Reviews.Content: I've never been a good photographer- my shots were always a bit 'off', so I was hesitant about trying a new camera. WOW! This Canon works great! I will be travelling abroad and am now looking forward to being able to capture some wonderful sights. This was definitely a good choice for me.

Reviews.Title: canon powershot
Reviews.Author: Red Yugo Bandit
Reviews.Content: Great little camera for the money.  Doesn't have too many features to over complicate things so it's just what I wanted.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: rati
Reviews.Content: good, works perfect, cheap and simple to use, i really advice you to buy this in its price, really good

Reviews.Title: Good camera for a reasonable price
Reviews.Author: fjoseph
Reviews.Content: Good camera for a reasonable price, packaging was careful, and it is very easy to use. I would recommend it for those who really don't care about fancy effects or any other dazzling features other cams usually have!

Reviews.Title: Powerful little thing!
Reviews.Author: Hallie Peacock
Reviews.Content: For the price (59) it does a really good job.  We wanted something small and compact that would take a good picture without breaking the bank.  This little guy does an excellent job.  Fits in the pocket when not in use and take a very good picture.  I also like the auto feature so I don't have to scroll through a menu to find the setting I want for the situation.  (close up, night, nature, kids etc)

Reviews.Title: My new camera
Reviews.Author: JPark
Reviews.Content: I'm not a E geek so it took me a few minutes to figure out what all the buttons were.  The on line guide was a big help.Once the camera battery was charge we were taking great pictures and up loading them to the PC and sending them off in emails.  Thanks, I love it.

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Janet
Reviews.Content: Great little camera! I bought it for a vacation, I needed something small, light and easy. It's very user friendly and takes nice, sharp pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Loly
Reviews.Content: Wonderful camera for the price.  Highly recommended. I love the bright colors setting.  Wished it had 2 other settings that my old camera did, but you can't knock this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal for a good camera
Reviews.Author: mistress
Reviews.Content: If you order this camera directly from Canon it will cost $120. It's a great camera. It takes wonderful pictures, no need to buy batteries, and the software for your computer is an easy download away. You do have to get the connection cable for the computer separate, but it's only a couple of bucks.

Reviews.Title: Canon is the best
Reviews.Author: Adriana Riccitelli
Reviews.Content: I love this brand on digital cameras. I have had 3 different canon and all of them last long and were very good.this is very good too.

Reviews.Title: Not as easy to use as my Casio exilim
Reviews.Author: sandra boice
Reviews.Content: It is difficult to use; making adjustments such as changing file size is problematic and pix do not turn out as well as the casio either.

Reviews.Title: My wife Loves this camera
Reviews.Author: Ronnie H.
Reviews.Content: My wife got it and tried it out takes very crisp pictures a lot thinner then we expected but she still loves it doesnt seem to have any internal memory so a sd card is a must for this item

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: momts50
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my son for his photography class.  He hasn't had the chance to use it much, but so far we are very satisfied with it.  It has the big viewing screen on the back and that has made my son happy.  It has a rechargeable battery--that makes me happy.  Batteries are pricey.  I am glad it has a wrist strap, maybe he won't drop this one.

Reviews.Title: Great for travel
Reviews.Author: kk 328
Reviews.Content: I love the size and the ease of use.  However, the photos are not as high quality as I would like.

Reviews.Title: Far better camera than I expected!
Reviews.Author: Susan Sidwell
Reviews.Content: Such a great deal!  I highly recommend this camera.  It takes far better pictures than my last point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Super Value
Reviews.Author: Dale R
Reviews.Content: For  the beginner this point and shoot camera is great, Cannot expect more for this low price and the dependable Canon name,

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Debra S VanHorne
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for a great price.  It is just what I have been looking for.  Exact color and everything.  Love these easy to use cameras.  Will be back for another one for my son.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Berbician Nomad "cheap_navigator"
Reviews.Content: Excellent cameraGreat entry level cameratakes super photoscons:wish cameras were wireless photo/file transfer by now!has a separate charge-easy to loose-charging port on device would be great

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: ralf
Reviews.Content: good camera, but it does not have a lens to view the subject, while shooting.  More instructions needed in printed page..

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Ernest D. Carani "Dean"
Reviews.Content: Love this camera. I hed purchased one for my brother liked his so much that I had to get one myself. the price can't be beat.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: Great quality. I love the pictures I've been getting. It's a point and shoot so you shouldn't have to adjust much to get good pictures in most conditions. I'm pleased to say it's very good at adapting. It's also super light. I was not expecting it. No complaints about this camera at all. I love it.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the Price.
Reviews.Author: Ed Roldie Frugal Shopper
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the price.  Better than one I paid for a couple years ago which costed more  and has less mega pixel  per inch. This one also has a nicer slightly wider screen.

Reviews.Title: what i got
Reviews.Author: Carl J.
Reviews.Content: was nice, but i got no software with it or owners manual. I downloaded both off the internet. had to order the usb cord also.

Reviews.Title: so far very pleased
Reviews.Author: carrie
Reviews.Content: I have not used my camera very much. I didn't want to spend an arm and leg on a camera so I decided on this one. It was pretty much what I was looking for. The only other thing I would have liked is if it was waterproof but I knew I would have to spend more money for a waterproof camera. So far very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Camera is Perfect for travel
Reviews.Author: C. Wilbur "vintage lover"
Reviews.Content: Needed a small camera to take with me on a trip.  Wanted one that had room for lots of pictures and one that was small and light weight.  Also needed one that was user friendly and easy to use.  Picture quality is satifactory and iit's easy to download from the camera to my computer.  Just remember to buy a memory card as this camera does not come with one.

Reviews.Title: awesome camara
Reviews.Author: Lois
Reviews.Content: Needed camara to take pictures of my grandkids so I have them for later to see them when they are not close by.. Love the camara

Reviews.Title: the cam works fantastic
Reviews.Author: Melody faith shoffner
Reviews.Content: well buying one of the cheapest cams on amazon i was nervous for sure. But it worked out well. Took great pics which i need both as a model and in playing photographer. Great to give any teen for their bday or just to use on a family trip

Reviews.Title: A Good Price!
Reviews.Author: QuilterJo-
Reviews.Content: I will not know how well the camera performs until I give it to my 13 year old granddaughter will like it, and if is a good buy.  I love Canon, so hope it will serve my granddaughter well!

Reviews.Title: Superb Deal
Reviews.Author: DK
Reviews.Content: i bought this product because of its look n feel and price of the deal offered..i like the clarity of the photo within its segment.i feel they used cheap plastic for its body..but overall good to buy this brand camera with a attractive price range..

Reviews.Title: perfect camera
Reviews.Author: daniel hanick
Reviews.Content: perfect size... put it in your pocket and go and never had to change the battery and we was on vacation for 5 days. took over 135 pictures. thank you.....

Reviews.Title: great camera for family shots
Reviews.Author: richard Fritz
Reviews.Content: Light weight and fits in my pocket ready for any picture I can take of my grandchildren. Is easy to use and the pictures are clear.I don't get the blur that I can sometimes get with movement of my hands when framing a shot. Quick focus time for that first smile.

Reviews.Title: best little camera i have ever had
Reviews.Author: trapper
Reviews.Content: i purchased for vacation, i didn't want to take my large camera, so i gave this a shot, and man i'm glad i did.  so light so easy to operate. i end up taking more pics with this, than i would have my large lens camera  just perfect

Reviews.Title: Very small at a great price
Reviews.Author: Shane Ramsdell
Reviews.Content: I needed a smaller camera for some recent travel, so that I could leave my large SLR at home.  I wanted a well reviewed, brand name camera at a low price.  This camera has worked well so far.  The digital video is better than the video on my SLR and phone.  The camera resolution is better than my phone but, with the smaller lens, not as good as my SLR.  For the price, it is very good, though.Don't forget to buy an SD card.  There is no internal storage and the camera does not come with one.

Reviews.Title: very useful and good quility
Reviews.Author: siyang
Reviews.Content: I am not professional to take pictures, this type of camera is excellent to use. It is cheap to purchase and clear photo you can see.

Reviews.Title: s*** camera
Reviews.Author: C. Wong
Reviews.Content: worst camera ever, taking a photo whilst being still can cause blurry image. Video recording has low definition video with poor quality sounds. For all this money, its a total rip-off and not worth every cent.

Reviews.Title: Nice Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Randy
Reviews.Content: I like its small compact size; easy to operate and takes good pictures that can to imported to your computer for printing and sending to others.  I have not yet used the video so I cannot comment on it other than to say that Canon makes good products and I expect it to work good.

Reviews.Title: canon powershot a2500
Reviews.Author: Tom Brown
Reviews.Content: After figuring out the features, it did a great job. The software download from canon did not work. Windows still allowed the pictures to download though. Happy with overall performance of 'point and shoot'. Also has the ability zoom in and out while in movie/video mode. Nice!

Reviews.Title: just not sure
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I honestly have not played with it enough yet. I got it because I like the WiFi feature. Usually I do not have an issue picking up a new piece of technology and figuring it out within minutes but this camera has me stumped at times. The menus are not very user friendly, but then again I have not used it much. I am certain once I get more practice with it I will grow to love it

Reviews.Title: simple
Reviews.Author: virgina

Reviews.Title: Fun camera, nice colors
Reviews.Author: Andi C Bair
Reviews.Content: Canon A2500 is a fun camera available in many colors. Let me use my usual disclaimer, in the interest of fairness, and admit that I think many cameras by reputable makers (and there are many) deliver what they promise. It is more about what camera traits you are looking for. So, I would suggest to anyone looking to buy one to google 'camera trait search' and get the whole picture.The A2500 is a fixed lens camera (point and shoot, some would say), with 16 resolution (megapixels), and a x5 zoom. The sensor size is 1/2.3 inch CCD-type, which is standard for cameras of its class.If you were to, say, take pictures of friends and family at an outdoor gathering, this camera is what you need. If you get ambitious, there will be stumbling blocks. Here is the camera's trait mix: It does not have a viewfinder, which, again, many in its class don't. The ISO rating, which is the gauge for how well it does in low light, is 1600. That rating is lower than many others, but it is sufficient for most purposes. The video is a Full HD- that is 1980x1080 resolution. It does not have a hot shoe for an external flash option. That is not unexpected for its size and category. The LCD screen is a 230,000 resolution. The camera does not do RAW processing but you would need only if you did not want to be limited by JPEG type storage. It comes with WiFi- very convenient for easy upload. The weight of the camera is a convenient 135 grams.Overall, nice, fun camera. Having been into photography for a while, I do stress though that you do a camera trait search. That will also tell you more about what you want.
