For those of you that seem to have problems getting good results I have to say you need to read the manual before blaming the camera.**update 3/5/14:I think all this type camera would have this problem, but I experienced huge LCD washout on outside shots even with the display brightness turned all the way up.  It was so bad that even on a cloudy day (snow on the ground which I know doesn't help) I had problems seeing the picture I was about to take.  When I reviewed the photos inside they turned out fine.  But I couldn't see well enough to frame the picture they way I would want.I didn't change from my 5 star rating because, like I said, I think all these cameras would have the same problem.

Reviews.Title: Takes beautiful pictures
Reviews.Author: ladonna
Reviews.Content: This camera takes beautiful pictures and it is very user friendly. This camera was a gift for my 15 year old niece. She is an aspiring photographer and has only ever had the camera on her cell phone to experiment with. She loves this camera!

Reviews.Title: Perfect Camera!
Reviews.Author: James M. Higgins
Reviews.Content: A camera is a perfect gift for my cousin’s birthday! I was looking for a cheaper camera that would save me some budget. Then I stumbled upon this one in Amazon. It is perfect since red is his favorite color. I don’t intend to buy expense ones. It is the thought that counts.

Reviews.Title: Simple to use
Reviews.Author: Amazonian
Reviews.Content: I bought it as a gift for my parents. It's really simple to use. If you want a good no frills camera, this is a good option.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Jeanette Greve
Reviews.Content: his was to replace my Kodak and was afraid of having to learn another complete method of taking pictures but find this is very similar to the one I had and can use the same  memory card I used in my Kodak--appreciate that

Reviews.Title: Great fun for my grandsons
Reviews.Author: clgo64
Reviews.Content: The grandsons were so happy to receive these for Christmas I am sure they are getting great shots and they will enjoy this camera for years to come

Reviews.Title: Nice point and shoot
Reviews.Author: J. D. Martinez
Reviews.Content: No need to repeat all the other reviews, It works nice for what it is, a point and shoot camera. Small, easy to fit in a cargo pocket or purse, and cheap enough to not be stressing everywhere you go about it breaking.

Reviews.Title: the A2500 Canon PowerShot is a great camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: W2M
Reviews.Content: The A2500 Canon PowerShot is a great camera for the price.  Some of the previous reviews caused me second thoughts, but the camera exceeded my expectations and has worked well.  The third party higher capacity battery 2-pack is really required and I have yet to recharge the first of the two after two weeks and over a hundred pix!

Reviews.Title: Easy to use ,works really good
Reviews.Author: WAYNE E MORRIS
Reviews.Content: Easy to use ,works really good for the price nice small item that takes great pitchers. Less hassles than a more expensive camera.

Reviews.Title: I do like the camera
Reviews.Author: Terri Wells
Reviews.Content: I did use it to take pictures of the house fire the day after Christmas.  Fortunately the camera did survive

Reviews.Title: Great camera and design and look
Reviews.Author: Steven Mata
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a Christmas present for someone and it arrived promptly. The opened it and it is so sleek and modern. They had an older Canon and this new one is great! Take great pictures and easy to use. Extremely happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2500 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Barbara Ravella
Reviews.Content: It met my expectations and then some, the customer service department is awesome, had a small problem but they helped me, they are very knowledgeable.

Reviews.Title: Ordered as a gift
Reviews.Author: MCD23
Reviews.Content: I ordered this as a gift so I can't really give a full review.  However I have had multiple Canon point and shoots and they have all been good reliable cameras.  This is not a full feature camera (lacks a lot of the fun effect features of my higher end camera) but you get what you paid for.

Reviews.Title: we like the canon powershot a2500
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for a friend she loves it the pictures are clearwe could have used a better case

Reviews.Title: The beast
Reviews.Author: Sophia rose Jordan
Reviews.Content: Because it is great my grandma used to use a wind up camera and it used to make a lot of noise and know it is quiet at all of our activities

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: James B Guffey
Reviews.Content: We gave as a Christmas gift to our grandson. He loves it. He likes that it takes good photos and also videos.

Reviews.Title: Very nice for the price
Reviews.Author: Bajarick
Reviews.Content: I have not had a lot of time to use it yet have been busy .I did take some moon pics last night .Haven't had the chance to download hem .I was a bit disappointed that I had to supply the cable to do so .And it came without A storage chip ,had zero memory without one .I was lucky that I'm a packrat when it comes to saving related items .So I did not have to wait and purchase them

Reviews.Title: good little camera
Reviews.Author: Michael Benveniste
Reviews.Content: good value for a good little camera, bought it for my sister and she was able to use it right from the box! The processor is decent as well though it does take some time to snap a shot

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Crea19
Reviews.Content: It works. It looked cheap to me at first, but the camera is actually really good. Not broken and it's small so it doesn't take up a lot of space.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Blair Peterson
Reviews.Content: Great Camera for my daughter. Awesome pictures and easy to use for a great price. Good size screen and light weight. Shipped fast.

Reviews.Title: Christmas gift is great!
Reviews.Author: Doris Van Vonderen
Reviews.Content: Our granddaughter is thrilled with this camera.  She has been posing and having someone take pictures of her.Her camera is a neat, small camera and good for anyone who doesn't want lots of bells and whistles to confuse them.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: cjb
Reviews.Content: I had a Canon Power Shot, my last camera, but I lost it.  This camera takes super clear pictures and is easy to use.  The only thing that would make it perfect would be a guide to show what options are on the camera and how to use them.

Reviews.Title: Needs better flash control
Reviews.Author: Curt  J Saurer
Reviews.Content: Needs better control of flash.  Needs a "fill in flash" like my previous Olympus camera.  Disappointed with pictures in snowy settings.  How come every new computer enhancement yields less features for user.  "User friendly" is a hoax.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Ronald D. Lankford "Booger"
Reviews.Content: Big bang for the buck.  Take great pix.  Got it for a camera easier to take than my DLSR on short walks & have with me all the time.Love the little camera.  Pix quality is ex..........

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Mikey0930
Reviews.Content: The camera works good and has great resolution. Easily can be taken anywhere. Only down side I would say that I wasn't expecting was that it does not come with a SD card

Reviews.Title: Good for the $
Reviews.Author: Doc Domino
Reviews.Content: If you are a novice picture as I am, why buy anything else? Drawback: it is difficult for me to hold the clip lever open while I am inserting the memory card. That is because I have a damaged left hand. I had to get a lady neighbor with long fingernails to insert mine. Smile!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: N Roughton
Reviews.Content: This is the first camera I have owned in many years and it fits in my pocket so I can have quick access. It came with a cover which I truly appreciate. When I move the focus sometimes I end up with grainy pictures or blurry and for some reason it takes a few extra seconds to focus. I have missed some good shots because of that.  Another problem I had was not realizing what I clicked on that caused multiple shots and that was strange. I am still not sure how I fixed it either. However, overall for me and my qualifications, this is a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Worth the money
Reviews.Author: Dubya2
Reviews.Content: What I expected for the price. Fairly easy to use and so far has delivered quality pictures. The quality you would expect from a Canon product.

Reviews.Title: Cool Camera
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline Montichard
Reviews.Content: My husband loves this cannon camera, clear and concise pictures were taken, fast shuttle speed. With this Sixteen megapixel, we are impressed.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: PasnThru
Reviews.Content: It does what it says. works easy and takes very good pics, even with my shaky hands. Good battery life.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Sam Aggarwal
Reviews.Content: Gets the job done. I have had better cameras before. Would probably gift it to someone once I am done with a small photography project I have.

Reviews.Title: 58.99  Wait a month if the price is higher then this!
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Walker
Reviews.Content: the price goes up and down, you should be able to find this for LESS then I paid in Jan 2014!  Great camera for normal use, buy a 8 gb card, and a usb cord to plug in if your using a desktop.

Reviews.Title: great christmas gift
Reviews.Author: linda hopper
Reviews.Content: this was a gift..and she loved it. began using it immediately. Easy to use and great shots of her cats.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: Raj
Reviews.Content: The camera is very responsive, small and light. But, it's not a great one. Photos get blurry if camera is not held stable and in low lights.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for a beginner
Reviews.Author: CeeGee
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my mother which is 72 years old and she loves it. It is very simple for her to use, the set up was very easy, the pictures are very clear, pictures can be taken while someone is moving and the picture will still come out clear. The silver or material of the camera is a dull silver compared to my canon powershot camera, however, it still works just as great. I gave a 4 star rating because it didn't come with a case nor the adapater to hook up to the computer but overall it is a great beginners camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Gerson Diaz
Reviews.Content: The Canon Powershot A 2500 is a beautiful camera. This is a camera practical and the simple manipulation. Take a picture is very easy

Reviews.Title: a little disappointed
Reviews.Author: Toni Hudson
Reviews.Content: I received this camera about a week ago. I did not know it didn't have a memory card so I was not able to take pictures. No where in the advertisement did it state that I would have to purchase memory card.

Reviews.Title: Missing memory card
Reviews.Author: Karen Kramer
Reviews.Content: The camera came in the mail with no memory card which was not mentioned in an obvious way on Amazon's site that it wasn't included or I would have ordered one. So the camera arrived and I had to scramble to find a memory card in order to take any pictures for our event. Would have been nice if they had included a small memory card (even to take 1 or 2 photos) or made it more obvious on the site that one was not included because the camera was essentially useless without it.  Also, once I did get my hands on a memory card, many of the photos turned out blurry. Not impressed.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: LeAnne Plaisance
Reviews.Content: The camera works great.  I do have one complaint...when I ordered it, it said I was getting a free card and carrying case with it.  I did not receive either.  So, buying the camera was useless.

Reviews.Title: Battery never stayed in
Reviews.Author: Bella Head
Reviews.Content: The battery never stayed in the chambers. I fought with it every time I tried putting the battery in the chambers.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: wilmer davila
Reviews.Content: perfect all good, wiyhout problems i love. i like, it is perfect to me and for my work, it is small and powerfull

Reviews.Title: CHRISTMAS
Reviews.Author: trini girl
Reviews.Content: I did not know that this camera did not come with a memory card installed, i sent it as a christmas gift along with the case to my sister, unfortunately she could not use it. i now have to purchase a memory card. The rating i gave it was just based on the  picture on your web site i do not know how this camera will rate. Both my sister & i was very sad not to be able to experience christmas pictures, we live in different countries.

Reviews.Title: Great Christmas present!
Reviews.Author: Robert J. Hoffarth "Postal One"
Reviews.Content: Well worth the price.  Good quality, good price, great wow factor! Easy to use right out of the box.  It made a great instant Christmas morning toy.

Reviews.Title: Couldnt resist the deal!
Reviews.Author: Angel Prado
Reviews.Content: I saw this camera on sale at the store I worked at. Decided to check price on amazon.com. Not only was it about 10 dollars cheaper, it came with free sd card and carrying case. I bought it right away. It was a christmas present for my mother. She loves it, she takes pictures all the time! Long battery life, good pixel quality, nothing wrong with it so far. Would recommend this to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Good buy.
Reviews.Author: Eddie B
Reviews.Content: Was what I expected. Lightweight. East to use. Bought as a gift but would buy one for personal use if I needed it

Reviews.Title: confusion with the order
Reviews.Author: Richard Suggs
Reviews.Content: This was  a Christmas present. When we talked to the recipient they said that there was no memory card with the camera. We were under the impression the card was included when we bought the camera.

Reviews.Title: Good camera but Expected more...
Reviews.Author: julia
Reviews.Content: The camera is okay but it did not come with a USB cable for some weird reason and you have to pull out the battery to charge (wish I would've have know that) other than that it works good and is user friendly.

Reviews.Title: great replacement camera
Reviews.Author: skelley88
Reviews.Content: I needed a simple camera to replace one that went bad after a fall.  Shipped quickly, good price, nice item.  Great resolution in the pix.

Reviews.Title: False advertising
Reviews.Author: Robert Croker
Reviews.Content: Although I am pleased with the camera when it was advertised it was stated that it came with a memory card and carrying case. The card and case did not accompany the camera and was never shipped.

Reviews.Title: just what i thought
Reviews.Author: Perel O.
Reviews.Content: it give a very plasticy look and doest come with a memory card...but it works well and is a good choice

Reviews.Title: Just not fan of a la carte
Reviews.Author: Nikki Scarpitto
Reviews.Content: Has the clarity/higher pixel rate I was looking for and needed for posting pics, yet light to carry around in my pocket. Only drawback is the new "a la carte" method of purchasing. Would have been nice to have come with everything as a pkg instead of having to purchase memory card and cable. Very happy with the camera itself though. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Cannon Power Shot
Reviews.Author: Angela Thompson
Reviews.Content: It arrived prior to Christmas and my son is very happy with it.  He would recommend this camera to others.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: laura
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a gift and for the price this camera is great! It has different settings for color and wide angle to a fish-eye lense.  Getting to the lenses and different color features is easy enough for a kid or an elderly adult to use. The pictures look great and for the money this was a great choice.

Reviews.Title: Gift to daughter.
Reviews.Author: M. L. DeCollibus
Reviews.Content: My daughter's previous phone wasn't taking very good pictures so I decided to by this one as a present for Christmas.  She likes it  a lot and the quality of pictures with this "point and shoot" are so much better.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: J. Spain "Buckner17"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a friend and it turned out to be a very appreciated gift.  The product is just the right size and is quite intuitive to operate.

Reviews.Title: terrific
Reviews.Author: jenny
Reviews.Content: I just got this camera, and ordered it based on the rave reviews at Amazon. They were right as far as I can see. For a moderate price, this camera has a large viewing screen. It does not require batteries because it has a rechargeable one. It has a good zoom lens. It is small and easy to carry. It is far superior to my old Polaroid digital camera, which took good pictures, so I expect this one will too.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Mary Kessler
Reviews.Content: It was a gift for my 7 yr old granddaughter who has been a camera bug since early on, she loves it.

Reviews.Title: i like camera
Reviews.Author: JAIMAR MENDOZA
Reviews.Content: very good product photos are great, I recommend itif someone could be of more megapixels would be great thk

Reviews.Title: Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: James Cundiff
Reviews.Content: Takes excellent pictures. Has a lot of bells and whistles and is a little complicated. Should have more and easier to get at Resolution settings. I think it has 4 levels and not easily understood in Pixel size.

Reviews.Title: KID FRIENDLY
Reviews.Author: dave rowland
Reviews.Content: THE GRANDSON HAS SPENT A WHOLE DAY IN THE BUTTERFLY GARDENS AT THE SCIENCE MUSUEM, HAS TAKEN MANY VERY GOOD,  HIGH QUALITY PHOTOSDR

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Joseph B Lee
Reviews.Content: We actually have two of this model. First we bought one for the wife, who wanted a simple to operate camera for a vacation trip. It performed so well and is so easy to use that we gave one to the 8-year-old grandson, who wanted a camera for Christmas.

Reviews.Title: red eye and too long a pause befor shot is taken
Reviews.Author: Susan l Harkins
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my non technical Mother In Law and it is presenting a bit of a problem for here in the pause that happens before the shot is taken.  Hopefully, she will get used to it.  It also creates red eye very frequently and I don't know how to remove it.

Reviews.Title: Great gift for beginners
Reviews.Author: Brittany L.
Reviews.Content: I got this as a gift for my dad, as my old camera died on him. So far he is quite satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Canon Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: JEAN NOVOTNY
Reviews.Content: I got what I needed with this camera, smaller, lightweight (easy to carry). It is very easy to use & takes good pictures.I also appreciate the ease of use when changing and charging the battery;  other cameras I have had were difficult toopen.

Reviews.Title: wow
Reviews.Author: Norma Brazington
Reviews.Content: great pictures and I love the zoom . I think it is fun to have a red camera, Thank you

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: grandma skiier
Reviews.Content: As usual, canon comes thru with a great little fill in camera. This is the second one and we love it

Reviews.Title: fast Delivery but no memory card
Reviews.Author: Richard Bolan
Reviews.Content: camera is nice enough and the purchase went smoothly. Camera was advertised to come with a memory card as part of the promotion but it did not. Made taking Christmas photos impossible since I couldn't buy a card Christmas morning.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2500 16MP Camera
Reviews.Author: Justglad2bhere
Reviews.Content: This high resolution mini point-and-shoot is capable of taking images suitable for 16"x20"  reproduction.  The camera is very compact and appears to be well built.  That said, I find it regrettable that the device is not shipped with an operator's manual, which must be downloaded and printed by the owner; the instructions that accompany the  camera are sketchy at best.  I recommend it if one can be purchased at the price level I found...less than $70.00.  Otherwise....

Reviews.Title: Top Notch
Reviews.Author: Dave Etter
Reviews.Content: The camera is easy to use and handy to carry.  produces excellant quality.  Very versatile and far more capable than meets the eye.  More fun than my Rebel.

Reviews.Title: Easy
Reviews.Author: Amanda F
Reviews.Content: Light and easy to use, this camera is exactly what my 12 year old needed.  She likes to take pictures on the macro setting and the details are amazing!

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: I gave this as a gift for Christmas.  The size is perfect and it takes great photos.  You really can't go wrong with a Canon product.

Reviews.Title: It takes good pictures
Reviews.Author: nicole owens
Reviews.Content: it takes good pictures. Its very slow and with kids I need something faster to keep up with them. on the plus side my daughters eyes have been open in every picture. lol

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: Mike Sheehan
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with the prompt delivery and even more pleased with the product!  Actually bought the camera as a gift for my daughter, but now i want one for myself!

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Pleased with camera so far. Like the rechargeable battery. Good value for a simple point and shoot camera. Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: NOT A GOOD CHOICE, AT LEAST FOR M E
Reviews.Author: Diogenes Andrade
Reviews.Content: WELL,. I LOVE CANON PRODUCTS, BUT THIS CAMERA, DESPITE HAVING A 16 MB RESOLUTION, IS FOR BEGINNERS . THE QUALITY OF THE PHOTOS ARE NOT SO GOOD, EVEN IF YOU SET UP A HIGHER RESOLUTION....I SHOULD HAVE CHOOSEN ANOTHER KIND OF CAMERA, BUT NOW IS OVER....

Reviews.Title: 3rd One in 10 years, Love it!
Reviews.Author: John W DeSpirito
Reviews.Content: Purchased for Dad this Xmas, we had 3 in our family since kids were born.  Best camera for all situations.

Reviews.Title: My husband loves this
Reviews.Author: Valerie J. Douglas "Author and Dream Weaver"
Reviews.Content: It's lightweight and fits in his pocket. An SLR would have been too big. We had a similar PowerShot, but this one is lighter, and takes better pictures.

Reviews.Title: decent but outdated
Reviews.Author: misschang
Reviews.Content: had no idea how outdated this camera was. the quality also isnt that great. but it is a good camera for young children or if ur just looking for a camera to use for fun

Reviews.Title: NO accessories
Reviews.Author: MATT
Reviews.Content: This camera came with no memory card, no data transfer cord and no case.  Not happy that I need to go out and buy all this extra stuff now.

Reviews.Title: For the price, this little camera is awesome
Reviews.Author: bpadgett
Reviews.Content: I wasn't looking for a camera that took forever to figure out. The canon power shot A2500 was the perfect choice for me. GREAT little camera.

Reviews.Title: great Camera
Reviews.Author: brandes carl
Reviews.Content: I like it very much it makes very nice pictures and is very handy to carry! thank you very much have a nice day !

Reviews.Title: Good picture quality
Reviews.Author: S. Kirkpatrick "handesteve"
Reviews.Content: This camera has Good picture quality for the money and I Like the compact size. A lot of bang in small package.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Kenenth Graham
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with this Canon camera and especially the price through Amazon.  Considering I'm elderly and not too tech savvy, it was very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Amazing pictures. Good low-light performance
Reviews.Author: Sunish U. Parikh
Reviews.Content: For a small point & shoot camera, I was amazed at the results - even in low light conditions. My only complaint is about the charger -  wish it had a USB charger instead of external battery charger

Reviews.Title: Cannon PowerShot
Reviews.Author: janiceladner
Reviews.Content: Was also a Christmas gift for my  daughter. She used it to take pictures opening our presents at Christmas. She loves it.

Reviews.Title: GREAT!
Reviews.Author: Georgie
Reviews.Content: Awesome point and shoot camera! Love Canon, love this camera, got it to have an easy, light camera to use when I was on vacation in hawaii and not disapointed in this purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great camera, great price
Reviews.Author: Black Lung
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mom for Christmas. She loves it. She has already broken it in and I've heard nothing but good so far.

Reviews.Title: Nice little point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Rit
Reviews.Content: I have owned Canon PowerShot before and have been generally happy with the quality.  While this is a fairly good compact yet features packed camera, it does lack a little in optical zoom range and perhaps quality.  I have yet to thoroughly test it out with different lighting and distance for the picture quality from what I have taken they do come out slightly grainy.  Not really a good camera for recording videos especially if you are going to be zooming in or out while recording.  It captures the mechanical sound from the lens shaft or motor movement.  I will update this review once I have taken more pictures.  But so far looks like a good camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: For the beginning photog
Reviews.Author: Debra W.
Reviews.Content: Feels like a childs toy has no tactile substance ,slow to activate shutter release to capture the moment,would not recommend except to someone as there first point/ shoot camera

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Kurt D
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to photograph our Christmas this year and it worked just described as an excellent deal for $60.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: carol
Reviews.Content: Good for the price good pictures the one point I would rate excellent is the battery charger thank you and would recommend it for a beginner  photographer someone who hasn't had much experience. I bought it for my better half they enjoy it also very easy to use

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2500 Great Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Bob Weiland
Reviews.Content: Wife and I gave our two grand daughters each a Canon PowerShot A2500.  They are very happy with their cameras.

Reviews.Title: For my purpose :)
Reviews.Author: Gil Avanzado Jr
Reviews.Content: Yes for my purpose it works very fine. No need of expensive pocket size cameras to take quick pics when on the road or my back seat passenger takes pics while riding my Harley.

Reviews.Title: Nice video
Reviews.Author: Michael Jones
Reviews.Content: good deal for the price, disappointed that the media card wasn't included. works well with iMovie.zoom is accurate and smooth.

Reviews.Title: Way too slow
Reviews.Author: D. Lavik "dano"
Reviews.Content: Nice small compact camera but way too slow.  It seems to take 10 seconds between pictures..... By the time the shutter clicks your subject has moved or left the building.

Reviews.Title: Good delivery service
Reviews.Author: Marie Mahnken
Reviews.Content: I thought it would come with the memory card, but I understand I have to purchase it separate. Not sure how the strap hooks up, but I'll figure that out. it's my first digital camera, I'm sure it will work out just fine, once i get use to it. It did come quickly and the price was good.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good
Reviews.Author: Melissa Leaman
Reviews.Content: The only problem i have with it is the delay in taking a picture.  Other than that I love this Camera.  It is actually the second Canon I have purchased.  This was the upgrade.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: J&J
Reviews.Content: I got this for my elderly father who is not technology savy. He was able to take pictures without help. Good quality pics.

Reviews.Title: Simple to use
Reviews.Author: mrsmoose19
Reviews.Content: My 6-year-old wanted a camera for Christmas but I didn't want to waste money on a "kiddie" version. I wanted something easy for her to use and understand, but one that she could use for years to come.  This camera fits the bill. Very simple to use. She can now take pictures, videos, and is able to review and delete all on her own. The quality of picture is what you would expect from a point and shoot camera. Happy with my purchase and so is she.

Reviews.Title: Nice first camera
Reviews.Author: susan daneker
Reviews.Content: I like the ease of use of this camera.  We have one we use for travel:  it's light and takes good pictures.  We bought this one for our 8 year old granddaughter because it was so easy for us to figure out and the editing capabilities are very adequate for casual use.  She seems to be enjoying it.

Reviews.Title: Adequate for the price
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: This was a gift and the camera is very good for the low price I got it for. The pictures are nice.

Reviews.Title: Finally had a chance to try this camera out as I did not have the storage card and am disappointed
Reviews.Author: Del
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is very poor and there doesn't seem to be any function to make it better.  I plan to return it.

Reviews.Title: Good and cheap
Reviews.Author: benzion kessler
Reviews.Content: Very good product for this price range compact and sleekGot it for 70 bucks we'll see  how long it lasts

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Bruce D. Thompson
Reviews.Content: I would start by saying this is a very good "cheap" camera. It is ideal for novice users, or anyone who wants good vacation shots and is not a snob about cameras. It takes very high quality pictures and 720P HD video and is very easy and intuitive. It has nice big screen to look at picture and video you have taken and it interface with your pad or PC via USB or by SD card. The camera requires, but does not come with an SD card. I bought the 64gb card and it is my understanding this is the maximum this camera can use. It has 5x zoom which is not awesome, but adequate for the casual user.  Underwater housings are also available for this camera. For the price, ($69.00 using Amazon Prime) you cannot do better. This is vastly superior to my previous powershot.  It is an excellent bang for your buck and I love the size and quality for average use.

Reviews.Title: disappointed.
Reviews.Author: Dan Thoeny
Reviews.Content: The cameras not bad but it ships without a card. What good is it if you can't use it? I then had to order a card.I was also very disappointed with the Amazon site. A special offer of case and card were to come with the camera. But they confusing made it so you had to make sure a certain spot was checked to receive them. I didn't and it looks like many others did not as well. If the offer is made make sure it's clear how to get it.

Reviews.Title: It is an ok camera
Reviews.Author: zz
Reviews.Content: It is an ok camera for the price but don't depend on this camera for THE moments  .  .  .

Reviews.Title: A good Cannon as usual
Reviews.Author: Stephen Donoian
Reviews.Content: I've always had great success with my Cannons.  This is no different.  A really good camera at very good price.

Reviews.Title: Great size, great quality for the price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our 12 year old to have at Christmas as her first camera.  It is really easy to use and has been a great camera and was a great price.  Nothing fancy, which is exactly what we wanted.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Alan
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband who uses it to take pictures of his auto paint work .He loves the portability & easy use,

Reviews.Title: Canon Camera
Reviews.Author: Nancy Mula
Reviews.Content: I was very surprised to find that I had to purchase additional items in order to use this Canon camera.

Reviews.Title: Cheap for a reason
Reviews.Author: Andrea Stevenson
Reviews.Content: No SD Card, No computer download cord. Wish the description was up front about these necessary items so my gift could function.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Patti Pruett
Reviews.Content: couldn't use because there wasn't a card, it was a gift for my grand daughter for christmas hope she likes it.

Reviews.Title: Nice and very good pictures, lots of options,
Reviews.Author: jim harkless
Reviews.Content: Just exactly what she wanted. Not to large , great picture taking options. Great on automatic, and also takes videos.She never has her phone on and wanted a new phone to take picture.  not paying monthly fees so she could take pictures and play on internet. So I got her this and a new Kindle HD. She is very happy with both and I have no monthly phone bill.

Reviews.Title: Its ok
Reviews.Author: Rhead Kinder
Reviews.Content: For the money, this camera is fine.  Still too slow on taking pictures.  It is nice and small and easy to carry.

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot A2500 camera
Reviews.Author: Lug
Reviews.Content: The camera is just fine.  There wasn't a remote charging cord in the box as it stated in the description and on the Box.  There also wasn't a memory card with the camera, which makes it useless.  Should have been stated in the description of the item.  I did get the card before xmas so it was ready for the gift openings, just could have been a disaster!!!

Reviews.Title: new camera
Reviews.Author: Janice Braun
Reviews.Content: Easy to use. Uses common discs, nothing exotic. Photos clear. I am happy with it as it performs as I anticipated. Perfect for my use.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: MT Madman "MT Madman"
Reviews.Content: Got this for my daughter as a gift for her mother, mom's not quite sure how she likes it yet but she likes point and shoot which this is so we're hoping it's good with her.

Reviews.Title: Blurry
Reviews.Author: Richard Goodwin
Reviews.Content: Product not as good as most of the reviews claimed to be. Poor picture quality. Battery life is excellent though.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: teri freiman cagle
Reviews.Content: fast shipment and wonderful camera to use.  Highly recommend this camera for it's price.  Was a perfect christmas gift to buy

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: ediaz
Reviews.Content: It takes good pictures, it's very light, versatil, i like the color, and it is easy to use.  I do recommend the product.

Reviews.Title: I Really Love this Camera
Reviews.Author: Virginia Reese
Reviews.Content: This camera is very easy to use and takes wonderful pictures. I had a very expensive larger camera that did not take pictures this good. I like the size of this Camera. It fits in my purse or pocket easily.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!
Reviews.Author: Linda Napoli
Reviews.Content: I asked for this as a Christmas gift and am SO happy I did.  I am a professional photographer and wanted something small to put in my pocket and take to the park with my kids...my DSLR is big and bulky.  I fiddled with the camera for a while and was thinking it might be okay, but I would likely not use it much.  Then I turned off the flash and turned on the vibration control.  Now I LOVE it!  It takes great pictures, even indoors without a flash.  I am quite impressed and would highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: You'll Spend More Money Than It Says
Reviews.Author: Liz Sills
Reviews.Content: I thought that I was getting a steal on a digital camera during a Black Friday sale. Turns out it didn't come with a memory card or a cable to plug it into the computer, so I had to buy those separately and that was another $50. Womp wooooooooomp.

Reviews.Title: No instruction book comes with it.
Reviews.Author: H. A, Wagoner "FIDDLER"
Reviews.Content: The camera itself seems to be a good product but when I bought it I was of the understanding that a memory card and carrying case came with the camera. Not so, I got nothing. It doesn't even come with an instruction book. There is a pamphlet that tells you how to put in the battery, etc. etc. If you really want to know how to use the camera you have to go online and look up the instruction book. It is 30 or 40 pages long so if you are going to print it off it will take a while. O.K, it's probably easy to use if you have a cell phone that takes pictures, movies, etc. etc., or are familiar with stuff like this. I happen to be from the older generation and I do not have a cell phone, nor do I want one. It seems to me that a book of instructions could at least be included with the purchase. I would recommend the camera, but to who? Anyone with the cell phone that costs hundreds of dollars to own and operate would probably have no use for a camera such as this.

Reviews.Title: Acceptable for the price
Reviews.Author: Hao Zhang
Reviews.Content: The only problem I find so far is a bit slow for the camera to write the data into the memory card when shooting pictures.

Reviews.Title: christmad gift
Reviews.Author: lisa
Reviews.Content: Its small but gets the job done was surprized it had panaramic on it ive always like that feature gave it as christmas gift reciever was happy used it same day but it doesnt come with a case,sd card . Takes good pictures

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: JAMES MOELLER
Reviews.Content: For my granddaughter and within just a couple minutes she was taking great pictures and video!  Very user friendly. Great buy.

Reviews.Title: Digital camera
Reviews.Author: Monica H Banis
Reviews.Content: Bought these for my two sisters....good price and they are happy with the product.  One sister bought the same one for a friend that never had a digital camera before and he is working it with no problem....didn't know it came with no SD card though !

Reviews.Title: Really nice camera.
Reviews.Author: Barbara S
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this really nice camera.  It is light to carry and very easy to use.  Takes very good photos.  Very good camera for children old enough to have one.  My 7 year old loves it and can make great videos. This is the second one I have purchased for another grandchild.

Reviews.Title: Very easy to use-
Reviews.Author: Wm. T. N.
Reviews.Content: Simple to use on "Auto" setting, takes excellent shots, other settings available if you need them. Sturdy  construction-nice compact size - good value...

Reviews.Title: Very Happy!
Reviews.Author: Kris Ruprecht
Reviews.Content: Very happy with purchase.  Gave it to my daughter for Christmas and she just loves it! Would purchase again and again!

Reviews.Title: Good quality camera
Reviews.Author: Joe Church "Joe Church"
Reviews.Content: I got this for my son for Christmas and was very pleased with it.  The quality of the camera is good, its sturdy and feels solid.  Image quality is good and the resolution is very high.  My only complaint is that it seems slow to process an image after snapping a photo.  I have tried two memory cards, one older and slower and one brand new and a class 10 very fast card.  There was no noticeable difference after switching cards.  When you take a photo there is a pause while the image is processed and saved to the memory card.  For someone wishing to do rapid fire shooting or any kind of faster sequential photo snapping - you will be disappointed.  Its not a big deal in my son's case, but still something to keep in mind.  There is also no pouch or bag for this camera included, so if you want to carry it or protect it, you will need to find another option.

Reviews.Title: Picture quality not what i expected
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Disappointed that the picture true quality is pretty fuzzy. I've always had cannon cameras and this is the only bad purchase.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: LLH "hug"
Reviews.Content: I love the Canon series of digital cameras. This is the fourth one of the several that I have purchased over several years, because I have purchased them as presents for my grown kids. This one has 16 megapixels, and it takes great photos of things that are moving. I took a photo that included the TV in the shot, and the close up showed the picture on the screen of the TV perfectly.  I have a slight tremor in my hands, and I can take good pictures using this camera despite this. I have also been known to accidentally drop my camera, even though I try to use a lanyard around my neck to secure it. So far, even with dropping it, my older Canon camera hasn't needed to be repaired.

Reviews.Title: gift
Reviews.Author: K. Stetson "amazon shopper"
Reviews.Content: My daughter was very excited about getting this camera. It was just what she wanted and Cannon is a high quality product in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: coco
Reviews.Content: It doesnt take the fastest pictures but other than that its a great great camera.  It was a great deal .

Reviews.Title: good average camera
Reviews.Author: Kristin
Reviews.Content: Quick pictures, easy buttons.  Great for price!  good size screen.  We always stick with cannon.  5 stars for overall look, use.

Reviews.Title: Get what you Pay for.
Reviews.Author: JAC_the_Reader
Reviews.Content: Being that it was a Canon, I thought it would be a great product. sadly No. the casing is plastic, feels like a toy. the view screen gets all grainy when zooming even a little.functions are ok, but I was expecting more from a Camera name like Canon.

Reviews.Title: Happy grandaughter
Reviews.Author: William Bartko
Reviews.Content: I gave this to her at Christmas, had it figured out and able to use it very quickly.  Takes very nice picture and is easy to use.Bill

Reviews.Title: IT IS A NICE CAMERA
Reviews.Author: dustin
Reviews.Content: IT TAKES PICTURES. IT FITS IN MY MASSIVE HANDS. I INSIST THAT THIS IS RED, NOT PINK. VERY EXTREMELY SATISFIED.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Karen Kaveney
Reviews.Content: If you are not professional like me but love take good pictures, that's the camera. Amazing!!! For the price was the best deal ever. Se você não é processional, mas ama tirar ótimas fotos, essa é a câmera. Incrível!!! Pelo preço, foi um ótimo negócio. Vale a pena.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product--Excellent price
Reviews.Author: Ken M.
Reviews.Content: My old Canon met by accident, so this was the new product to replace it.  Super easy to use.  Picture quality is excellent. And you can't beat the price.  Highly recommend to anyone looking for a compact, affordable and easy to use camera.  I've even had friends with the high price equipment comment on the quality of my photos.

Reviews.Title: Canon camera
Reviews.Author: tom pierson
Reviews.Content: This camera is fantastic, just what I wanted. It is the best camera I have now. It takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: GREAT camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Anniemon
Reviews.Content: Paid $69 but had credits totalling $35, so really great deal for me! Simple to use - haven't even downloaded the manual - just charged battery and was up and running. Thought it included a memory card, did not receive one.

Reviews.Title: Memory card and case
Reviews.Author: D. Nava "Dotstersfd"
Reviews.Content: Camera works great, easy to use. Clear and vivid pictures.When I purchased this camera on December 14th  the add also stated that it would come with a free memory card and case.  You were to click on the card and case to add to the order.  I did that.  I did not receive either one.  When I called Amazon the young man I spoke to asked his supervisor about it.  The supervisor stated that It was not an option on the add.  I said I didn't expect it to be on there now since the camera dropped in price.  However, that's what was offered when I purchased it.  I also advised them to check the reviews, I was not the only one with this complaint.  Just out of luck I guess!!!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Got here as promise before Christmas. Very happy with it... now we have to figure out how to work it. But hubby was happy so am I...it was to him from Santa! Thank you, Gail

Reviews.Title: Great Gift!
Reviews.Author: DelieB
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gift and loved the moment it was opened.  I think it has been put down only long enough to recharge the battery.

Reviews.Title: Pretty nice.
Reviews.Author: A. Bosley
Reviews.Content: It obviously isn't a professional amazing camera, but for the price it's very nice. I looked at several different cameras and decided I liked this one, went to a physical store and tried it out. I really liked it, but they didn't have anything but the floor model in stock. So back to Amazon!It's a nice camera, easy to use. My mom has a nicer camera but she really just wanted a point-and-shoot that she could use quickly or take on vacation without toting around a huge camera bag. This works well.Camera uses rechargeable battery and takes a regular SD card (which wasn't included in my particular order).

Reviews.Title: good camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Bela Ratmansky
Reviews.Content: The problem that I have is that the controls are not as intuitive as on the older ones.  Especially if I want to change shooting modes.  Another drawback is clearly cheap camera body, it feels flimsy without strength or weight.

Reviews.Title: DOES NOT INCLUDE USB CABLE TO PUT PICTURES ON COMPUTER
Reviews.Author: patrick
Reviews.Content: Is was terrible on christmas when this gift was opened and there was no USB cable, it only includes the battery and a charger. Almost every other camera includes the USB cable, get one of them screw canon trying to make more money off us.

Reviews.Title: Anyone can use this!
Reviews.Author: Matthew Y.
Reviews.Content: The camera was well worth the money.  If you don't want a complicated camera, but a good, quality camera, purchase this one!  Well worth the money.  You will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Ad
Reviews.Author: Tony Tumbarello
Reviews.Content: Not as I thought, the ad said free 16 GB sandisk included, but it was not.  So I was not happy when it arrived to be used as a gift.

Reviews.Title: Information on listing offered a memory card and compatable usb cable cord none of which was included.
Reviews.Author: JOHN SELL
Reviews.Content: the camera is OK but the listing stated if you buy now the purchase included a USB cable and memory card none of which wasincluded.. tell me what good is a digital camera without a USB cable?  I would like these items sent to me at no charge asap.TheUSB

Reviews.Title: canon digital camera
Reviews.Author: thomas r. mctigue, jr..
Reviews.Content: just got it, still learning  all about it. so far, it`s what I wanted at a great price. instructions could be clearer.

Reviews.Title: Box is incomplete
Reviews.Author: Richard Kaiser
Reviews.Content: Camera arrived bare, no memory, no cables, no pouch.Works great and red color really contributes to good picture taking

Reviews.Title: great little camera.
Reviews.Author: Judi Webster
Reviews.Content: It's a great little camera, but it does not come with a cord for downloading to the computer. Wish it stated that more clearly when purchasing.

Reviews.Title: Connector cable and memory card not included
Reviews.Author: Hian Kai Kwa
Reviews.Content: Good camera, user friendly and easy to use. One flaw is that it does not come with connector cable or memory card, and the AMZN description should make this clear.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Richard Swigert
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera for a low price.  Small and light weight, but still has a lot of useful features. The 16MP images are sharp and clear.

Reviews.Title: This is a easy travel camera, just right for pockets, purse etc..
Reviews.Author: Stephen B.
Reviews.Content: I love everything about this camera, except I am finding that the background colors are bleeding into the pictures. Example, my walls are a red wine color and it gives everything in the picture a red tint. Things like, faces, clothes, the color of the other walls. It's not horrible, and not everyone agreed with me on this, but that is what I saw in the pictures. I have to read up on it a little more, it's possible I am not using it correctly. I have not tried it out doors yet, but I think that it will clear based on the reviews of other's.I will mainly be using this camera for out door activities, kayaking, etc. so I will keep it and hope that the issue I am having will resolve by making adjustments to how I am using it. If anyone has any advice or tips on this, please share!I will still recommend this as a go to camera, but if your looking for a camera for high quality, I would pass on it.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2500 16MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: rick bame
Reviews.Content: The camera was a great hit!! My grandson loved the camera! He took a number of pictures the day he received it and was intrigued  with all its features.

Reviews.Title: Great point & shoot!
Reviews.Author: E.E. "EE"
Reviews.Content: I got this to replace a Sony point and shoot camera that started taking somewhat lousy photographs through no fault of my own. It's great for events where a more professional camera would be a hassle to carry, but a cell phone camera would be lacking. I used it at a meet and greet after a concert, and it took excellent photos of the artist and me. I used it recently to snap some photos of Christmas lights, and I was pleased at the quality. It's a great budget camera, with a small zoom, but it takes great photos.FYI, some people complained because it doesn't contain a USB transfer cable, it's easier to just take the SD card out and put it directly in your computer to transfer photos.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat Canon
Reviews.Author: Roy G. Biv "Mike in Miami"
Reviews.Content: I am no photographer.  But my work takes me all over the world.  I could not kill my 5 year old pocket cannon - It took took excellent photos even tho the back viewer quit working.  But the viewfinder worked so I kept snapping.  I finally broke down and purchased this one for a trip to Scotland.  1/2 half the weight and twice as many pixels as my old one.  Plus it uses the same batteries, case and SD cards!  AND the anti-shake feature really works!  And everyone love my photos! and it is the size as my cellphone! Hooray to Canon.  What a great deal!

Reviews.Title: Beats a smartphone!
Reviews.Author: Jim Bay
Reviews.Content: If you want a simple camera that takes a better picture than a smartphone,this is it.  Good price point, only drawback is the SD card is not included.

Reviews.Title: great little camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Dalibor Moyzes "artist-photographer"
Reviews.Content: tiny and easy to carry in your pocket, takes great photos, I uploaded some for everyone to see ... the only thing is that when you push the button, it takes time till the camera clicks, so if your cat moves, till it clicks, the cat is gone. but what you want for 68 bucks? a leica? it is a marvel of the modern technology for this tiny price and here is a video i took in sunny california few days ago with this camera while driving in a car, the video and audio is great[...]

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Catherine
Reviews.Content: I just love my Canon PowerShot... It is small but powerful.  It takes wonderful pictures and the detail is awesome.  It is easy to use.  I would recommend this camera to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Cheaply made.
Reviews.Author: Rebecca S. Warfel "thesupernovagirl"
Reviews.Content: It's okay. I expected something a little more sturdy. I got this at a discount through Amazon Deals and I essentially got what I paid for. I'm guessing Amazon Deals is a resale of returns department. I can see why people would return this. The casing is cheap plastic and the display can be grainy at times. I bought this to replace a slightly older Canon Powershot I had stolen out of my purse. Compared to that camera, this one is very cheaply made.

Reviews.Title: great camera, great deal
Reviews.Author: RJ
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for a great price. My 12 year old son loves using it and its perfect for him,

Reviews.Title: Good solid compact camera for kids, starters, or daily use
Reviews.Author: BebeRojo "Rojo's Mondrama"
Reviews.Content: We like this and the Elf version so much we have now bought another one for our second child. Great, easy to use camera that comes in a fun color and won't disappoint a 5-10 year old new camera user who also wants to take videos...but will also please the adult user who just wants a no-fuss compact digital camera with HD Video capability to tuck into a purse, pocket or bag for ease of use over a larger DSLR camera outfit. Bonous on our order of this product this time = it came with a free SD Card! Pairing it up with a CoreLogic slim case and it's a great Santa Gift for our child!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Vanessa solano
Reviews.Content: I like the way it was packaged, very secure..This would be a gift my mother would love...Thanks for the expedient process...

Reviews.Title: nice compact camera
Reviews.Author: geolotus
Reviews.Content: I bought it using one click purchase, which I won't do anymore, it says you can review the purchase before finalizing it butas soon as I clicked it I made the purchase.  it was advertised as $59.00, but when I got the bill it was over $70!  they chargedme for sales tax and shipping, plus the free sd card that was promised wasn't in the box.  this is my first bad experience fromamazon.  hopefully it's an exception, will not buy from this seller anymore

Reviews.Title: missing power cord
Reviews.Author: kevin wentz
Reviews.Content: The camera and case are great, Only problem was No USB patch cord was included like promised.  Unable to down load to computer with purchasing this cord.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera/offer, Outstanding customer service.-
Reviews.Author: MARIA GERMAN
Reviews.Content: I decided to buy this camera for the great's reviews and comments from other customers. I though that it was a great opportunity to get my first camera (as the offer said that you would get some items free with the purchased of some camera listed), and really it was. Finally I got the camera which meets all my expectations. But I though that memory card and the Amazon basics compact camera case will be sent with my purchase, since the offer said that those items came free with my purchase (Cannon Powershot A2500). I have a chat with a Customer representative (Manisha) and now they are going to send me the items that I did not received previously. Thanks Amazon for your understanding.  Thanks for your support.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Kathrine Little
Reviews.Content: When I ordered this camera it said that it came with the SD card and a case for $69.00 is what I paid for it  When I received it, no SD card, no case.  Now I see the price is lower but I was still charged the original price!

Reviews.Title: Just ok
Reviews.Author: Laura Risch
Reviews.Content: I was expecting the camera to be a tad bit nicer; not too impressed with it.  It will be my: "I don't care what happens to this camera!" .

Reviews.Title: Light, Compact
Reviews.Author: Lucille A. Woods
Reviews.Content: I had a Nivon and there are year to many options to figure out before a shot.Ease of use!!!

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot
Reviews.Author: Karen Agee
Reviews.Content: Not really what I expected.  Doesn't not take great pictures.  I have found that I would rather pull out my good camera for photo opportunities.  I wanted something small that I could keep in my purse for those "just in case" moments.  Not pleased at all.

Reviews.Title: Gift for my wife
Reviews.Author: Joe Jeffcoat
Reviews.Content: My wife is a teacher and needed a small camera to capture those special moments in her classroom. This camera fits in her purse and takes great pictures. She seems to be very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: So happy
Reviews.Author: Sydney Jaynes
Reviews.Content: This camera shipped in one day and got here the next LOVE this camera great pictured have been hung in my wall because of this high quality camera

Reviews.Title: Good for the price paid
Reviews.Author: Carlos R.
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to always have on hand when it is impractical to have my micro 4/3 with me. I did so after reading some very favorable reviews. The camera has plenty of settings and modes for a point and shoot and does pretty well in low light situations as long as you can hold the camera steady, but I found some images to be very soft/low contrast. I'm still trying to figure out why but this has been a let down based on the reviews.

Reviews.Title: Great value.
Reviews.Author: Carol Morris
Reviews.Content: Love this inexpensive easy to use camera. Have bought for family and would buy again for work and family and friends.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: William J. Haslem
Reviews.Content: Works perfectly,  takes excellent pictures and is easier to  use than my last digital camera. I love this little camera

Reviews.Title: A definite winner
Reviews.Author: lj
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my sister so she could share photos and movies of her grandkids with me.  I have never used the camera so I asked her how she liked it.  I am happy to report she likes it very much.  It is compact and easy to handle.  She said the pictures are of great quality.  It is also easy to get great pictures because the camera is made for people with little photography experience.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Ann Gaines
Reviews.Content: Great price for a great camera. It's easy to use.  I especially like the zoom. I bought a case and a memory card at the same time, and everything came to less than $100.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!  Perfect gift or for yourself!
Reviews.Author: William E. Boyle
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my granddaughter's 11th birthday.  She loves it!!  It's a very nice camera for not a lot of money.  She showed me photos and videos that she's taken of the dogs playing and sleeping!  Small size makes it easy to slip into a pocket--perfect for a trip to Disney World or any vacation.

Reviews.Title: One of the best deals for Thanksgiving
Reviews.Author: Jenn
Reviews.Content: One of the best deals I got for this Thanksgiving! The camera is easy to use. And I cannot trust Cannon more on its great color.

Reviews.Title: Fair overall
Reviews.Author: Hoang Nguyen
Reviews.Content: It meet me expectations overall. Good price, acceptable features and photo quality. However, it does not doing good catching the photo off moving things.

Reviews.Title: Small but has most things needed in Point & Shot camera
Reviews.Author: Jay C. Haas
Reviews.Content: Optical Stabilization was not as good as I hoped. Otherwise everything else about the camera was as advertised including size and weight.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Rosemary O.
Reviews.Content: So easy to use- great picture view. But it is listed as coming with a case- but their is no case with it!

Reviews.Title: Just What I Wanted
Reviews.Author: carol locke.
Reviews.Content: Was looking for a small camera that was not too expensive and this one fits the bill.  It's small, has a zoom lens and automatically centers the subject matter.

Reviews.Title: Love Canon products
Reviews.Author: Captain Drew "Captain-FedEx & USNR-Retired"
Reviews.Content: Love Canon products. This is my 4-5th one . .give them as gifts. . this was for my wife, to replace a 'hefty' Kodak

Reviews.Title: Small and light
Reviews.Author: gaelhelen
Reviews.Content: 16 mega pixels, small and light, takes great pictures.  It also takes videos. It takes better pictures than my IPhone. And it will be a great travel camera if I ever get to go anywhere again

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot A2500 Reviewed.
Reviews.Author: Lovenia Deconge
Reviews.Content: The camera does a good job for the price. I bought for my brother-in-law and he loves it. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Canon powershot A2500 camera performance
Reviews.Author: Terrence Bird
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the price.I like the large choice of settings, it's compact, and takes a great picture, and it's compact design is easy to carry.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: featherfarm
Reviews.Content: Clear pictures, good, deal, great instructions, easy to use, useful tips, nothing extra needed - what else could you ask for?

Reviews.Title: Great camera for a great price
Reviews.Author: Rodrigo Dominguez
Reviews.Content: I got this as a gift for my brother, the price was super cheap and its a great camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Fun Photos
Reviews.Author: Shannon Ebarb
Reviews.Content: It's fun and easy. It also takes great pictures. It is easy to use and is easy to work. It is just a fun camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera value
Reviews.Author: Lady5563
Reviews.Content: This is a good "everyday" camera.Is very easy to use and easy to charge also.keep in mind that it does not come with a memory card or the USB plug that you may want or need to get the pictures on to your computer.

Reviews.Title: Good to start with.
Reviews.Author: HARDEN
Reviews.Content: Good little camera to keep with you. Takes good shots and videos. very easy to learn and use. A good first camera.

Reviews.Title: A great digital pocket camera for the money!
Reviews.Author: JT Hokie "jthokie"
Reviews.Content: Bought this to replace my Kodak digital pocket camera that stopped working on short notice.  So far I am pleased.  Uses same SDHC card as the Kodak and all my old pictures are displayed on it as well.  Good detail. Flash/lens automation seems to work very well on close objects. Easy to focus. A very good value.

Reviews.Title: Cannon power shot
Reviews.Author: Viola P. Finney
Reviews.Content: very easy to use.  pictures clear. Grandson can use it easily.Have used it for onlythree sessions. Like the red color - easy to find.

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot
Reviews.Author: Geraldine Barrow
Reviews.Content: This is a good, light weight, and small camera.  It fits in your pocket and takes a good picture.  The zoom is sufficient.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera for the Price

I had problems with downloading the software off the website.  The pictures are very good.  I wanted to try a Canon PowerShot but didn't want to spend a lot of money just in case I didn't like the way the pictures turned out.  I will probably upgrade my Canon to a better one next year.  In the mean time, this camera was the perfect size for my purse so I could carry it with me and be able to capture shots any time I wanted to.  Good starter camera although I have several different brand camera that cost a lot more than this one so I am not a beginner.  I just didn't want to spend a lot of money on another camera and end up not liking the pictures or how it worked or how big it was and not easily carried in my purse.

Reviews.Title: Solid, but not as good (yet) as i expected
Reviews.Author: Just_Me

Maybe with time I'll learn to use it better, but compared to my older, cheaper Samsung, it 1) focuses more slowly; 2) occasionally focuses off; and 3) wont compress pictures sufficiently.  How hard would it be to have a setting to compress JPEGs down to a point-and-shoot users' size on the SD card?  Like the Samsung did?  Beware - even at half-resolution (8MP) and hgih compression files are nearly 3MB on disk.  For most use this is ridiculous; i post process them to 500k with no noticeable change in quality.Anyway,. it is a good camera; fairly easy to use. No complaint, but no love either.Just Me

Reviews.Title: Greatest Decision Yet
Reviews.Author: John

After serious thinking and seeing reviews, I decided to go with the Cannon PowerShot. I gambled with the Bad reviews, and it payed off. A great buy, and awesome camera. I have NO complaints with this camera. I figure that the bad reviews on this were either people who don't like Canon, or they received a camera that was wonky directly from the factory. No complaints with this camera. My dad loves it, it takes awesome pictures. Definitely a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot
