Reviews.Content: great little camera but frustrating that it did not come with memory card.  Had to purchase but fortunate to find camera store where I was.

Reviews.Title: What I expected, what I did not get, and why I am fustrated
Reviews.Author: Jet Metier
Reviews.Content: My Canon Powershot camera was $59. I needed a cheap camera fast and I got mine within two days. The charger plugged directly into the wall with a place for the battery to sit. So far so good. But unlike all other cameras I have bought, it did not even come with a starter memory card. When I took a picture, it told me "Cannot Record."  And there was no USB cable to connect to my computer either. That's a new one for me too.I repeat there is no memory card and no USB cord, so you can neither take a picture nor view it.But it did say in the book that there was a "*power cord,"(asterisk included) written in smaller font on the starter page under Package Contents. But there was no such thing. Then under the first step, "Charging the Battery, " it tells you to, "Plug the power cord into the charger, then plug the other end into a power outlet." I was able to charge my battery without this power cord. It was only by using a powerful light that I could see that on the back of my battery charger was the model number inscribed as CB-2LF, and I did not need this power charger. Such needless aggravation.I have a wee website in which I am Amazon affiliate and I was going to write a review. But it looks like that will have to wait until the add-ons I ordered today come in. So much for trusting Amazon to give me the full low-down. It should come with a huge caution sign for buyers, especially at this price. These things do add up. How can you make a price/feature comparison if you have to calculate so many variables? Furthermore, a camera at this price, might be  for a gift, and the gift recipient would be pretty bummed if they had to order additional items just to make the Canon Powershot A2500 work.The bigger problem will be when I get the memory card and the proper USB cord, what happens if I don't like the picture of the camera or how it functions? Will the aftermarket companies allow me to send back their products and get a refund that includes the shipping cost? It would have been so much more convenient for Canon to sell a complete package.I guess  learned my lesson. The product description on Amazon gave the features of the camera. But it did not list what came in the box. I should have read through each review and customer Q & A to glean what was still needed to make this camera fully operable.If this were a car it would be missing its steering wheel, and other car stuff, which I can't think of the analogies, because I am so frustrated.But there are three nice things I can tell you: The cherry red is easy to spot in a dark purse and it is very, very light weight. And one kind person on this site Ricky Lorda, answered my question about the USB from the ask customer section of this page, saying that it did come with a USB cord (although as I mentioned, mine did not), and that was very nice of him to give me his quick response.

Reviews.Title: Returned
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: The low light capabilities are not good at all. The shutter speed lags significantly and if I were taking pictures of my little nephews or dormmates being silly, the pictures would all come out blurry. The turn-on time was slower than expected. Half a second makes a big difference in my opinion. The camera took too long to focus and often times did not focus on the proper subject. I did only take shots in my dorm room, but the lights were on. Maybe if I took pictures in the daytime outdoors, the quality of the pictures would have been better.The color is a very nice red and it was very light and small, but it felt so cheap because of the plastic shell. I returned it and bought the Canon Elph 330, which I like a heck of a lot better.Would not recommend or buy again.

Reviews.Title: No memory card, no cord, no instruction
Reviews.Author: Backyard Bob "books1357"
Reviews.Content: No memory card, no cord to connect to the computer, no instructions. It's not the same cord that fits my older cannon. It is the same cord that my Sony recorder uses; so that is not a major problem for me.Like other reviewers, I checked the free memory card button but got no card. $13 stolen from me. Either Amazon or Cannon is a common thief. I blame Amazon; it's their website.There is a 12" x 16" sheet enclosed that has some instructions, but it's more cowardly lawyer lingo than instructions. These instructions are not portable. The sheet gives the URL on the internet to get real instructions.The camera looks great and feels nice. The display shows it zooming to 20X, but at 1X things look too small. I think is about 20X = 3X of the naked eye (which is big).

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Edward P. Staley
Reviews.Content: BOUGHT FOR A FRIEND, NO MEMORY CARD, AND CABLE TO DOWNLOAD PICTURTES, NOR DISK WITH THE MANUAL ON IT..  THEY SHOULD HAVE BEEN INCLUDED.

Reviews.Title: Didn't meet total expectations
Reviews.Author: Carl LeJeune
Reviews.Content: Camera didn't come with the basic wire that connects it to a computer or a memory card.  I needed the camera immediately but had to round around town to find these items to make it work.  The camera does work well.

Reviews.Title: Malfunctioning after less than 6 months of use
Reviews.Author: Jenny
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera at Target in August, 2013 and was only able to use it for less than 6-months before it malfunctioned.The camera will turn on (or sometimes it won't) and then after a moment, the screen fills with pink/green horizontal lines and is completely frozen until I remove the battery and try again.Completely useless camera.My first and last Canon.I could not be more dissatisfied.Wish there was a 0 star rating.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: lenin
Reviews.Content: all ok

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Juanita Harbeson
Reviews.Content: worked fantastic. Clear pictures. Zoomed well. Took pictures well even from a distance. Excellent color emphasis. Would definitely recommend to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Marcel
Reviews.Author: Marcel Cozma
Reviews.Content: I use today this camera and I'am very disspointed . This Camera  is Not 16 MP, make pictures  like  5$ chineze toy camera.

Reviews.Title: It Works
Reviews.Author: Steven Saneski
Reviews.Content: I lost my old similar camera, so thought this would be a good replacement. Does not include download cable like the old camera did. Does not have any software like the old camera did, and will not work with the old software. It should charge from USB in my opinion, but it does not, so you need to use the included charger and bring an AC adapter when overseas.

Reviews.Title: Need more information on usage of different features.
Reviews.Author: betty
Reviews.Content: I chose my rating because of a lack of information on how to do different features the camera offers.  Takes nice pictures. Just need more user friendly help.

Reviews.Title: God Camera at a low price
Reviews.Author: James H.
Reviews.Content: A great camera for the price. Came before the promised date in secure packaging.  Fine print has Chinese Writing on box makes me think it was primarily meant for the Chinese market. My current camera is built by  Fujifilm and is also made in China but the box has fine print in Japanese Writing. Interesting.

Reviews.Title: It works perfect. I love it. Thanks Again
Reviews.Author: Ray Aber
Reviews.Content: Because it is exactly like the one that was stolen from me by a witch named "Verto". While I was on the dance floor. She took it off the bar where I was setting. Hey! What comes around goes around!!!

Reviews.Title: Bad ass Powershot
Reviews.Author: Eric V. Traut
Reviews.Content: They don't charge enough for this little electronics gem.  I'd pay $1000 or more based upon the clarity of the shots I get with it.

Reviews.Title: Meh
Reviews.Author: Capnjack "Capnjack"
Reviews.Content: I wanted to love this camera, as I needed a point and shoot for a trip that would give my iPhone a break. However, the write time to a Class 10 SD card was simply too slow for me. I'm probably spoiled by using my cell phone camera.

Reviews.Title: I like it.
Reviews.Author: Nicole Pistory
Reviews.Content: I like this camera. For the price it's a steal. It takes great pictures, and video so I have no complaints in that department. The only thing I don't like is when you click the flash to take a picture it takes a sec or so to actually take it. So you can't really catch something unexpected, unless it's gonna to sit there and not move.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Richard Cranium
Reviews.Content: This camera takes good pictures for the price.  Its a small cheap camera but does the job.  Its really good for someone who wants to point and shot, especially if your not familiar with all the functions of a more advanced camera.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A2500
Reviews.Author: Gary Wing
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera and easy to put in your pocket and carry with. Bought as a present and bought one for myself.

Reviews.Title: good camera.
Reviews.Author: kezira
Reviews.Content: Good camera for the price. I gave it 4 star because it doesn't have a spring on the battery door.

Reviews.Title: Terrible pictures!
Reviews.Author: Judi A. Toohey
Reviews.Content: Pictures are blurry and unfocused when the zoom is used. If you use the flash there are big blotches in your picture. I'm really sorry I bought this camera.

Reviews.Title: Customer satisfaction
Reviews.Author: Edward Senner
Reviews.Content: I thought the operation instructions could have been more inclusive.  Also no protective case for it was received.  I haven't used the camera yet very much.  I hope to be better acquainted with it in the future.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: joy
Reviews.Content: I am happy with the camera but with out a SD card, I can't take pictures. For the price, one would think the camera would come with one.

Reviews.Title: It's okay
Reviews.Author: Theodore J. Jackson Sr.
Reviews.Content: My previous camera was knocked out of my hands and broken within day's of my purchase. Was no longer available so I bought this Powershot. I mainly chose this camera for the price and the rechargeable battery. It has functioned fine but not quite as nice as my previous IMO. Nevertheless, it gets the job done. Have not really used it enough to know that much about it. Maybe I will come to love it but for what I've seen thus far it is just OKAY.

Reviews.Title: Pleased.
Reviews.Author: edwin p. parson
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the camera. The camera is very easy to operate that's to instruction booklet. Only problem was the small size.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Gilbert Paganini
Reviews.Content: I brought two of these for my grandchildren ages 6 and 8.  They had them figured out and were making video the same day they received them.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: SueB
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a Christmas present for my husband - now wish I had one for myself.  Small camera with big picture ability.

Reviews.Title: Eh...ok
Reviews.Author: Clayton Mann
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is crappy. The range is terrible. I guess it's ok for the price but I should have spent more for a better camera. Beginners only.

Reviews.Title: So far, I am enjoying it.
Reviews.Author: Patricia A. Short
Reviews.Content: I haven't really used it all that much as yet.  I don't have much down here in Alabama to take pictures of, as my family is in Indiana and Michigan.  I will get a lot of usage when they come to visit or I go up there.  It is fun to use - I have taken some pictures of my friends and my two little dachshunds, and so far have been happy with them.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: Barbara Miller
Reviews.Content: Very compact and simple to operate,  The pictures are very clear.  I would have liked a more detailed instruction booklet.

Reviews.Title: No picture
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: The lens of my camera doesn't work.The display stays black and the pictures also.Everything else works, the zoom, the flash, but the most important thing, making pictures, doesn'tThe display works because I can go through the menu.

Reviews.Title: why I deleted
Reviews.Author: Matthew Steele Dow
Reviews.Content: I already have a nice vivator camera. I don't need another. I need the book for dummies to use these new cameras. Thanks:-)

Reviews.Title: for my daughter
Reviews.Author: Jon Moon
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter. She had had a cannon powershot before and had very good service. She lost the first one so we bought another. Hopefully we will get as good as service on this one.

Reviews.Title: Pretty nice for what i paid for it.  it was cheap
Reviews.Author: rebecca caffee
Reviews.Content: I wish it had a view finder. I had to use it with my expensive Canon camera cause the large window for viewing pics got messed up somehow.  I ride horses and the camera has to be in a horn bag a lot so has to be tough.

Reviews.Title: The perfect size camera
Reviews.Author: Gary C. Brock
Reviews.Content: I've been wanting a camera for a long time and when I seen this one, I knew it was, what I was looking for. This camera is perfect for me small and convenient.

Reviews.Title: Neat Replacement for my Dearly Departed Kodak
Reviews.Author: gopherprairieexile
Reviews.Content: I love that I have a camera again; this is more sophisticated than my previous camera, better focus, more user friendly, lighter and I love having a battery to recharge instead of having to buy double A batteries. What really chafes me, though, is that I had to pay $16 for a cable to upload photos to my computer -- Kodak gave you one with the camera purchase, and I think it's kind of cheesy for Canon not to supply one. BTW, the one I got was at Staples, someone said it had to be one made by Canon, not true, this works perfectly. I was lucky to find this when Amazon was running a deal where you got the memory card for free, I expect to have to pay for the memory card, but not the cable.

Reviews.Title: Descent enough... but
Reviews.Author: Howard
Reviews.Content: Descent enough camera, but i didn't get the carrying case i was suppose to get and it has NO cord to connect to anything that will enable you to upload the pictures or put them on your lap top.

Reviews.Title: Expectations - basic
Reviews.Author: Patricia Clark
Reviews.Content: I expected to have a basic memory chip included with the camera.The features are good for capturing moments with the grandkids...

Reviews.Title: Special when I ordered said a case & memory card came with  but NOT THERE
Reviews.Author: Andrea F. Davenport "Cat Lover"
Reviews.Content: I gave this as a gift to my Mom.  I just found out from her that the case and memory card, that the site said were a special to be included in the purchase, were NOT IN THE BOX.  Thus the 3 stars.  Recipient likes the camera .... she needed an easy use camera.  But she said the packaging even stated there was a case and memory card and she looked in the box and went through the packing and the memory card and case were not there.  I was NOT  happy to hear this.  So she received a camera she couldn't take pictures with.  If I knew this, I would've purchased a memory card for her because she does not know about these things.  And I sent her this so she could take pictures of her grandkids at Christmas.  Luckily a friend helped  her with a memory card.

Reviews.Title: My new Canon Power Shot camera.
Reviews.Author: Martha Cronin
Reviews.Content: I haven't used this camera much yet but do like it so far. I was  to get a camera case with it and have not received one yet.

Reviews.Title: Canon powershot A2500
Reviews.Author: Georgia M. Fields "G Fields"
Reviews.Content: Chose this camera from having a powershot  previously.  Takes great pictures, has a nifty way to charge the battery other than replace the recharagables.  Very happy.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for!
Reviews.Author: JwG
Reviews.Content: I rarely write reviews but felt compelled. This is a very cheap feeling camera, I have owned many previous versions, the battery wouldn't seat after the second time inserting it.  I had to return it.  Stay away.

Reviews.Title: Canon Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Alene Hubbard
Reviews.Content: The canon Power Shot A2500 digital camera is small and light in weight.  It is easy to operate. It came in different colors.  This product works great.

Reviews.Title: Fun and Easy
Reviews.Author: aaron
Reviews.Content: my first point and shoot. it works great.  i'm having fun taking pictures of whatever. will be on vacation soon and this camera should come in handy.  auto mode is easy: point and shoot.  i'm learning and I like black and white mode.  I don't have anything to compare this camera to, but I think its been worth the price.

Reviews.Title: It can be good, I do not know yet....
Reviews.Author: laia
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love Amazon, I buy everything from this site, but with this purchase I had so many issues!I am not sure how good the camera will be in the future! Came without the manual (ordered from Cannon, waiting for it), no USB cable (ordered the recommended one, just came in and is not working), no memory card (ordered, is working), order the little black case, never got it (USPS completely un-reliable).I tried to keep the flash off and take few pictures in a raw, did not work (I guess I really need the manual).I do not like to send back things so I will try to "learn" how to deal with it!I think it will be so much better if the camera comes with everything that is necessary in one offer for few more dollars

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot A2500
Reviews.Author: basscaster
Reviews.Content: Wish you could adjust the pixels.  Don't always need such high resolution photos.  A little small for my hands, but I am getting used to the size.  Wish they would send a manuel with it instead of needing to go online.  Sometimes it is nice to refer to the manuel while you are "out and about". Shoots great photos.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot digital camera is the best.
Reviews.Author: Karin Roane
Reviews.Content: I love my camera.  It will take a little while to learn that as well but it is worth it.

Reviews.Title: No instructions Cheap Quality
Reviews.Author: ronkul
Reviews.Content: Very sorry job of supplying operating instructions, , .no software and you had to buy the USB cable .Battery charging is a piece of work .designers must have been or from third world country . Have been using cannon but seems that their products are slowly going downhill.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I like this one, but the learning curve is much steeper.  Also it didn't come with a 3 gb flash drive.

Reviews.Title: Good price
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Han Tuan
Reviews.Content: Good camera, price is good and easy to use. If you want a simple point and shoot camera, this is it.

Reviews.Title: Good point and shoot
Reviews.Author: T Watkins
Reviews.Content: This is a good pocket point and shoot digital camera and it's so easy even I can take great pictures. You can take stills and the video is surprisingly high quality. I can highly recommend this camera. I also found a good book on how to use your digital camera better Digital Photography (Computer Training)

Reviews.Title: I love it!!
Reviews.Author: TRISH
Reviews.Content: I boughht it because I am taking my daughter to disneyland in a few weeks and want to take pictures. But since I got it I have been taking pictures and video like a mad women and I love it!! This is my first camera and it was very easy to learn. Great for a starter camera.

Reviews.Title: Average camera
Reviews.Author: Nhan
Reviews.Content: This is a good camera for a quick gift. The camera does its job and snaps pretty good photos. The delay in the snap shot could have been shorter, and thats the only reason for the three stars. Also, this camera is refurbished and did not come with any cords to connect and upload to the computer.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot
Reviews.Author: Donna Matthias
Reviews.Content: I love my new camera.  I wanted a little point and shoot for vacation and to use when I visit my grandson.  It fits in my pocket, easy to use.  And, in my opinion the pictures are great for a point & shoot.

Reviews.Title: PowerShot A2500 16.0 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Sharon E. Lesser
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera because it is the camera that my daughter has.  It gives ME an opportunity to take photos of my very first grandchild.  The camera is easy to use and I can instantly see the picture after taking it.  It is AWESOME!

Reviews.Title: Lightweight
Reviews.Author: Rhonda Smith
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter's birthday.  She tells me that it takes great pictures and is easy to carry with her!

Reviews.Title: Compact and great
Reviews.Author: Shanah84
Reviews.Content: Trying to get use to using a smaller camera. Compact and ready to go anytime. Thank goodness for the help button.

Reviews.Title: didnt last
Reviews.Author: Joseph T. Ford
Reviews.Content: Purchased in late Sep 2013, on a trip in Jan, the lens motor jammed.  Now it doesnt focus. You can hear a  motor inside constantly trying to do something. OUt of focus now. Zooms in and out, but wont focus.Second cannon product that has broken on me. Will be my last. Amazon return said my window has closed. So guess I'm out of luck.

Reviews.Title: You're Going Cheap
Reviews.Author: Love 2 Cook "recipe chick"
Reviews.Content: I am very disappointed with the Canon company. We purchased this very same camera over a year ago, but we lost it in Italy. This version does not come with a memory card or the cable needed to download images.So cheap of Canon!!! The camera does a great job of taking pictures. But that's all you get from this version.Our original purchase had lots of bells and whistles on the camera and all the required accessories. This version only let's you have normal or low format pictures. We did not purchase this from Amazon, but I do not expect that you would get the needed accessories where ever you decide to purchase this product.

Reviews.Title: A Great Price --- BUT
Reviews.Author: TimelessStyle
Reviews.Content: Where is the cable to transfer photos and a basic memory card????? The camera is very light weight so be careful and I assume it's that way for ease to carry.If the memory card and cable had been included(like with most cameras) --this would have been a 5 star rating.

Reviews.Title: Horrible Promotion
Reviews.Author: David M. Loucks
Reviews.Content: NOTE: This review/low rating is ONLY regarding the current promotion which lists this camera as including a FREE CASE and MEMORY CARD.The listing makes it appear that a case and memory card will be included when ordering from Amazon LLC... however, be warned, those items WILL NOT be included automatically.  You must add them to your order with the camera.  Furthermore, your cart will show them as priced separately and the promotional discount will not appear until you click the "estimate shipping and tax" tab... which makes no sense... but that's the convoluted way amazon has set this up.Suggestion to Amazon: If there is to be a promotional item(s) applied to a purchase, why not add them to the order AUTOMATICALLY and allow the buyer the option to REMOVE them if desired... rather than requiring the buyer to add those items manually while making it appear as though those items will NOT be free until the moment the order is placed?  Let's be honest... who's going to turn down free stuff?

Reviews.Title: Half a camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Great price, no memory card or USB computer cord. What good is the price if essential items are not included?Update-I take back the comment of great price. It's gone from $59 tp $90. Not worth the price due to missing components.

Reviews.Title: Returned it for Refund
Reviews.Author: Beth Wilson
Reviews.Content: This camera is not user friendly. I had to keep resetting the date, the flash never stayed on which is a pain in the ass and it took 5+ seconds for the shot to be taken. Too bad Kodak went of biz. I still prefer their easyshare camera.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed
Reviews.Author: Dolores  Rogers
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed with this purchase. I formerly had the A3300 which was definitely much better then the A2500. It shuts off if you don't take a picture right away, the image stabilization (which is one of the reasons I purchased this camera) is horrible the picture is always blurry or out of focus and the Auto feature is slow to pick up anything or won't change to the correct feature.I would not recommend this camera to anyone and wish that I had gotten a different camera.

Reviews.Title: Canon offers the worst customer service
Reviews.Author: Ross Danitz
Reviews.Content: I bough the PowerShot A2500 for my wife for Christmas and within 1 1/2 months the LCD screen got all distorted.When I sent it in to Canon they tried to say that the camera was dropped. The camera was never mistreated and Canon refuses to honor the warranty.Don't ever buy a Canon product as their customer service is HORRIBLE.

Reviews.Title: light and easy
Reviews.Author: Haeni A. Young
Reviews.Content: The three item package proved to be useful.  I am not able to check on photos I have taken only when I have attached it to my computer then I can see the photos.  I am working on that.  Nice and easy to handle.

Reviews.Title: Good price, not so good camera
Reviews.Author: H. MEI "Seven"
Reviews.Content: The price with the description of this camera makes it pretty attractive, but once you get it you will find the picture quality, as least in my opinion, is far worse than expectation. I use Galaxy S3, the average size of 16MP photo of this camera is even much smaller than my cell phone's 8MP picture, and certainly, less sharper picture.I cannot say I hate this camera cuz it is so cheap, but I am very disappointed with its quality.

Reviews.Title: camera quality
Reviews.Author: Ricky Lorda
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is not as I expected would apreciate a better quality camera.want to upgrade.to a more active camera for movement piks an lighting exposure

Reviews.Title: Camera will not turn on.
Reviews.Author: Gloria
Reviews.Content: Despite charging the battery until it stated that it was fully charged (Green Light) and inserting the battery properly the camera will not turn on after pressing the on-off button.The camera that was shipped (that was also shipped late despite having Amazon Prime) is defective.

Reviews.Title: WHAT?
Reviews.Author: Holly Beard
Reviews.Content: This product claimed to come with a case, a memory card and a USB cable - none of the above.  I had to purchase these items to go with the gift.  Nice camera - just incomplete.

Reviews.Title: camera did not come with the cord to connect to a computer
Reviews.Author: Pam Hackbarth
Reviews.Content: I was in total disbelief that this camera did not come with the cord to connect to a computer.  I love the camera.  I would order the camera again.  But come on.  The cord was $1.99 plus shipping (since it was from a different business).  That should have, and could have, been included with the camera.

Reviews.Title: not so easy
Reviews.Author: Teri
Reviews.Content: I wish they would suggest what accessory you need to transfer pictures and videos to the pc  I have a toshiba satellite L775

Reviews.Title: Good, but not excellent
Reviews.Author: Ashik M. Shafi
Reviews.Content: It is a good camera in most measurements. However, it cannot beat cloudy sky and shadowy lighting. If you can, better buy a pricier one with $300. But if you want to stick with this price, this is a good deal

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Someone54
Reviews.Content: Great camera from Canon. I'm almost surprised at how well the pictures turned out. I recommend using New 32gb Micro Sd Card Sdhc Tf Flash Memory Card 32gb Class 10, New! Usa! for the best space. Aside from that, highly recommended if you are looking for a great camera.

Reviews.Title: I love Canon, but the quality of this one is not up to standards
Reviews.Author: Mike Reingold "Zombie Prepper"
Reviews.Content: I am not sure why people are not finding this review helpful. If you want to buy it and find out it is cheap quality, that is up to you !!! I am trying to save you the aggravation.I purchased a Canon PowerShot ELPH 110 HS for $200 which has been flawless.  and I bought this for my Mom, who wanted a simple camera. As soon as we went to install the battery, we realized that the battery cover is not a proper fit, the quality is consistant with a cheaper camera, After two charges of the battery, which involves opening the plastic door, it started to break.  I sent it back.

Reviews.Title: it looked more impressive on line
Reviews.Author: V. White
Reviews.Content: I chaulk this one up to my not doing enough research and buying too quickly.  I really am nothappy with the features on the camera.  I thought it was a good price when I initially saw it onAmazon but have seeing it was camera only I have since seen the camera, case, memory card andattachments for less than I paid for camera only.  But once again it was only that I purchased it tooquickly without proper research.

Reviews.Title: No user manual included...
Reviews.Author: Janice R. Watkins "gg"
Reviews.Content: I luv the camera. I am sure if a user manual had been included I would luv it even more when I understand how it works. AMAZON help.  Please don't make me sorry for my purchase.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Sakurannawang
Reviews.Content: the camera i good for pic but your voice sound weird in the videos  it have a higer pich when u talk but it pick up sounds even little sounds

Reviews.Title: DOA, no user's manual and no power cable.
Reviews.Author: Jonq-ying Lee "yogi"
Reviews.Content: The first one I got was a DOA, there is no user's manual and no power cable -- instruction book says the power cable is included..

Reviews.Title: bad news order
Reviews.Author: Elycia I.
Reviews.Content: Because the power cord wasn't included in the box. After charging, the camera, it didn't work. Returned for a full refund.

Reviews.Title: Save your MONEY! Don't buy!
Reviews.Author: Linda L. Snider
Reviews.Content: Took less than 10 pictures then had lens disk error. Can turn the camera on, but the camera just shuts itself down again. The camera was bought as a present. A piece of junk. Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Cannon camera
Reviews.Author: Kathy Stellberg
Reviews.Content: It was cheap and not at all like my previous camera.  I returned it and will be ordering a different model  Customer service was great however.

Reviews.Title: Lines in pictures very disappointed!
Reviews.Author: Reva Burke
Reviews.Content: Can't believe I bought this brand-new! Every picture I take comes out with tons of lines through it! Very disappointed...

Reviews.Title: good camera but not best price
Reviews.Author: Hunter
Reviews.Content: I used this camera before take a Canon PowerShot ELPH 320 HS. If this is the first camera for you, you will think this is the best. Yes, the quality of the images is good. But if you know more about other products of Canon, you can see many change. I found much convenience in Canon PowerShot ELPH 320 HS. You can refer following linkhttp://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0075SUJQK/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&camp;=1789&creative;=390957&creativeASIN;=B0075SUJQK&linkCode;=as2&tag;=best-refer-20you have to pay more 30$ and worth much more convenience with- DIGIC 5 Image Processor ~~~ Compared with DIGIC 4 Image Processor- Built-in Wi-Fi allows wireless sharing of images and video  ~~ this is the most interested feature. You can share your image immediately- Built-in Wi-Fi for wireless file sharing through Canon iMAGE GATEWAY on Facebook, Twitter, YouTube or other devices- 3.2-inch wide touch panel Pure Color System LCD with Touch Shutter for interactive shooting ~ Great experience with touch screenHope you choose a right camerahttp://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0075SUJQK/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&camp;=1789&creative;=390957&creativeASIN;=B0075SUJQK&linkCode;=as2&tag;=best-refer-20

Reviews.Title: My very thoughtfull comments
Reviews.Author: Bill Hahcem
Reviews.Content: just like it. Your insistence on more words and extra  comments is annoying. I am sorry but I just have no more words to oofer you.

Reviews.Title: NO CABLE FOR USB HOOK UP
Reviews.Author: Wayne Tyler "DOC"
Reviews.Content: Why is there no cable to down load photos to my computer? It should come with the camera. Thank you

Reviews.Title: Too small.
Reviews.Author: MARILYNCASTILLE cookies
Reviews.Content: Not what i expected too small and need to do more shopping for what i am looking for.cannon is a good product.

Reviews.Title: Just alittle disapointed.
Reviews.Author: GARY MAURER
Reviews.Content: I had ordered everything to make a nice gift. The only thing that came was the camera. It was to be gift wrapped as is all the rest of my order. The camera was shrink wrapped to a piece of cardboard and my note was glued to the outside of the shipping box. I went out and bought a Scan Disc memory card and had a charged battery to fit. My wife was trying to learn how to use her new camera tonight. She asked about the caring case and extra memory card and battery and charger and I told her they had not arrived. I have been in contact wit 2 reps. of Amazon . com and they assured me that I would have the rest of my order the 23 and 24th. I would only hope that they are wrapped like a gift and my card put inside the box. Please make this a good gift as she will be going on a family trip right after Christmas day.  Thanks for the help Romone, I known you are doing your best to please this old man. Merry Christmas.  Gary Maurer

Reviews.Title: Love Canon, okay camera
Reviews.Author: sarah
Reviews.Content: Canon is a great great brand, but this camera is a cheaper version of their brand. its all plastic which I'm not a fan of. I expected it to be a bit more sleek. other than that great price for 16MP. Just a bit scared of how long the device will last, being that its plastic...

Reviews.Title: Tiny Camera
Reviews.Author: DonnaMartinsen
Reviews.Content: I just wanted a tiny camera for a trip I made. Perhaps you get what you pay for. Very handy size but the pictures are not sharp as I would like. Will probably give it to one of my grandchildren.

Reviews.Title: Returned camera.
Reviews.Author: Joanne Broadhurst
Reviews.Content: Returned the camera as I found it was not any different than the camera I have except a different color and newer.  I am sure there was nothing wrong with it but decided I wanted one with more features.  Good basic camera.

Reviews.Title: Powershot
Reviews.Author: l. m. buchta
Reviews.Content: Makes too much noise when taking a pic.Cannot figure out all the buttons-not much instruction.Says 'LIVE" across the view finder-cannot get rid of it.

Reviews.Title: Only problelm
Reviews.Author: Marianne Helmle
Reviews.Content: The problem was not enough info to know how to operate the camera totally.  I called Canon a few days after I received the camera with some questions and the man said he would send me an instruction manuel and I would receive it before I left for my trip, but I have not received it as yet and I am home from my trip.

Reviews.Title: Bad Choice
Reviews.Author: Yolanda Westen
Reviews.Content: I bought this because I had a PowerShot and lost it.  No instruction booklet, just a piece of paper that unfolded.  The cord to attach to pc was not in the box so I used my old one.  Could not download pictures.  Camera kept shutting off.  This updated version is awful.

Reviews.Title: Does not work
Reviews.Author: Christian Claudio Kendji Strohm "Christian S."
Reviews.Content: The camera that I received does not work. The image is totally blurred on the screen, probably a CCD issue. It is useless.

Reviews.Title: NOT THE RIGHT CAMERA FOR ME
Reviews.Author: Lori
Reviews.Content: I returned the camera. I really didn't get to use it. It probably is a nice camera. Because I didn't use the camera I only gave it 3 starsI wanted a camera that could use regular batteries and this one didn't

Reviews.Title: Check it before you gift it
Reviews.Author: Jellyroll
Reviews.Content: Wanted to have it ready for my wife Christmas morning.  Out of the box the viewed image (not the menu screens) was blurred, cleaned the lens etc no help.  Pictures taken came out with incorrect colors and blurred.  Hoping this was a bad one, but with 2 days until Christmas had to go out and buy local.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Leela Chickoorie
Reviews.Content: Ordered this camera thinking I was getting the memory card and case free however when I received my package it only had the camera. No data cable to download pics.nice camera though"........

Reviews.Title: Canon is CHEAP and not in a GOOD WAY!!!
Reviews.Author: mitch
Reviews.Content: I would have given it NO STARS but its a decent enough camera.  What pisses me off is that it does not come with its own interface cable and that is TOTAL "BS"!!!  If Canon is so hard up for money stop making so many commercials.Just bought a Samsung and it came with interface face which also doubles as charging cable when connected to plug.  Just like Apple. :)

Reviews.Title: Cheap Canon Camera,
Reviews.Author: Gilbert Swe
Reviews.Content: Very poorly made... I've had several Canon point-and-shoot cameras, this is the most poorly made product I've ever come across. Amazon should discontinue carrying this....

Reviews.Title: Awful, arrogant Canon tech support...
Reviews.Author: Bear
Reviews.Content: I researched this camera very carefully before ordering.Canon stated that it was compatible with Windows Vista.Well, it wasn't.Canon blamed it on MS Silverlight.I have never dealt with such a hostile, arrogant tech support.I thought that this would be plug and play like every other digital cameras I have purchased.One completely frustrating, waste of time experience.Grateful that Amazon made the return an easy experience.Even the Canon feedback e-mail was awful and consistent with this poor experience.It got to 99% and it wouldn't complete loading.My 1st and last Canon product!

Reviews.Title: BAD PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: CRAP.  DEFECTIVE.  MISSING PARTS.  NOT GOOD AT ALL.  ALWAYS HAD CANON.  WILL RETHINK MY DECISION.  IN PROCESS OF SENDING IT BACK FOR MY RFUND.

Reviews.Title: Disappointment
Reviews.Author: Lychee120
Reviews.Content: Bit very high quality and the shipment included lots of "stuff" that was of very poor quality.  Could have left it back in the store/warehouse.

Reviews.Title: Switch from Sony to Canon
Reviews.Author: E. Borges "evb"
Reviews.Content: This camera was cheaper than the sony powershot i had.  Got a new one because it fell in the water, and I'm happy I got this one. The battery charges quickly...at least for now...and the camera itself is lightweight.

Reviews.Title: I never got it to work
Reviews.Author: E. Freeman
Reviews.Content: This unit has never operated correctly.  after installing new batteries and different memory cards, it always came up with an error of no memory or memory full when these cards were brand new and never used.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected and not too happy
Reviews.Author: Susan Doyle
Reviews.Content: I needed a replacement camera right away because someone stole my camera out of my car, I use it daily for animal rescue and as a real estate professional. So, Amazon was great in getting my new purchase to me right away - HOWEVER - they didn't let me know that it would not be ready to use when i received it, and I needed it right now!It didn't have a memory card and it didn't have a cable to transfer photos from the camera to my computer. I had to go back and order all the things that make a camera work which took more time, so needless to say, I wasn't happy. Now that I have everything that allows me to take photos, the camera itself is just fine.  It's OK.

Reviews.Title: No power cord - 2nd time around
Reviews.Author: SeattleShopper
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera which arrived without the power cord.  Amazon replaced it within a few days.  The second camera also didn't have a power cord.  I am sending them both back and buying something at a brick and mortar store where I can check the box before I leave the premises.

Reviews.Title: I would like to know?
Reviews.Author: Gordon Shults
Reviews.Content: The camera was very good. But when I bought the camera and the rest of the stuff. You told me it would cost me $118.63? When I payed my bill. After words there was another $10.63 added on? What was that for? With all or the scams like with Target and all I would like to know what it was for?  Thank You.

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This camera lacks a lot of features.  The package did not even include a USB connector to the camera.  Not worth the money.

Reviews.Title: A little misleading
Reviews.Author: Marc Wagmeister
Reviews.Content: Very disappointed , as I gave this as a gift and my daughter couldn't save any pictures or download to her computer .... I wish they would have made clear that no memory card or USB cable was included. I would have bought one that included these things... After we bought a memory card she does love the camera..

Reviews.Title: CHECK WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Reviews.Author: Not So Grumpy
Reviews.Content: It appears to be a nice little camera. BUT, it comes with no USB cord, no memory card, AND NO MANUAL. You can download a 119 page manual from the Canon Web site. Kinda tough to carry with ya until you learn how to use the thing. If your tech challenged forget it. I bought this camera for my wife, but it's NOT a just point and click camera. More aggravation than I wanted for her to deal with....

Reviews.Title: WORST product I have bought ever
Reviews.Author: Jessie
Reviews.Content: Got no memory card, no USB for the camera. Basically you would buy a "camera" that you can't even use to take pictures. How can Amazon sell such a thing? RIDICULOUS.

Reviews.Title: After being delivered and replaced, still missing a power Cord
Reviews.Author: Connie
Reviews.Content: I received my order on 3/13/14, opened the box and found there was NO power cord. Called amazon and they replaced it over night which I was most happy with, BUT still no power cord, the delivery man watched and inspected the box with me. He also read the paper work (what's included and in the package).  Very annoying since I spent the day waiting for delivery only to find the same part was missing. Remember it reads that the power cord is INCLUDED and shows a picture of it in the paperwork.NOT HAPPY VERY DISAPPOINTED TO SAY THE LEAST.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT ALIKE THIS CAMERA
Reviews.Author: CROOK
Reviews.Content: JSUT DOES'NT SERVE MY PURPOSE.  I HAVE HAD CANNON CAMERA'S BEFORE, AND THEY ARE A LOT EASIER TO OPERATE THAN THIS CAMERA.

Reviews.Title: Worthless crap Battery only holds charge for a couple of days. If that. It does not charge by USB. you must remove and plug in.
Reviews.Author: Leonard Cowan
Reviews.Content: Worthless. Am sending it back. You have to charge the battery every time. I charged this Camera on Sunday. Took 3 pictures and the battery is dead. On Christmas Day. I would give this camera a Big Fat Zero!

Reviews.Title: Camera comes with out a memory card
Reviews.Author: Littlethorn
Reviews.Content: I received my camera today and wanted to test it but the camera comes with no memory card. I called Amazon and they said a card is not listed on the specs. I guess that's partially why the price is low. Hey maybe Canon can lower the price point more by selling the battery separately! Maybe I shouldn't post that. Some Canon exec might read this.

Reviews.Title: not bad
Reviews.Author: JoAnn Parish
Reviews.Content: It takes nice pictures but I'm a little disappointed that it doesn't have a timer for group photos. Good size. Needed to purchase memory card separate.

Reviews.Title: I bought it month ago, and it's already not working
Reviews.Author: Chris Yun
Reviews.Content: It was working fine at the beginning, but it's zoom lens pulled out and can't turn on the camera after that.I don't think I cannot fix it, and I did not buy the guarantee so I don't think I could get reimburse.

Reviews.Title: Did not meet my expectations
Reviews.Author: Sylvia K.L. Zecha
Reviews.Content: I thought this camera would be a step above the Canon SD1400 but I was disappointed.  I haven't tried using it outdoors yet but the indoor shots are poor quality.  The pics are not crisp on the LCD nor after I downloaded the pic to my desktop.  I wish the self-timer feature had it's own button instead of making it a two step process to set it up.  Video quality is ok.

Reviews.Title: Cannon Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera and it eats batteries like crazy.  I might be able to take 5 pictures and then it needs new batteries.  It should be rechargeable.

Reviews.Title: I've owned a little over month and it no longer works!!!
Reviews.Author: Lauri Ojanpera "Innovated Jeweler"
Reviews.Content: When I first received it and used it, it worked great.  I put it away for awhile and noticed it needed to be charged.  I will not charge.  Tried everything.  I purchased May 2013, went to use again in July 2013, and that's when I noticed it doesn't charge.  Maybe I received a lemon but it's too bad because the pictures turned out beautiful.  What a waste of good money!

Reviews.Title: Yeah camera!
Reviews.Author: Stabby Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: I needed to get my mom a camera bc I live in the city and she lives on an Indian Reservation and I wanted pics of the family-gatherings out in the middle-of-no-where-gorgeous-indian-locations!!!!!!!!!I've missed too many gatherings not-seeing my nieces and nephews going insane over Turtles who are Ninjas, Pirates in the Carribean, Justin Bieber's Horrible Exstence, etc...

Reviews.Title: Arrived without a Power Cord
Reviews.Author: LuvsZappaFan
Reviews.Content: I did not realize this camera did not have a memory card.  You must purchase separately.  In addition, mine arrived without the power cord.

Reviews.Title: Not for me...
Reviews.Author: V. Voltaire
Reviews.Content: This camera is not user friendly and it does not take good pictures. An average phone takes better picture than this camera. I wonder why so many people rated it so high.

Reviews.Title: Disaster!!!!
Reviews.Author: C. McLaughlin
Reviews.Content: One review remarked that the cord for uploading onto a computer was missing - figured that was probably a fluke...however...nocord! No memory card! A miniscule user manual. We had to download a user manual - 109 pages on our printer! We had to goout and buy the transfer cord. And, we have yet to be able to get an old memory card transferred! This is shoddy stuff and I wassure it had "Made in China" somewhere on the packaging...however it says "Canada" - maybe we'd've been better off had it beenMade in China!?! If it weren't such a pain, I would return this in a minute! This is not worthy of Amazon's quality and is the firsttime I have been disappointed by anything I've ever ordered. I just hope the printer we recently ordered is of higher quality andnot so confusing - and comes with instructions!

Reviews.Title: Yes and no on  ease of use
Reviews.Author: Hey Mumser
Reviews.Content: I can see where  this model is worth  5 stars, to me... but it was a gift for my wife of 32 years and she was so well adapted to the Kodak model  she had  used so well for several years, I did return this model for credit and bought her, from Amazon, a duplicate of the Kodak she had been using. She felt  there were too many " buttons" to push on the canon camera.

Reviews.Title: very flimsy camera!!!
Reviews.Author: sona
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera during Thanksgiving. the product was shipped later than the agreed date ..the deal came with the case and 16gb card. I did not receive the card and case I was promised..I ordered this camera for the sd card offered for the low price....I could have purchased sony wx710 instead for the same price. very flimsy tooo...planning to return

Reviews.Title: Don't use if you are going to photograph super models!!!
Reviews.Author: destiny_driven
Reviews.Content: Warning, if you are pretending to be a world class photographer and are schmoozing super models into going out with you, do not break this baby out!  It will give you away immediately!  I had Kate Upton down to her panties only and when I whipped out my Powershot, she laughed hysterically until she peed her pants.  I think that she is still laughing!  How embarrassing.  Awe, she won't tell anyone though.  I have photos of her peeing her panties and urine running down her legs.  TMZ would love to get a hold of these babies!

Reviews.Title: Disappointed in both Amazon and Canon
Reviews.Author: Lee Koehmstedt
Reviews.Content: The promotion was buy the camera and get a sd card and case free.....need to read the fine print...order separate...why make it so difficult.  And the camera does not come with a cable to transfer photos to a computer or a manual....come on Canon you can do better.  Very disappointed with this purchase!!!!

Reviews.Title: Did not recieve what I ordered on Novenber 30
Reviews.Author: Zaid Ali
Reviews.Content: I am suppose to get a case and a memory card with my order of the A2500. 16mp digital camera with 5x optical image stabilized

Reviews.Title: Very misleading and no help from customer service
Reviews.Author: mary jane leblanc
Reviews.Content: Very disappointed in customer service. The camera said it came with free SD card and free case but when I received it there was no SD card or case so I called and they said I was suppose to click on learn more and then check those items but it said it cost for those items so I didn't click on them cause I thought I was getting them free. When I called customer service said they could not send the SD card or case. Very misleading, I'm a very good customer but that didn't matter. So I would not buy this item for that reason.

Reviews.Title: No card or case included as promised at time of sale
Reviews.Author: shaya labin
Reviews.Content: It said it comes with a free case and 16g sd card, non of it came with it, was a plain simple lie by Amazon, anything I can do now?

Reviews.Title: good pictures, pain in rear
Reviews.Author: Thomas G. Garringer "tommy of Dayton"
Reviews.Content: This point and shoot is priced for people who just want snapshots.No cable for connecting to TV.(available for purchase)Battery must be removed from camera to charge.I wish we had not given our 12 MP Coolpix away when this mothers day gift arrived.If the charger gets lost Canon will sell you another for $50.No more Canons in this Family.  P.S. We found our charger in granddaughters toys.Three stars because pictures are good

Reviews.Title: no memory card
Reviews.Author: Christopher Cavin "ccbig"
Reviews.Content: I'm so embarrassed - no memory card and gave as a present.  Now buying a memory card which changes the whole deal.. Cheep decision by cannon.  You suck

Reviews.Title: Immediate Price Drop?
Reviews.Author: Cindy
Reviews.Content: I purchased 2 of these cameras to give as gifts for Christmas. I really can't say how the cameras are working yet since I just gave them today - will check with them and then make another post about that.However, I am disappointed in Amazon - I purchased these camera with just enough time to get them here by Christmas - then I log on this evening to look for something else, and find that they have already dropped the price by $11 and Christmas isn't even over yet - that's a $22 cost for me. I could have bought the cases to go with the cameras if it hadn't been for that.If this were a Christmas item, I could see the reason for the immediate drop in price - but, a camera?

Reviews.Title: See below
Reviews.Author: brenda gilbert
Reviews.Content: NO instruction on how the camera works in box.  The battery base charger pulls right into wall very dangerous.  The camera seem cheap made.

Reviews.Title: not a good camera at all.
Reviews.Author: Shaboom
Reviews.Content: After taking a few pics I got an onscreen message saying "MEMORY CARD ERROR" then i found out how to format the memory by looking online... as it came with very minimal instruction.. I lost all the previous pix when I did this.. After taking a few more pictures I got the same message only this time I was not able to choose "format" from the cameras set up menu...I don't know why... it just would not allow me to select "format" ..  buy a coolpix by nikon.. they are very user friendly .Now I have to return this un usable piece of junk to a target store very far from my home.

Reviews.Title: Buggy
Reviews.Author: Brad Barrett
Reviews.Content: Took 3 SD cards to finally get one to read.  Still can't get the date to set either.  I need to go to the manual.

Reviews.Title: No memory card
Reviews.Author: AeriaGlorius
Reviews.Content: There was no memory card that fit it! I went to Walmart to find it and it still doesn't work!

Reviews.Title: Only takes blurry pictures.
Reviews.Author: matt dayton
Reviews.Content: This is the worst camera I have ever purchased.  Regardless which setting is used, every picture ends up blurry (even still shots).

Reviews.Title: Frustrating!
Reviews.Author: S. Slaughter "Author"
Reviews.Content: I bought a powershot a2500 and it arrived a couple of days ago. To my surprise I need a memory card and a power cord to upload photos. I assumed this would come with the camera already installed (memory card) but it wasn't. Being this is my first time shopping for a camera in years you can imagine my frustration upon learning I would have to buy the memory card separately. So here I am waiting to hear from Office Depot and they must be having problems finding it because they have not gotten back to me yet. So if I can't find the parts I need I will have to send this camera back. Stay tuned!

Reviews.Title: No Cable in the Box
Reviews.Author: Van Abernathy "Nessa To You"
Reviews.Content: Needed a new camera to take photos for a family reunion.  Thought I'd get a better deal online versus a retail store.  Thought the price was right -- but there was not computer cable in the box -- so I had to go to a retail store to get one...  There goes the savings.  I would have purchased a more expensive camera, which would probably had the cable the box, if I had known the Canon PowerShot A2500 would only have the camera.  Didn't like having to download the software -- so used to having a CD.  And the camera is so small, I'm afraid I'll lose it.

Reviews.Title: Directions not complete.
Reviews.Author: Anita L Miller
Reviews.Content: Have not used it enough to really rate this product and I keep taking pictures of myself which is really weird.

Reviews.Title: Cord missing to download pictures
Reviews.Author: Carlos V. Williams
Reviews.Content: Can not download pictures to computer, no transfer cord included like all the other cameras I bought. Three more words.

Reviews.Title: camera digital cannon
Reviews.Author: carlos perez
Reviews.Content: because it is a good team according to the characteristics.I like the team for their design and capacity.recommend the team to all those lovers of photography

Reviews.Title: no memory card!!!
Reviews.Author: James Scutella
Reviews.Content: after waiting 7 days to receive my camera, there was no memory card or power cord inside and it was useless. if I know I would order memory card, but there was no mention to that in the description info !!

Reviews.Title: Cannon Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Barb
Reviews.Content: We bought his camera for our grandson's 9th birthday.  When he opened it and tried to use it, it wouldn't work because it did NOT incude a memory card.  Since he was going to be baptized that evening and wanted us to record it on his camera, my husband had to leave and go purchase a memory card for it so it would work.  Also, it stated that a power cord was included with it.  Well, that was MISSING from the box.  So, all in all, we weren't happy with this purchase.  Who in the world would sell a camera that you can't use immediately?  Cannon seemed to conveniently NOT let you know in the description that a memory card was NOT included.  So . . . buyer beware . . . you will have to buy a memory card separately from this purchase making the camera more expensive.

Reviews.Title: worst camera
Reviews.Author: MB "MB"
Reviews.Content: This is a horrible product and when I called Canon support I was told "Well we didn't sell it to you" !!!?

Reviews.Title: was not for me
Reviews.Author: Fredamity
Reviews.Content: It appears to be a nice little camera. BUT, it comes with no USB cord, no memory card, AND NO MANUAL. You can download a 119 page manual from the Canon Web site.  If your tech challenged forget it. This was the first digital camera I ever purchased. When I opened the box there was no disc for my computer. I'm not one to download info from a web site. So I decided to return it. In my case it would be best for me to go to a camera store and get personal  advice form a sales person.

Reviews.Title: No memory????
Reviews.Author: Lisa Albert
Reviews.Content: What is the purpose of selling an item that doesn't work right out of the box? I really have to buy an additional item just to be able to use this camera? I wonder how long a car dealership would stay in business if after the sale, the customer was told they needed to buy the tires because it wasn't part of the original sale, THIS IS BS!

Reviews.Title: Product info
Reviews.Author: Chris Nicolaou
Reviews.Content: I was not told that the camera has no memory card. I try to take photos for my child's recital and I was disappointed to miss the whole performance.

ProductInfo.Features:
ECO Mode to reduce power consumption
Capture impressive 720p HD video in stereo sound with a dedicated movie button
16 megapixel, 1/2.3-inch CCD sensor and Canon DIGIC 4 image processor deliver enhanced image quality
5x optical zoom and 28mm wide-angle lens with Digital Image Stabilizer
Smart Auto intelligently selects the proper settings based on 32 predefined shooting situations
USB cable not included
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot A2500 16MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
